words.hanzi: 孙月：听说你男朋友李进跟你是一个学校的，是你同学吗？
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Tīngshuō nǐ nánpéngyǒu Lǐ Jìn gēn nǐ shì yí ge xuéxiào de, shì nǐ tóngxué ma?
words.meaning: Sun Yue: I heard your boyfriend Li Jin is from the same school as you. Is he your classmate?

words.hanzi: 王静：是的，他学的是新闻，我学的是法律，我和他不是一个班。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Shì de, tā xué de shì xīnwén, wǒ xué de shì fǎlǜ, wǒ hé tā bú shì yí ge bān.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Yes, he studied journalism, and I studied law. We weren't in the same class.

words.hanzi: 孙月：那你们俩是怎么认识的？
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Nà nǐmen liǎ shì zěnme rènshi de?
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Then how did you two meet?

words.hanzi: 王静：我们是在一次足球比赛中认识的。我们班跟他们班比赛，他一个人踢进两个球，我对他也印象很深，后来就慢慢熟悉了。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Wǒmen shì zài yí cì zúqiú bǐsài zhōng rènshi de. Wǒmen bān gēn tāmen bān bǐsài, tā yí ge rén tījìn liǎng ge qiú, wǒ duì tā yìnxiàng hěn shēn, hòulái jiù mànman shúxī le.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: We met during a soccer match. Our class played against his. He scored two goals by himself. I was very impressed by him, and later we gradually got to know each other.

words.hanzi: 孙月：你为什么喜欢他？
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Nǐ wèishénme xǐhuan tā?
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Why do you like him?

words.hanzi: 王静：他不仅足球踢得好，性格也不错。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Tā bùjǐn zúqiú tī de hǎo, xìnggé yě búcuò.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Not only does he play soccer well, but his personality is also quite good.

words.hanzi: 王静：李老师，我下个月五号就要结婚了。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Lǐ lǎoshī, wǒ xià ge yuè wǔ hào jiù yào jiéhūn le.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Teacher Li, I am getting married on the 5th of next month.

words.hanzi: 李老师：你是在开玩笑吧？你们不是才认识一个月？
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Nǐ shì zài kāi wánxiào ba? Nǐmen bú shì cái rènshi yí ge yuè?
words.meaning: Teacher Li: You are kidding, right? Didn't you just meet a month ago?

words.hanzi: 王静：虽然我们认识的时间不长，但我从来没这么快乐过。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Suīrán wǒmen rènshi de shíjiān bù cháng, dàn wǒ cónglái méi zhème kuàilèguo.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Although we haven't known each other long, I have never been this happy.

words.hanzi: 李老师：两个人在一起，最好能有共同的兴趣和爱好。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Liǎng ge rén zài yìqǐ, zuìhǎo néng yǒu gòngtóng de xìngqù hé àihào.
words.meaning: Teacher Li: When two people are together, it's best to have shared interests and hobbies.

words.hanzi: 王静：我们有很多共同的爱好，经常一起打球、唱歌、做菜。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Wǒmen yǒu hěn duō gòngtóng de àihào, jīngcháng yìqǐ dǎ qiú, chàng gē, zuò cài.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: We have many shared hobbies; we often play ball, sing, and cook together.

words.hanzi: 李老师：看来你真的找到适合你的人了。祝你们幸福！
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Kànlái nǐ zhēn de zhǎodào shìhé nǐ de rén le. Zhù nǐmen xìngfú!
words.meaning: Teacher Li: It seems you really found the person who suits you. I wish you happiness!

words.hanzi: 高老师：听说您跟妻子结婚快二十年了？
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Tīngshuō nín gēn qīzi jiéhūn kuài èrshí nián le?
words.meaning: Gao Laoshi: I heard you and your wife have been married for almost twenty years?

words.hanzi: 李老师：到六月九号，我们就结婚二十年了。这么多年，我们的生活一直挺幸福的。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Dào liùyuè jiǔ hào, wǒmen jiù jiéhūn èrshí nián le. Zhème duō nián, wǒmen de shēnghuó yìzhí tǐng xìngfú de.
words.meaning: Li Laoshi: By June 9th, we will have been married for twenty years. For so many years, our life has been quite happy.

words.hanzi: 高老师：我和丈夫刚结婚的时候，每天都觉得很新鲜，在一起有说不完的话。但是现在……
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Wǒ hé zhàngfu gāng jiéhūn de shíhou, měitiān dōu juéde hěn xīnxiān, zài yìqǐ yǒu shuōbuwán de huà. Dànshì xiànzài...
words.meaning: Gao Laoshi: When my husband and I first got married, every day felt fresh, and we had endless things to say to each other. But now...

words.hanzi: 李老师：两个人共同生活，只有浪漫和新鲜感是不够的。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Liǎng ge rén gòngtóng shēnghuó, zhǐ yǒu làngmàn hé xīnxiāngǎn shì bú gòu de.
words.meaning: Li Laoshi: For two people living together, having only romance and freshness is not enough.

words.hanzi: 高老师：您说得对！我现在每天看到的都是他的缺点。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Nín shuō de duì! Wǒ xiànzài měi tiān kàndào de dōu shì tā de quēdiǎn.
words.meaning: Gao Laoshi: You are right! Now, all I see every day are his shortcomings.

words.hanzi: 李老师：两个人在一起时间长了，就会有很多问题。只有接受了他的缺点，你们才能更好地一起生活。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Liǎng ge rén zài yìqǐ shíjiān cháng le, jiù huì yǒu hěn duō wèntí. Zhǐyǒu jiēshòule tā de quēdiǎn, nǐmen cái néng gèng hǎo de yìqǐ shēnghuó.
words.meaning: Li Laoshi: When two people are together for a long time, there will be many problems. Only by accepting his shortcomings can you live together better.

words.hanzi: 很多女孩子羡慕浪漫的爱情。那什么是浪漫呢？
words.pinyin: Hěn duō nǚháizi xiànmù làngmàn de àiqíng. Nà shénme shì làngmàn ne?
words.meaning: Many girls envy romantic love. So what is romance?

words.hanzi: 年轻人说：浪漫是她想要月亮时，你不会给她星星；
words.pinyin: Niánqīng rén shuō: Làngmàn shì tā xiǎng yào yuèliang shí, nǐ bú huì gěi tā xīngxing;
words.meaning: Young people say: Romance is when she wants the moon, you won't give her the stars;

words.hanzi: 中年人说：浪漫是即使晚上加班到零点，到家时，自己家里也还亮着灯；
words.pinyin: Zhōngnián rén shuō: Làngmàn shì jíshǐ wǎnshang jiā bān dào língdiǎn, dào jiā shí, zìjǐ jiā lǐ yě hái liàngzhe dēng;
words.meaning: Middle-aged people say: Romance is even if you work overtime until midnight, the light is still on in your home when you arrive;

words.hanzi: 老年人说：浪漫其实就像歌中唱的那样，“我能想到最浪漫的事，就是和你一起慢慢变老。”
words.pinyin: Lǎonián rén shuō: Làngmàn qíshí jiù xiàng gē zhōng chàng de nàyàng, "Wǒ néng xiǎngdào zuì làngmàn de shì, jiù shì hé nǐ yìqǐ mànman biàn lǎo."
words.meaning: Elderly people say: Romance is actually like what is sung in the song, "The most romantic thing I can think of is growing old with you slowly."

words.hanzi: 其实，让我们感动的，就是生活中简单的爱情。有时候，简单就是最大的幸福。
words.pinyin: Qíshí, ràng wǒmen gǎndòng de, jiù shì shēnghuó zhōng jiǎndān de àiqíng. Yǒushíhou, jiǎndān jiù shì zuì dà de xìngfú.
words.meaning: Actually, what moves us is simple love in life. Sometimes, simplicity is the greatest happiness.

words.hanzi: 说到结婚，人们就会很自然地想起爱情。
words.pinyin: Shuōdào jiéhūn, rénmen jiù huì hěn zìrán de xiǎngqǐ àiqíng.
words.meaning: Speaking of marriage, people naturally think of love.

words.hanzi: 爱情是结婚的重要原因，但两个人共同生活，不仅需要浪漫的爱情，更需要性格上互相吸引。
words.pinyin: Àiqíng shì jiéhūn de zhòngyào yuányīn, dàn liǎng ge rén gòngtóng shēnghuó, bùjǐn xūyào làngmàn de àiqíng, gèng xūyào xìnggé shang hùxiāng xīyǐn.
words.meaning: Love is an important reason for marriage, but living together requires not only romantic love but also mutual attraction in personality.

words.hanzi: 我丈夫是个很幽默的人。即使是很普通的事情，从他嘴里说出来也会变得很有意思。
words.pinyin: Wǒ zhàngfu shì ge hěn yōumò de rén. Jíshǐ shì hěn pǔtōng de shìqing, cóng tā zuǐ lǐ shuō chūlái yě huì biàn de hěn yǒu yìsi.
words.meaning: My husband is a very humorous person. Even very ordinary things become interesting when spoken from his mouth.

words.hanzi: 在我难过的时候，他总是有办法让我高兴起来。
words.pinyin: Zài wǒ nánguò de shíhou, tā zǒngshì yǒu bànfǎ ràng wǒ gāoxìng qǐlái.
words.meaning: When I am sad, he always has a way to make me happy.

words.hanzi: 而且他的脾气也不错，结婚快十年了，我们俩几乎没因为什么事红过脸，很多人都特别羡慕我们。
words.pinyin: Érqiě tā de píqi yě búcuò, jiéhūn kuài shí nián le, wǒmen liǎ jīhū méi yīnwèi shénme shì hóngguo liǎn, hěn duō rén dōu tèbié xiànmù wǒmen.
words.meaning: Moreover, his temper is quite good. We have been married for almost ten years, and we have hardly ever blushed (argued) over anything. Many people envy us very much.

words.hanzi: 小夏：来中国快一年了，你适应这儿的生活了吗？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Lái Zhōngguó kuài yì nián le, nǐ shìyìng zhèr de shēnghuó le ma?
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: You've been in China for almost a year, have you adapted to life here?

words.hanzi: 马克：开始有点儿不习惯，后来就慢慢适应了，最近我还交了一个中国朋友。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Kāishǐ yǒudiǎnr bù xíguàn, hòulái jiù mànman shìyìng le, zuìjìn wǒ hái jiāole yí ge Zhōngguó péngyou.
words.meaning: Mark: I wasn't used to it at first, but later I gradually adapted. Recently I even made a Chinese friend.

words.hanzi: 小夏：那就好，快给我讲讲你新交的中国朋友。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Nà jiù hǎo, kuài gěi wǒ jiǎngjiang nǐ xīn jiāo de Zhōngguó péngyou.
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: That's good. Tell me about your new Chinese friend quickly.

words.hanzi: 马克：我们是在图书馆认识的。平时我们常常一起看书、逛街、踢足球。有时候他还给我发一些幽默短信。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Wǒmen shì zài túshūguǎn rènshi de. Píngshí wǒmen chángcháng yìqǐ kàn shū, guàng jiē, tī zúqiú. Yǒushíhou tā hái gěi wǒ fā yìxiē yōumò duǎnxìn.
words.meaning: Mark: We met in the library. We usually read books, go shopping, and play soccer together. Sometimes he also sends me some humorous text messages.

words.hanzi: 小夏：你的这个朋友真不错！下次介绍我们认识认识，怎么样？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Nǐ de zhègebpéngyou zhēn búcuò! Xià cì jièshào wǒmen rènshi rènshi, zěnmeyàng?
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: Your friend is really nice! How about introducing us next time?

words.hanzi: 马克：没问题！我们下午要去踢足球，正好一起去吧。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Méi wèntí! Wǒmen xiàwǔ yào qù tī zúqiú, zhènghǎo yìqǐ qù ba.
words.meaning: Mark: No problem! We are going to play soccer this afternoon, you can come along.

words.hanzi: 小李：星期天同学聚会，你能来吗？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Xīngqītiān tóngxué jùhuì, nǐ néng lái ma?
words.meaning: Xiao Li: Can you come to the class reunion on Sunday?

words.hanzi: 小林：能来。班里同学你联系得怎么样了？来多少人？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Néng lái. Bān lǐ tóngxué nǐ liánxì de zěnmeyàng le? Lái duōshao rén?
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: I can come. How is the contact with the classmates going? How many people are coming?

words.hanzi: 小李：差不多一半儿吧，张远还专门从国外飞回来呢。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Chàbuduō yíbànr ba, Zhāng Yuǎn hái zhuānmén cóng guówài fēi huílái ne.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: Almost half. Zhang Yuan is even flying back specially from abroad.

words.hanzi: 小林：是吗？毕业都快十年了，真想大家啊！对了，今天早上，我在地铁站遇到了王静，她毕业后就去上海工作了，她这次是来旅游的。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Shì ma? Bì yè dōu kuài shí nián le, zhēn xiǎng dàjiā a! Duìle, jīntiān zǎoshang, wǒ zài dìtiě zhàn yùdàole Wáng Jìng, tā bì yè hòu jiù qù Shànghǎi gōngzuò le, tā zhè cì shì lái lǚyóu de.
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: Really? It’s been almost ten years since graduation, I really miss everyone! By the way, I met Wang Jing at the subway station this morning. She went to work in Shanghai after graduation. She is here for travel this time.

words.hanzi: 小李：那太好了！麻烦你跟她联系一下，请她一起参加同学聚会。聚会就在学校门口那个饭店，六点半。别迟到啊！
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Nà tài hǎo le! Máfan nǐ gēn tā liánxì yíxià, qǐng tā yìqǐ lái cānjiā tóngxué jùhuì. Jùhuì jiù zài xuéxiào ménkǒu nàge fàndiàn, liù diǎn bàn. Bié chídào a!
words.meaning: Xiao Li: That's great! Please contact her and invite her to join the class reunion. The gathering is at the restaurant at the school gate, at 6:30. Don't be late!

words.hanzi: 小林：放心吧。星期天六点半见！
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Fàng xīn ba. Xīngqītiān liù diǎn bàn jiàn!
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: Don't worry. See you on Sunday at 6:30!

words.hanzi: 孙月：这是什么时候的照片？你真年轻！
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Zhè shì shénme shíhou de zhàopiàn? Nǐ zhēn niánqīng!
words.meaning: Sun Yue: When was this photo taken? You look so young!

words.hanzi: 王静：这是上大学时的照片。一看到这张照片，我就想起过去那段快乐的日子，好像重新回到了校园。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Zhè shì shàng dàxué shí de zhàopiàn. Yí kàndào zhè zhāng zhàopiàn, wǒ jiù xiǎngqǐ guòqù nà duàn kuàilè de rìzi, hǎoxiàng chóngxīn huídàole xiàoyuán.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: This is a photo from when I was in college. As soon as I see this photo, I think of those happy days in the past, as if I have returned to the campus again.

words.hanzi: 孙月：旁边这个人一定是你最好的朋友吧？你们现在还联系吗？
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Pángbiān zhège rén yídìng shì nǐ zuì hǎo de péngyou ba? Nǐmen xiànzài hái liánxì ma?
words.meaning: Sun Yue: The person next to you must be your best friend, right? Do you still keep in touch?

words.hanzi: 王静：当然了，尽管已经毕业这么多年，我们还是经常联系的，每次都有说不完的话。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Dāngrán le, jǐnguǎn yǐjīng bì yè zhème duō nián, wǒmen háishì jīngcháng liánxì de, měi cì dōu yǒu shuō bu wán de huà.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Of course. Although we have graduated for so many years, we still contact each other often, and we have endless things to talk about every time.

words.hanzi: 孙月：真羡慕你！我上大学时最好的朋友去了南方工作，我们俩已经好久没联系了。我一会儿就给她打个电话。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Zhēn xiànmù nǐ! Wǒ shàng dàxué shí zuì hǎo de péngyou qùle nánfāng gōngzuò, wǒmen liǎ yǐjīng hǎojiǔ méi liánxì le. Wǒ yíhuìr jiù gěi tā dǎ ge diànhuà.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: I really envy you! My best friend from college went to work in the south, and we haven't been in touch for a long time. I'll give her a call in a while.

words.hanzi: 王静：对。要知道，能有一个真正的朋友，有一段真正的友谊，是多么不容易！
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Duì. Yào zhīdào, néng yǒu yí ge zhēnzhèng de péngyou, yǒu yí duàn zhēnzhèng de yǒuyì, shì duōme bù róngyì!
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Right. You should know, it is not easy to have a true friend and a true friendship!

words.hanzi: 每个人都需要朋友，朋友可以丰富我们的生活。
words.pinyin: Měi ge rén dōu xūyào péngyou, péngyou kěyǐ fēngfù wǒmen de shēnghuó.
words.meaning: Everyone needs friends; friends can enrich our lives.

words.hanzi: 离开朋友，我们的生活一定会非常无聊。
words.pinyin: Líkāi péngyou, wǒmen de shēnghuó yídìng huì fēicháng wúliáo.
words.meaning: Without friends, our lives would definitely be very boring.

words.hanzi: 那么，怎样才能交到更多的朋友呢？
words.pinyin: Nàme, zěnyàng cái néng jiāodào gèng duō de péngyou ne?
words.meaning: So, how can we make more friends?

words.hanzi: 当然，要有好脾气。一个脾气不好的人虽然不一定让人讨厌，但是却很难跟人交朋友。
words.pinyin: Dāngrán, yào yǒu hǎo píqi. Yí ge píqi bù hǎo de rén suīrán bù yídìng ràng rén tǎoyàn, dànshì què hěn nán gēn rén jiāo péngyou.
words.meaning: Of course, one must have a good temper. Although a person with a bad temper is not necessarily annoying, it is difficult for them to make friends.

words.hanzi: 因为没有人会喜欢跟一个总是容易生气的人在一起。
words.pinyin: Yīnwèi méiyǒu rén huì xǐhuan gēn yí ge zǒngshì róngyì shēng qì de rén zài yìqǐ.
words.meaning: Because no one likes to be with someone who always gets angry easily.

words.hanzi: 我们还要经常跟周围的人交流。交流能让人们互相了解，如果有共同的兴趣、爱好或者习惯，就更容易成为朋友了。
words.pinyin: Wǒmen hái yào jīngcháng gēn zhōuwéi de rén jiāoliú. Jiāoliú néng ràng rénmen hùxiāng liǎojiě, rúguǒ yǒu gòngtóng de xìngqù, àihào huòzhě xíguàn, jiù gèng róngyì chéngwéi péngyou le.
words.meaning: We also need to communicate often with the people around us. Communication allows people to understand each other. If there are common interests, hobbies, or habits, it becomes easier to become friends.

words.hanzi: 人的一生可以什么也没有，但不能没有朋友，而且必须要有自己真正的朋友。
words.pinyin: Rén de yìshēng kěyǐ shénme yě méiyǒu, dàn bù néng méiyǒu péngyou, érqiě bìxū yào yǒu zìjǐ zhēnzhèng de péngyou.
words.meaning: A person can have nothing in life, but cannot be without friends, and must have their own true friends.

words.hanzi: 什么是真正的朋友？不同的人会有不同的理解。
words.pinyin: Shénme shì zhēnzhèng de péngyou? Bù tóng de rén huì yǒu bù tóng de lǐjiě.
words.meaning: What is a true friend? Different people will have different understandings.

words.hanzi: 有些人觉得朋友就是能和自己一起快乐的人；有些人觉得朋友应该像镜子，能帮自己看到缺点。
words.pinyin: Yǒuxiē rén juéde péngyou jiù shì néng hé zìjǐ yìqǐ kuàilè de rén; yǒuxiē rén juéde péngyou yīnggāi xiàng jìngzi, néng bāng zìjǐ kàndào quēdiǎn.
words.meaning: Some people feel that friends are people who can be happy with them; some feel that friends should be like mirrors, helping them see their shortcomings.

words.hanzi: 而我的理解是：当你遇到困难的时候，真正的朋友会站出来，及时给你帮助；
words.pinyin: Ér wǒ de lǐjiě shì: Dāng nǐ yùdào kùnnán de shíhou, zhēnzhèng de péngyou huì zhàn chūlái, jíshí gěi nǐ bāngzhù;
words.meaning: But my understanding is: When you encounter difficulties, true friends will stand out and give you help in time;

words.hanzi: 当你无聊或者难过的时候，真正的朋友会陪在你身边，想办法让你感到幸福。
words.pinyin: Dāng nǐ wúliáo huòzhě nánguò de shíhou, zhēnzhèng de péngyou huì péi zài nǐ shēnbiān, xiǎng bànfǎ ràng nǐ gǎndào xìngfú.
words.meaning: When you are bored or sad, true friends will stay by your side and find ways to make you feel happy.

3.title: 经理对我印象不错
3.title_pinyin: jīng lǐ duì wǒ yìn xiàng bù cuò
3.title_meaning: The manager has a good impression of me

words.hanzi: 小夏：你上午的面试怎么样？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Nǐ shàngwǔ de miànshì zěnmeyàng?
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: How was your interview this morning?

words.hanzi: 小雨：还可以，他们问的问题都挺容易的，就是我有点儿紧张。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Hái kěyǐ, tāmen wèn de wèntí dōu tǐng róngyì de, jiù shì wǒ yǒudiǎnr jǐnzhāng.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: It was okay. The questions they asked were quite easy, but I was a bit nervous.

words.hanzi: 小夏：面试的时候，一定要对自己有信心，要相信自己的能力。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Miànshì de shíhou, yídìng yào duì zìjǐ yǒu xìnxīn, yào xiāngxìn zìjǐ de néngli.
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: During an interview, you must have confidence in yourself and believe in your ability.

words.hanzi: 小雨：你说得对！三月十五号上午八点在学校体育馆还有一个招聘会，你去吗？
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Nǐ shuō de duì! Sānyuè shíwǔ hào shàngwǔ bā diǎn zài xuéxiào tǐyùguǎn hái yǒu yí ge zhāopìnhuì, nǐ qù ma?
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: You are right! There is another job fair at the school gym at 8 am on March 15th. Are you going?

words.hanzi: 小夏：我还没决定呢。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Wǒ hái méi juédìng ne.
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: I haven't decided yet.

words.hanzi: 小雨：听说这次招聘会提供的工作机会很多，我们一起去看看吧。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Tīngshuō zhè cì zhāopìnhuì tígōng de gōngzuò jīhuì hěn duō, wǒmen yìqǐ qù kànkan ba.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: I heard that this job fair offers many job opportunities. Let's go and have a look together.

words.hanzi: 马经理：小林，这次招聘不是小李负责吗？
words.pinyin: Mǎ jīnglǐ: Xiǎo Lín, zhè cì zhāopìn bú shì Xiǎo Lǐ fùzé ma?
words.meaning: Manager Ma: Xiao Lin, isn't Xiao Li in charge of the recruitment this time?

words.hanzi: 小林：本来是小李负责的，但是他突然生病住院了，所以就交给我来做了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Běnlái shì Xiǎo Lǐ fùzé de, dànshì tā tūrán shēng bìng zhù yuàn le, suǒyǐ jiù jiāogěi wǒ lái zuò le.
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: Originally Xiao Li was in charge, but he suddenly fell ill and was hospitalized, so it was handed over to me.

words.hanzi: 马经理：哦，这次应聘的人多吗？
words.pinyin: Mǎ jīnglǐ: Ó, zhè cì yìngpìn de rén duō ma?
words.meaning: Manager Ma: Oh, are there many people applying this time?

words.hanzi: 小林：经理，这次来应聘的一共有十五人。经过笔试和面试，有两个不错。这是他们的材料，您看看。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Jīnglǐ, zhè cì lái yìngpìn de yígòng yǒu shíwǔ rén. Jīngguò bǐshì hé miànshì, yǒu liǎng ge búcuò. Zhè shì tāmen de cáiliào, nín kànkan.
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: Manager, there are a total of fifteen applicants this time. After the written test and interview, two are quite good. These are their materials, please take a look.

words.hanzi: 马经理：这两个人的能力都比较符合我们的要求。你通知他们下周一上午九点来我办公室吧。
words.pinyin: Mǎ jīnglǐ: Zhè liǎng ge rén de néngli dōu bǐjiào fúhé wǒmen de yāoqiú. Nǐ tōngzhī tāmen xià zhōuyī shàngwǔ jiǔ diǎn lái wǒ bàngōngshì ba.
words.meaning: Manager Ma: The abilities of these two people match our requirements relatively well. Notify them to come to my office at 9 am next Monday.

words.hanzi: 小林：好的，那我马上跟他们联系。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Hǎo de, nà wǒ mǎshàng gēn tāmen liánxì.
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: Okay, I will contact them immediately.

words.hanzi: 小林：王静，好久不见了！大学毕业后就没联系了，你现在在哪儿工作呢？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Wáng Jìng, hǎojiǔ bú jiàn le! Dàxué bì yè hòu jiù méi liánxì le, nǐ xiànzài zài nǎr gōngzuò ne?
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: Wang Jing, long time no see! We haven't been in touch since graduating from university. Where are you working now?

words.hanzi: 王静：我一毕业就去上海当律师了。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Wǒ yí bì yè jiù qù Shànghǎi dāng lǜshī le.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: As soon as I graduated, I went to Shanghai to work as a lawyer.

words.hanzi: 小林：你对现在的工作一定非常满意吧？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Nǐ duì xiànzài de gōngzuò yídìng fēicháng mǎnyì ba?
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: You must be very satisfied with your current job, right?

words.hanzi: 王静：我很喜欢现在的工作，因为我学的就是法律专业，而且同事们都很喜欢我。另外，收入也不错。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Wǒ hěn xǐhuan xiànzài de gōngzuò, yīnwèi wǒ xué de jiù shì fǎlǜ zhuānyè, érqiě tóngshìmen dōu hěn xǐhuan wǒ. Lìngwài, shōurù yě búcuò.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: I like my current job very much because I studied law, and my colleagues like me very much. Besides, the income is not bad either.

words.hanzi: 小林：星期天咱们同学聚会，你能来参加吗？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Xīngqītiān zánmen tóngxué jùhuì, nǐ néng lái cānjiā ma?
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: We are having a class reunion on Sunday, can you come?

words.hanzi: 王静：能来。虽然这次来北京，时间安排得很紧张，但我一定借这次机会去跟大家见见面。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Néng lái. Suīrán zhè cì lái Běijīng, shíjiān ānpái de hěn jǐnzhāng, dàn wǒ yídìng jiè zhè cì jīhuì qù gēn dàjiā jiànjian miàn.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: I can come. Although my schedule is very tight this time in Beijing, I will definitely take this opportunity to meet everyone.

words.hanzi: 面试的时候，经理对我印象不错，还通知我明天就可以上班了。
words.pinyin: Miànshì de shíhou, jīnglǐ duì wǒ yìnxiàng búcuò, hái tōngzhī wǒ míngtiān jiù kěyǐ shàng bān le.
words.meaning: During the interview, I made a good impression on the manager, and he informed me that I can start working tomorrow.

words.hanzi: 真没想道，找工作这么顺利。你想知道面试需要注意什么吗？
words.pinyin: Zhēn méi xiǎngdào, zhǎo gōngzuò zhème shùnlì. Nǐ xiǎng zhīdào miànshì xūyào zhùyì shénme ma?
words.meaning: I really didn't expect job hunting to go so smoothly. Do you want to know what to pay attention to during an interview?

words.hanzi: 首先，要穿正式的衣服，这会给面试者留下一个好的印象，让他觉得你是一个认真的人。
words.pinyin: Shǒuxiàn, yào chuān zhèngshì de yīfu, zhè huì gěi miànshìzhě liúxià yí ge hǎo de yìnxiàng, ràng tā juéde nǐ shì yí ge rènzhēn de rén.
words.meaning: First of all, wear formal clothes. This will leave a good impression on the interviewer and make him feel that you are a serious person.

words.hanzi: 其次，应聘时不要紧张。
words.pinyin: Qícì, yìngpìn shí búyào jǐnzhāng.
words.meaning: Second, don't be nervous when applying.

words.hanzi: 回答问题时，说得不要太快，声音也不要太小，要相信自己有能力做好。
words.pinyin: Huídá wèntí shí, shuō de búyào tài kuài, shēngyīn yě búyào tài xiǎo, yào xiāngxìn zìjǐ yǒu néngli zuòhǎo.
words.meaning: When answering questions, do not speak too fast, and do not speak too softly. Believe that you have the ability to do well.

words.hanzi: 当然，最重要的是回答问题要诚实。
words.pinyin: Dāngrán, zuì zhòngyào de shì huídá wèntí yào chéngshí.
words.meaning: Of course, the most important thing is to be honest when answering questions.

words.hanzi: 第一印象就是在第一次见面时给别人留下的印象。
words.pinyin: Dì yī yìnxiàng jiù shì zài dì yī cì jiàn miàn shí gěi biéren liúxià de yìnxiàng.
words.meaning: The first impression is the impression left on others when meeting for the first time.

words.hanzi: 虽然第一印象不总是对的，但如果想改变却很困难。
words.pinyin: Suīrán dì yī yìnxiàng bù zǒng shì duì de, dàn rúguǒ xiǎng gǎibiàn què hěn kùnnán.
words.meaning: Although first impressions are not always correct, they are difficult to change if you want to.

words.hanzi: 你给别人的第一印象会影响他们以后对你的感觉和判断。
words.pinyin: Nǐ gěi biéren de dì yī yìnxiàng huì yǐngxiǎng tāmen yǐhòu duì nǐ de gǎnjué hé pànduàn.
words.meaning: The first impression you give to others will affect their feelings and judgments about you in the future.

words.hanzi: 所以，给第一次见面的同事留下好的印象，以后的工作可能会更顺利；
words.pinyin: Suǒyǐ, gěi dì yī cì jiàn miàn de tóngshì liúxià hǎo de yìnxiàng, yǐhòu de gōngzuò kěnéng huì gèng shùnlì;
words.meaning: Therefore, leaving a good impression on colleagues you meet for the first time may make future work smoother;

words.hanzi: 给第一次见面的顾客留下好的印象，你可能会卖出更多的东西。
words.pinyin: Gěi dì yī cì jiàn miàn de gùkè liúxià hǎo de yìnxiàng, nǐ kěnéng huì màichū gèng duō de dōngxi.
words.meaning: Leaving a good impression on customers you meet for the first time may help you sell more things.

words.hanzi: 但是，如果第一次见面给别人留下像不准时这样的坏印象，那么以后就很难让别人相信你。
words.pinyin: Dànshì, rúguǒ dì yī cì jiàn miàn gěi biéren liúxià xiàng bù zhǔnshí zhèyàng de huài yìnxiàng, nàme yǐhòu jiù hěn nán ràng biéren xiāngxìn nǐ.
words.meaning: However, if you leave a bad impression like being unpunctual during the first meeting, it will be difficult to make others trust you in the future.

words.hanzi: 所以不管是上课、上班，还是与别人约会，准时都非常重要。
words.pinyin: Suǒyǐ bùguǎn shì shàng kè, shàng bān, háishi yǔ biéren yuēhuì, zhǔnshí dōu fēicháng zhòngyào.
words.meaning: So whether it is attending class, going to work, or having a date with others, being on time is very important.

4.title: 不要急着赚钱
4.title_pinyin: bú yào jí zhe zhuàn qián
4.title_meaning: Don't be in a hurry to make money

words.hanzi: 小林：听说你又换工作了？今年已经换了三次工作了吧？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Tīngshuō nǐ yòu huàn gōngzuò le? Jīnnián yǐjīng huànle sān cì gōngzuò le ba?
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: I heard you changed jobs again? You've already changed jobs three times this year, right?

words.hanzi: 小李：别提了！我以为新工作比以前的好，没想到还没以前好呢。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Biétí le! Wǒ yǐwéi xīn gōngzuò bǐ yǐqián de hǎo, méi xiǎngdào hái méiyǒu yǐqián hǎo ne.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: Don't bring it up! I thought the new job would be better than the previous one, but I didn't expect it to be worse.

words.hanzi: 小林：上次那份工作你只做了两个月就离开了，其实，完全适应一个新的工作需要一年时间，所以，经常换工作不一定好。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Shàng cì nà fèn gōngzuò nǐ zhǐ zuòle liǎng ge yuè jiù líkāi le, qíshí, wánquán shìyìng yí ge xīn de gōngzuò xūyào yì nián shíjiān, suǒyǐ, jīngcháng huàn gōngzuò bù yídìng hǎo.
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: You left that last job after only two months. Actually, it takes a year to fully adapt to a new job, so changing jobs frequently isn't necessarily good.

words.hanzi: 小李：我也明白。但是那份工作的收入太少了！
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Wǒ yě míngbai. Dànshì nà fèn gōngzuò de shōurù tài shǎo le!
words.meaning: Xiao Li: I understand that too. But the income from that job was too low!

words.hanzi: 小林：你才到新公司，不要太急着赚钱，多学习才是最重要的。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Nǐ cái dào xīn gōngsī, búyào tài jízhe zhuàn qián, duō xuéxí cái shì zuì zhòngyào de.
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: You just arrived at the new company, don't be too anxious to make money; learning more is the most important thing.

words.hanzi: 小李：好。我一定会努力把现在这份工作做好。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Hǎo. Wǒ yídìng huì nǔlì bǎ xiànzài zhè fèn gōngzuò zuòhǎo.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: Okay. I will definitely work hard to do this current job well.

words.hanzi: 王经理：那份调查还要多长时间才能做完？
words.pinyin: Wáng jīnglǐ: Nà fèn diàochá hái yào duō cháng shíjiān cái néng zuòwán?
words.meaning: Manager Wang: How much longer will it take to finish that survey?

words.hanzi: 小李：按原来的计划应该是两周，但是我们可以提前完成，周末保证做完。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Àn yuánlái de jìhuà yīnggāi shì liǎng zhōu, dànshì wǒmen kěyǐ tíqián wánchéng, zhōumò bǎozhèng zuòwán.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: According to the original plan, it should be two weeks, but we can finish it ahead of schedule, guaranteed by the weekend.

words.hanzi: 王经理：虽然最近工作很忙，但你们也要注意身体啊。
words.pinyin: Wáng jīnglǐ: Suīrán zuìjìn gōngzuò hěn máng, dàn nǐmen yě yào zhùyì shēntǐ a.
words.meaning: Manager Wang: Although work has been busy recently, you must also take care of your health.

words.hanzi: 小李：谢谢您！现在有很多事情等着我做，真不知道该先做哪个好。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Xièxie nín! Xiànzài yǒu hěn duō shìqing děngzhe wǒ zuò, zhēn bù zhīdào gāi xiān zuò nǎge hǎo.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: Thank you! There are so many things waiting for me to do now, I really don't know which one to do first.

words.hanzi: 王经理：每天早上我都把当天计划要做的事情写在笔记本上，提醒自己安排好时间。你也可以试试这样做。
words.pinyin: Wáng jīnglǐ: Měi tiān zǎoshang wǒ dōu bǎ dāngtiān jìhuà yào zuò de shìqing xiě zài bǐjìběn shang, tíxǐng zìjǐ ānpái hǎo shíjiān. Nǐ yě kěyǐ shìshi zhèyàng zuò.
words.meaning: Manager Wang: Every morning I write down the things I plan to do that day in a notebook to remind myself to arrange my time well. You can try doing this too.

words.hanzi: 小李：这个办法真不错！这样我就不会手忙脚乱了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Zhège bànfǎ zhēn búcuò! Zhèyàng wǒ jiù bú huì shǒumáng-jiǎoluàn le.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: This method is really good! This way I won't be in a rush and mess.

words.hanzi: 王经理：什么事让你这么高兴啊？
words.pinyin: Wáng jīnglǐ: Shénme shì ràng nǐ zhème gāoxìng a?
words.meaning: Manager Wang: What makes you so happy?

words.hanzi: 马经理：我们和上次那个公司的生意终于谈成了。
words.pinyin: Mǎ jīnglǐ: Wǒmen hé shàng cì nàge gōngsī de shēngyi zhōngyú tánchéng le.
words.meaning: Manager Ma: We finally successfully negotiated the business deal with that company from last time.

words.hanzi: 王经理：太好了！你工作那么努力，公司会越来越好的。
words.pinyin: Wáng jīnglǐ: That's great! You work so hard, the company will get better and better.
words.meaning: 马经理：我原来以为做生意很简单，后来才发现其实并不容易，现在赚钱越来越难了。

words.hanzi: 王经理：慢慢来，万事开头难，重要的是要多积累经验。
words.pinyin: Wáng jīnglǐ: Mànman lái, wànshì kāitóu nán, zhòngyào de shì yào duō jīlěi jīngyàn.
words.meaning: Manager Wang: Take it easy, everything is hard in the beginning. The important thing is to accumulate more experience.

words.hanzi: 马经理：我相信经过我们大家的努力，公司的生意会越做越大，一切都会好的。
words.pinyin: Mǎ jīnglǐ: Wǒ xiāngxìn jīngguò wǒmen dàjiā de nǔlì, gōngsī de shēngyi huì yuè zuò yuè dà, yíqiè dōu huì hǎo de.
words.meaning: Manager Ma: I believe that through everyone's efforts, the company's business will grow bigger and bigger, and everything will be fine.

words.hanzi: 我们今年的工作都已经按照计划完成了。
words.pinyin: Wǒmen jīnnián de gōngzuò dōu yǐjīng ànzhào jìhuà wánchéng le.
words.meaning: Our work for this year has all been completed according to plan.

words.hanzi: 这一段时间，尽管工作很紧张，中间也遇到了很多困难，但是因为有大家的努力，我们成功地解决了问题，顺利地完成了工作。
words.pinyin: Zhè yí duàn shíjiān, jǐnguǎn gōngzuò hěn jǐnzhāng, zhōngjiān yě yùdàole hěn duō kùnnán, dànshì yīnwèi yǒu dàjiā de nǔlì, wǒmen chénggōng de jiějuéle wèntí, shùnlì de wánchéngle gōngzuò.
words.meaning: During this period, although the work was intense and we encountered many difficulties in the process, because of everyone's efforts, we successfully solved the problems and completed the work smoothly.

words.hanzi: 非常感谢大家对我的帮助！
words.pinyin: Fēicháng gǎnxiè dàjiā duì wǒ de bāngzhù!
words.meaning: Thank you very much for your help!

words.hanzi: 另外，马经理让我告诉大家一个好消息，因为大家按时完成了工作，公司决定这个月给每人多发三千元奖金。
words.pinyin: Lìngwài, Mǎ jīnglǐ ràng wǒ gàosu dàjiā yí ge hǎo xiāoxi, yīnwèi dàjiā ànshí wánchéngle gōngzuò, gōngsī juédìng zhège yuè gěi měi rén duō fā sānqiān yuán jiǎngjīn.
words.meaning: In addition, Manager Ma asked me to tell everyone good news: because everyone completed the work on time, the company decided to give everyone an extra 3,000 yuan bonus this month.

words.hanzi: 感谢大家这三个多月的努力工作，希望明年能有更大的成绩！
words.pinyin: Gǎnxiè dàjiā zhè sān ge duō yuè de nǔlì gōngzuò, xīwàng míngnián néng yǒu gèng dà de chéngjì!
words.meaning: Thank you all for your hard work over the past three months. I hope we can have even greater achievements next year!

words.hanzi: 年轻人刚开始工作的时候，不要太急着赚钱，不要眼睛里只有工资和奖金。
words.pinyin: Niánqīng rén gāng kāishǐ gōngzuò de shíhou, búyào tài jízhe zhuàn qián, búyào yǎnjing lǐ zhǐyǒu gōngzī hé jiǎngjīn.
words.meaning: When young people first start working, don't be too anxious to make money, and don't only have salary and bonuses in your eyes.

words.hanzi: 在工作的前几年，重要的是丰富自己的工作经验，学习与同事交流的方法，积累专业知识，这些比收入重要多了。
words.pinyin: Zài gōngzuò de qián jǐ nián, zhòngyào de shì fēngfù zìjǐ de gōngzuò jīngyàn, xuéxí yǔ tóngshì jiāoliú de fāngfǎ, jīlěi zhuānyè zhīshi, zhèxiē bǐ shōurù zhòngyào duō le.
words.meaning: In the first few years of work, the important thing is to enrich your work experience, learn methods of communicating with colleagues, and accumulate professional knowledge. These are much more important than income.

words.hanzi: 但是很多时候，我们不得不去做一些自己不愿意做甚至是非常不喜欢的工作。
words.pinyin: Dànshì hěn duō shíhou, wǒmen bù dé bù qù zuò yìxiē zìjǐ bú yuànyì zuò shènzhì shì fēicháng bù xǐhuan de gōngzuò.
words.meaning: But often, we have to do some work that we are unwilling to do or even dislike very much.

words.hanzi: 这时，我们最需要的就是对工作的责任心。
words.pinyin: Zhè shí, wǒmen zuì xūyào de jiù shì duì gōngzuò de zérènxīn.
words.meaning: At this time, what we need most is a sense of responsibility for the work.

words.hanzi: 一个人即使能力再高，经验再丰富，如果对工作没有责任心，也很难把工作做好。
words.pinyin: Yí ge rén jíshǐ néngli zài gāo, jīngyàn zài fēngfù, rúguǒ duì gōngzuò méiyǒu zérènxīn, yě hěn nán bǎ gōngzuò zuòhǎo.
words.meaning: Even if a person has high ability and rich experience, if they have no sense of responsibility for their work, it is difficult to do the job well.

words.hanzi: 售货员：小姐，您好！您想买什么家具？需要我为您介绍一下吗？
words.pinyin: Shòuhuòyuán: Xiǎojiě, nín hǎo! Nín xiǎng mǎi shénme jiājù? Xūyào wǒ wèi nín jièshào yíxià ma?
words.meaning: Salesperson: Miss, hello! What furniture would you like to buy? Do you need me to introduce some to you?

words.hanzi: 王静：谢谢，我想买沙发。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Xièxie, wǒ xiǎng mǎi shāfā.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Thank you, I want to buy a sofa.

words.hanzi: 售货员：您看这个沙发怎么样？现在正在打折，比平时便宜了一千块。
words.pinyin: Shòuhuòyuán: Nín kàn zhège shāfā zěnmeyàng? Xiànzài zhèngzài dǎ zhé, bǐ píngshí piányile yìqiān kuài.
words.meaning: Salesperson: How about this sofa? It is on sale now, a thousand yuan cheaper than usual.

words.hanzi: 王静：价格还可以，就是不知道质量有没有保证。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Jiàgé hái kěyǐ, jiùshì bù zhīdào zhìliàng yǒu méiyǒu bǎozhèng.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: The price is okay, but I don't know if the quality is guaranteed.

words.hanzi: 售货员：您放心，质量肯定不“打折”，这种沙发是今年最流行的。有很多种颜色可以选择，您可以看一下。
words.pinyin: Shòuhuòyuán: Nín fàng xīn, zhìliàng kěndìng bù "dǎ zhé", zhè zhǒng shāfā shì jīnnián zuì liúxíng de. Yǒu hěn duō zhǒng yánsè kěyǐ xuǎnzé, nín kěyǐ kàn yíxià.
words.meaning: Salesperson: Don't worry, the quality is definitely not "discounted". This sofa is the most popular this year. There are many colors to choose from, you can take a look.

words.hanzi: 王静：这个蓝色的看起来不错，就要这个吧。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Zhège lánsè de kàn shàngqu búcuò, jiù yào zhège ba.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: This blue one looks good, I'll take this one.

words.hanzi: 王静：咱们家的冰箱太旧了，商场正好打折，我们顺便也买一台吧。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Zánmen jiā de bīngxiāng tài jiù le, shāngchǎng zhènghǎo dǎ zhé, wǒmen shùnbiàn yě mǎi yì tái ba.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Our refrigerator at home is too old. The shopping mall is having a sale, let's buy one while we are at it.

words.hanzi: 李进：今天买的东西太多了。再说，这个月家里已经花了五千多了。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Jīntiān mǎi de dōngxi tài duō le. Zàishuō, zhège yuè jiā lǐ yǐjīng huāle wǔqiān duō le.
words.meaning: Li Jin: We bought too many things today. Besides, the family has already spent over five thousand this month.

words.hanzi: 王静：这么多？你不会是记错了吧？
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Zhème duō? Nǐ bú huì shì jìcuò le ba?
words.meaning: Wang Jing: So much? Did you remember it wrong?

words.hanzi: 李进：没错。上个星期光买沙发就花了二千多。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Méi cuò. Shàng ge xīngqī guāng mǎi shāfā jiù huāle èrqiān duō.
words.meaning: Li Jin: No mistake. Just buying the sofa last week cost over two thousand.

words.hanzi: 王静：但是咱们家的冰箱实在太旧了，制冷效果也不太好了，还是买个新的吧。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Dànshì zánmen jiā de bīngxiāng shízài tài jiù le, zhìlěng xiàoguǒ yě bú tài hǎo le, háishì mǎi ge xīn de ba.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: But our refrigerator is really too old, and the cooling effect is not very good. Let's buy a new one.

words.hanzi: 李进：那好吧，我带的现金不够，用你的信用卡吧。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Nà hǎo ba, wǒ dài de xiànjīn bú gòu, yòng nǐ de xìnyòngkǎ ba.
words.meaning: Li Jin: All right then. I didn't bring enough cash, use your credit card.

words.hanzi: 李进：李老师邀请咱们去他家做客，给他带点儿什么礼物好呢？
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Lǐ lǎoshī yāoqǐng zánmen qù tā jiā zuò kè, gěi tā dài diǎnr shénme lǐwù hǎo ne?
words.meaning: Li Jin: Teacher Li invited us to his house as guests. What gift should we bring him?

words.hanzi: 王静：他很喜欢葡萄酒，我们就给他买两瓶葡萄酒吧。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Tā hěn xǐhuan pútáojiǔ, wǒmen jiù gěi tā mǎi liǎng píng pútáojiǔ ba.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: He likes wine very much, so let's buy him two bottles of wine.

words.hanzi: 李进：可是这里有这么多中，你知道哪种好吗？
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Kěshì zhèlǐ yǒu zhème duō zhǒng, nǐ zhīdào nǎ zhǒng hǎo ma?
words.meaning: Li Jin: But there are so many kinds here, do you know which one is good?

words.hanzi: 王静：我觉得这种不错，你看它酒瓶做得都这么艺术。而且电视上经常有它的广告，我想味道应该不错。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Wǒ juéde zhè zhǒng búcuò, nǐ kàn tā jiǔpíng zuò de dōu zhème yìshù. Érqiě diànshì shang jīngcháng yǒu tā de guǎnggào, wǒ xiǎng wèidào yīnggāi búcuò.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: I think this one is good. Look how artistic the bottle is. And there are often advertisements for it on TV, so I think the taste should be good.

words.hanzi: 李进：广告只会介绍优点，却不会说它的缺点。实际上，很多东西并不像广告上说的那么好，所以不能完全相信广告。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Guǎnggào zhǐ huì jièshào yōudiǎn, què bú huì shuō tā de quēdiǎn. Shíjìshang, hěn duō dōngxi bìng bú xiàng guǎnggào shang shuō de nàme hǎo, suǒyǐ bù néng wánquán xiāngxìn guǎnggào.
words.meaning: Li Jin: Advertisements only introduce the merits, but never talk about the shortcomings. In fact, many things are not as good as the advertisements say, so you can't completely trust advertisements.

words.hanzi: 王静：你说得也对。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Nǐ shuō de yě duì.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: You are right too.

words.hanzi: 买衣服只考虑价格当然不好，但是只考虑买好看的也不一定对。
words.pinyin: Mǎi yīfu zhǐ kǎolǜ jiàgé dāngrán bù hǎo, dànshì zhǐ kǎolǜ mǎi hǎokàn de yě bù yídìng duì.
words.meaning: Considering only the price when buying clothes is certainly not good, but considering only looks is not necessarily right either.

words.hanzi: 我买衣服的标准是“只买对的，不买贵的”。
words.pinyin: Wǒ mǎi yīfu de biāozhǔn shì "zhǐ mǎi duì de, bù mǎi guì de".
words.meaning: My standard for buying clothes is "buy the right ones, not the expensive ones".

words.hanzi: 第一，自己穿着舒服；第二，衣服的质量要好，而且又不能太贵。
words.pinyin: Dì yī, zìjǐ chuānzhe shūfu; dì èr, yīfu de zhìliàng yào hǎo, érqiě yòu bù néng tài guì.
words.meaning: First, it must be comfortable to wear; second, the quality of the clothes must be good, and it shouldn't be too expensive.

words.hanzi: 对我来说，衣服的样子流行不流行并不是很重要。
words.pinyin: Duì wǒ lái shuō, yīfu de yàngzi liúxíng bu liúxíng bìng bú shì hěn zhòngyào.
words.meaning: For me, whether the style of the clothes is popular or not is not very important.

words.hanzi: 很多年龄大的人喜欢在打折的时候买便宜的衣服，但对那些衣服是不是适合自己却考虑得不多。
words.pinyin: Hěn duō niánlíng dà de rén xǐhuan zài dǎ zhé de shíhou mǎi piányi de yīfu, dàn duì nàxiē yīfu shì bú shì shìhé zìjǐ què kǎolǜ de bù duō.
words.meaning: Many older people like to buy cheap clothes when they are on sale, but they don't consider much whether those clothes suit them.

words.hanzi: 这点是我理解不了的，因为如果不适合自己，即使花钱很少，也是一种浪费。
words.pinyin: Zhè diǎn shì wǒ lǐjiě bù liǎo de, yīnwèi rúguǒ bú shìhé zìjǐ, jíshǐ huā qián hěn shǎo, yě shì yì zhǒng làngfèi.
words.meaning: This is something I cannot understand, because if it doesn't suit you, even if you spend very little money, it is still a waste.

words.hanzi: 现在网上购物变得越来越流行了，年轻人尤其喜欢在网上买东西。
words.pinyin: Xiànzài wǎng shang gòu wù biàn de yuè lái yuè liúxíng le, niánqīng rén yóuqí xǐhuan zài wǎng shang mǎi dōngxi.
words.meaning: Nowadays online shopping is becoming more and more popular, and young people especially like to buy things online.

words.hanzi: 在网上几乎什么都可以买到，你可以上网买书、买衣服、买包，还可以买家具、买手机。
words.pinyin: Zài wǎng shang jīhū shénme dōu kěyǐ mǎidào, nǐ kěyǐ shàng wǎng mǎi shū, mǎi yīfu, mǎi bāo, hái kěyǐ mǎi jiājù, mǎi shǒujī.
words.meaning: You can buy almost anything online. You can go online to buy books, clothes, bags, and also furniture and mobile phones.

words.hanzi: 网上购物能够受到人们的喜爱，原因主要有两个：
words.pinyin: Wǎng shang gòu wù nénggòu shòudào rénmen de xǐ'ài, yuányīn zhǔyào yǒu liǎng ge:
words.meaning: There are two main reasons why online shopping is loved by people:

words.hanzi: 首先，网上的东西很多，而且比去商店买便宜，这是吸引人们购买的主要原因。
words.pinyin: Shǒuxiàn, wǎng shang de dōngxi hěn duō, érqiě bǐ qù shāngdiàn mǎi piányi, zhè shì xīyǐn rénmen gòumǎi de zhǔyào yuányīn.
words.meaning: First, there are many things online, and they are cheaper than buying in stores. This is the main reason attracting people to buy.

words.hanzi: 其次，人们可以在任何时间上网购买自己喜欢的东西，卖家可以把你买的东西寄到你办公室或者家里，非常方便。
words.pinyin: Qícì, rénmen kěyǐ zài rènhé shíjiān shàng wǎng gòumǎi zìjǐ xǐhuan de dōngxi, màijiā kěyǐ bǎ nǐ mǎi de dōngxi jìdào nǐ bàngōngshì huòzhě jiā lǐ, fēicháng fāngbiàn.
words.meaning: Secondly, people can go online to buy things they like at any time, and the seller can mail the things you bought to your office or home, which is very convenient.

6.title: 一分钱一分货
6.title_pinyin: yī fēn qián yī fēn huò
6.title_meaning: You get what you pay for

words.hanzi: 张远：昨天晚上我给你打电话一直没人接，你忙什么呢？
words.pinyin: Zhāng Yuǎn: Zuótiān wǎnshang wǒ gěi nǐ dǎ diànhuà yìzhí méi rén jiē, nǐ máng shénme ne?
words.meaning: Zhang Yuan: I called you last night but no one answered. What were you busy with?

words.hanzi: 李进：昨天妻子让我陪她去超市买果汁，我把手机忘在家里了。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Zuótiān qīzi ràng wǒ péi tā qù chāoshì mǎi guǒzhī. Wǒ bǎ shǒujī wàng zài jiā lǐ le.
words.meaning: Li Jin: Yesterday my wife asked me to accompany her to the supermarket to buy fruit juice. I left my mobile phone at home.

words.hanzi: 张远：买这么点儿东西也用不了那么长时间啊！
words.pinyin: Zhāng Yuǎn: Mǎi zhème diǎnr dōngxi yě yòng bu liǎo nàme cháng shíjiān a!
words.meaning: Zhang Yuan: Buying so few things shouldn't take that long!

words.hanzi: 李进：我们先去逛了会儿商场。一进门，售货员就热情地为我们介绍这、介绍那，她买了一条裤子、一件衬衫、两双袜子，然后我们就高高兴兴地回家了。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Wǒmen xiān qù guàngle huìr shāngchǎng. Yí jìn mén, shòuhuòyuán jiù rèqíng de wèi wǒmen jièshào zhè, jièshào nà, tā mǎile yì tiáo kùzi, yí jiàn chènshān, liǎng shuāng wàzi, ránhòu wǒmen jiù gāogāoxìngxìng de huí jiā le.
words.meaning: Li Jin: We went to the mall first. As soon as we entered, the salesperson enthusiastically introduced this and that to us. She bought a pair of trousers, a shirt, and two pairs of socks, and then we went home happily.

words.hanzi: 张远：买东西时我只看自己想买的，而且喜欢自己看、自己选，不希望被别人打扰。
words.pinyin: Zhāng Yuǎn: Mǎi dōngxi shí wǒ zhǐ kàn zìjǐ xiǎng mǎi de, érqiě xǐhuan zìjǐ kàn, zìjǐ xuǎn, bù xīwàng bèi biéren dǎrǎo.
words.meaning: Zhang Yuan: When buying things, I only look at what I want to buy, and I like to look and choose by myself. I don't want to be disturbed by others.

words.hanzi: 李进：是啊！回家以后，我才发现，竟然忘了去商场的超市买果汁！
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Shì a! Huí jiā yǐhòu, wǒ cái fāxiàn, jìngrán wàngle qù shāngchǎng de chāoshì mǎi guǒzhī!
words.meaning: Li Jin: Yeah! After returning home, I realized that I unexpectedly forgot to go to the supermarket in the mall to buy fruit juice!

words.hanzi: 王静：西红柿新鲜吗？怎么卖？
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Xīhóngshì xīnxiān ma? Zěnme mài?
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Are the tomatoes fresh? How much are they?

words.hanzi: 售货员：七块钱一斤，您放心，保证百分之百新鲜。
words.pinyin: Shòuhuòyuán: Qī kuài qián yì jīn, nín fàng xīn, bǎozhèng bǎi fēn zhī bǎi xīnxiān.
words.meaning: Salesperson: Seven yuan per jin. Don't worry, guaranteed 100% fresh.

words.hanzi: 王静：怎么这么贵啊！我记得昨天才三块五一斤，今天的价格是昨天的两倍。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Zěnme zhème guì a! Wǒ jìde zuótiān cái sān kuài wǔ yì jīn, jīntiān de jiàgé shì zuótiān de liǎng bèi.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Why so expensive! I remember it was only 3.5 per jin yesterday. Today's price is double yesterday's.

words.hanzi: 售货员：您问的这种是“绿色”的。一分钱一分货。每天吃一两个这种新鲜的西红柿，对皮肤有好处。
words.pinyin: Shòuhuòyuán: Nín wèn de zhè zhǒng shì "lǜsè" de. Yì fēn qián yì fēn huò. Měi tiān chī yì liǎng ge zhè zhǒng xīnxiān de xīhóngshì, duì pífū yǒu hǎochu.
words.meaning: Salesperson: The kind you asked about is "green" (organic). You get what you pay for. Eating one or two of these fresh tomatoes every day is good for the skin.

words.hanzi: 王静：好，那我先买几个尝尝。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Hǎo, nà wǒ xiān mǎi jǐ ge chángchang.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Okay, I'll buy a few to taste first.

words.hanzi: 售货员：好的，给您西红柿，一共两斤，十四块。
words.pinyin: Shòuhuòyuán: Hǎo de, gěi nín xīhóngshì, yígòng liǎng jīn, shísì kuài.
words.meaning: Salesperson: Okay, here are your tomatoes, two jin in total, fourteen yuan.

words.hanzi: 售货员：先生，我们店的行李箱都在这里，请问您要什么样的？
words.pinyin: Shòuhuòyuán: Xiānsheng, wǒmen diàn de xínglixiāng dōu zài zhèlǐ, qǐngwèn nín yào shénme yàng de?
words.meaning: Salesperson: Sir, all the suitcases in our store are here. What kind would you like?

words.hanzi: 李进：我想买一个轻一点儿的。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Wǒ xiǎng mǎi yí ge qīng yìdiǎnr de.
words.meaning: Li Jin: I want to buy a lighter one.

words.hanzi: 售货员：您看看这个，不管从价格方面看，还是从质量上看，都是值得考虑的。
words.pinyin: Shòuhuòyuán: Nín kànkan zhège, bùguǎn cóng jiàgé fāngmiàn kàn, háishi cóng zhìliàng shang kàn, dōu shì zhídé kǎolǜ de.
words.meaning: Salesperson: Take a look at this one. Whether viewed from the aspect of price or quality, it is worth considering.

words.hanzi: 李进：质量是不错。请问这个多少钱？
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Zhìliàng shì búcuò. Qǐngwèn zhège duōshao qián?
words.meaning: Li Jin: The quality is not bad. How much is this?

words.hanzi: 售货员：现在我们商场正好有打折活动，打完折是九百九十九。另外，一年内我们都负责免费修理。
words.pinyin: Shòuhuòyuán: Xiànzài wǒmen shāngchǎng zhènghǎo yǒu dǎ zhé huódòng, dǎwán zhé shì jiǔbǎi jiǔshí jiǔ. Lìngwài, yì nián nèi wǒmen dōu fùzé miǎn fèi xiūlǐ.
words.meaning: Salesperson: Our mall is having a discount event right now. After the discount, it is 999. In addition, we are responsible for free repairs within one year.

words.hanzi: 李进：你们的服务不错，价格也可以，就买这个吧。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Nǐmen de fúwù búcuò, jiàgé yě kěyǐ, jiù mǎi zhège ba.
words.meaning: Li Jin: Your service is good, and the price is okay. I'll buy this one.

words.hanzi: 顾客朋友们，为了感谢大家的支持，我们书店今天举行“购书送好礼”活动。
words.pinyin: Gùkè péngyoumen, wèile gǎnxiè dàjiā de zhīchí, wǒmen shūdiàn jīntiān jǔxíng "Gòu shū sòng hǎo lǐ" huódòng.
words.meaning: Customer friends, to thank everyone for your support, our bookstore is holding a "Buy books, get good gifts" event today.

words.hanzi: 购书满一百元送一个笔记本，满二百元送一本词典。
words.pinyin: Gòu shū mǎn yìbǎi yuán sòng yí ge bǐjìběn, mǎn èrbǎi yuán sòng yì běn cídiǎn.
words.meaning: Buy books over 100 yuan and get a notebook; over 200 yuan and get a dictionary.

words.hanzi: 另外，一些图书还有打折活动，其中，小说七五折，地图八折，留学考试用书六折。
words.pinyin: Lìngwài, yìxiē túshū hái yǒu dǎ zhé huódòng, qízhōng, xiǎoshuō qīwǔ zhé, dìtú bā zhé, liúxué kǎoshì yòngshū liù zhé.
words.meaning: In addition, there are discounts on some books: novels 25% off, maps 20% off, and study abroad exam books 40% off.

words.hanzi: 如果购书满五百元可免费办会员卡，以后购书可打八折。
words.pinyin: Rúguǒ gòu shū mǎn wǔbǎi yuán kě miǎn fèi bàn huìyuánkǎ, yǐhòu gòu shū kě dǎ bā zhé.
words.meaning: If you buy books over 500 yuan, you can get a free membership card, and you can get a 20% discount on future purchases.

words.hanzi: 今天过生日的朋友和所有的小朋友还可以获得一份小礼物。欢迎大家选购！
words.pinyin: Jīntiān guò shēngrì de péngyou hé suǒyǒu de xiǎopéngyou hái kěyǐ huòdé yí fèn xiǎo lǐwù. Huānyíng dàjiā xuǎngòu!
words.meaning: Friends celebrating their birthday today and all children can also get a small gift. Welcome to choose and buy!

words.hanzi: 人们常说“一分钱一分货”，意思是东西的质量和价格有很大的关系，也可以说“便宜没好货，好货不便宜”。
words.pinyin: Rénmen cháng shuō "yì fēn qián yì fēn huò", yìsi shì dōngxi de zhìliàng hé jiàgé yǒu hěn dà de guānxi, yě kěyǐ shuō "piányi méi hǎo huò, hǎo huò bù piányi".
words.meaning: People often say "you get what you pay for", meaning that the quality of things has a great relationship with the price. It can also be said "cheap things are not good, good things are not cheap".

words.hanzi: 一般情况下，你花的钱越多，买的东西也就越好。
words.pinyin: Yìbān qíngkuàng xià, nǐ huā de qián yuè duō, mǎi de dōngxi yě jiù yuè hǎo.
words.meaning: Generally speaking, the more money you spend, the better the things you buy.

words.hanzi: 其实也不一定都是这样的。
words.pinyin: Qíshí yě bù yídìng dōu shì zhèyàng de.
words.meaning: Actually, it is not always like this.

words.hanzi: 有的时候，质量很好的东西也会很便宜。
words.pinyin: Yǒu de shíhou, zhìliàng hěn hǎo de dōngxi yě huì hěn piányi.
words.meaning: Sometimes, very good quality things can also be very cheap.

words.hanzi: 例如，春天来了，冬天的衣服就会打折，质量很好，还很便宜，花很少的钱就可以买到。
words.pinyin: Lìrú, chūntiān lái le, dōngtiān de yīfu jiù huì dǎ zhé, zhìliàng hěn hǎo, hái hěn piányi, huā hěn shǎo de qián jiù kěyǐ mǎidào.
words.meaning: For example, when spring comes, winter clothes will be on sale. The quality is very good and they are very cheap; you can buy them with very little money.

words.hanzi: 一到节日，商场也会举办各种各样的活动，降低价格，这个时候我们也可以买到又便宜又好的东西。
words.pinyin: Yí dào jiérì, shāngchǎng yě huì jǔbàn gè zhǒng gè yàng de huódòng, jiàngdī jiàgé, zhège shíhou wǒmen yě kěyǐ mǎidào yòu piányi yòu hǎo de dōngxi.
words.meaning: Once a holiday arrives, shopping malls will also hold various activities to lower prices. At this time, we can also buy things that are both cheap and good.

7.title: 最好的医生是自己
7.title_pinyin: zuì hǎo de yī shēng shì zì jǐ

words.hanzi: 小李：你的鼻子怎么流血了？快用纸擦擦。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Nǐ de bízi zěnme liú xiě le? Kuài yòng zhǐ cāca.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: Why is your nose bleeding? Use paper to wipe it quickly.

words.hanzi: 小林：我还不太适应北方的气候，估计是天气太干。今天天气不是很冷，你怎么穿这么多？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Wǒ hái bú tài shìyìng běifāng de qìhòu, gūjì shì tiānqì tài gān. Jīntiān tiānqì bú shì hěn lěng, nǐ zěnme chuān zhème duō?
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: I am not quite used to the climate in the north yet; I reckon the weather is too dry. It is not very cold today, why are you wearing so much?

words.hanzi: 小李：就是因为昨天穿得太少，我都感冒了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Jiù shì yīnwèi zuótiān chuān de tài shǎo, wǒ dōu gǎnmào le.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: It's because I wore too little yesterday that I caught a cold.

words.hanzi: 小林：最近感冒的人特别多。你去看医生了吗？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Zuìjìn gǎnmào de rén tèbié duō. Nǐ qù kàn yīshēng le ma?
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: There are especially many people catching colds recently. Did you go to see a doctor?

words.hanzi: 小李：没有，我只是咳嗽，有点儿头疼，不严重，多喝点儿水就好了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Méiyǒu, wǒ zhǐ shì késou, yǒudiǎnr tóu téng, bù yánzhòng, duō hē diǎnr shuǐ jiù hǎo le.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: No, I just have a cough and a slight headache. It's not serious. Drinking more water will fix it.

words.hanzi: 小林：春天天气时冷时热，特别容易感冒。这时候一定要多注意保暖，另外，最好经常打开窗户换换空气。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Chūntiān tiānqì shí lěng shí rè, tèbié róngyì gǎnmào. Zhè shíhou yídìng yào duō zhùyì bǎo nuǎn, lìngwài, zuìhǎo jīngcháng dǎkāi chuānghu huànhuan kōngqì.
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: The weather in spring is cold one moment and hot the next, making it very easy to catch a cold. You must pay attention to keeping warm at this time. Besides, it's best to open the windows often to change the air.

words.hanzi: 小夏：你咳嗽好点儿了吗？医生怎么说的？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Nǐ késou hǎo diǎnr le ma? Yīshēng zěnme shuō de?
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: Is your cough better? What did the doctor say?

words.hanzi: 小雨：还是老样子，他让我以后不要再抽烟了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Háishì lǎo yàngzi, tā ràng wǒ yǐhòu bú yào zài chōu yān le.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: It's still the same. He told me not to smoke anymore in the future.

words.hanzi: 小夏：抽烟对身体一点儿好处也没有。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Chōu yān duì shēntǐ yìdiǎnr hǎochu yě méiyǒu.
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: Smoking has no benefit to the body at all.

words.hanzi: 小雨：我也知道，可是我觉得抽烟这个动作看上去很帅。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Wǒ yě zhīdào, kěshì wǒ juéde chōu yān zhège dòngzuò kàn shàngqu hěn shuài.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: I know, but I think the action of smoking looks very cool.

words.hanzi: 小夏：等你身体出现问题了，后悔就来不及了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Děng nǐ shēntǐ chūxiàn wèntí le, hòuhuǐ jiù láibují le.
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: When health problems appear, it will be too late to regret.

words.hanzi: 小雨：其实家人也一直反对我抽烟，我自己却觉得没什么。但最近总是咳嗽，所以我有些担心了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Qíshí jiārén yě yìzhí fǎnduì wǒ chōu yān, wǒ zìjǐ què juéde méi shénme. Dàn zuìjìn zǒngshì késou, suǒyǐ wǒ yǒuxiē dān xīn le.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: Actually, my family has always opposed my smoking, but I didn't think it was a big deal. But I've been coughing all the time recently, so I'm a bit worried.

words.hanzi: 小夏：抽烟不仅对自己没好处，还会影响周围人的身体健康。为了你和你的家人，别再抽了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Chōu yān bùjǐn duì zìjǐ méi hǎochu, hái huì yǐngxiǎng zhōuwéi rén de shēntǐ jiànkāng. Wèile nǐ hé nǐ de jiārén, bié zài chōu le.
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: Smoking is not only bad for you, but also affects the health of people around you. For you and your family, don't smoke anymore.

words.hanzi: 小李：我最近眼睛总是跳，大夫说是因我长时间看电脑，眼睛太累。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Wǒ zuìjìn yǎnjing zǒngshì tiào, dàifu shuō shì yīnwèi wǒ cháng shíjiān kàn diànnǎo, yǎnjing tài lèi.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: My eyes have been twitching recently. The doctor said it is because I look at the computer for a long time and my eyes are too tired.

words.hanzi: 小林：长时间坐在电脑前面工作，眼睛很容易累。最好是每过一小时就休息休息，然后再开始工作。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Cháng shíjiān zuò zài diànnǎo qiánmian gōngzuò, yǎnjing hěn róngyì lèi. Zuìhǎo shì měi guò yì xiǎoshí jiù xiūxi xiūxi, ránhòu zài kāishǐ gōngzuò.
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: Working in front of the computer for a long time makes eyes easily tired. It is best to rest every hour and then start working again.

words.hanzi: 小李：医生也这么说，他还告诉我多向远处看看，尤其是多看看绿色的植物。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Yīshēng yě zhème shuō, tā hái gàosu wǒ yào duō xiàng yuǎn chù kànkan, yóuqí shì duō kànkan lǜsè de zhíwù.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: The doctor said so too. He also told me to look into the distance more, especially to look at green plants more.

words.hanzi: 小林：长时间对着电脑不仅对眼睛不好，身体也会不舒服。研究发现，如果人一天静坐超过六小时，就会影响身体健康。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Cháng shíjiān duìzhe diànnǎo bùjǐn duì yǎnjing bù hǎo, shēntǐ yě huì bù shūfu. Yánjiū fāxiàn, rúguǒ rén yì tiān jìng zuò chāoguò liù xiǎoshí, jiù huì yǐngxiǎng shēntǐ jiànkāng.
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: Facing the computer for a long time is not only bad for the eyes, but the body will also be uncomfortable. Research has found that if a person sits still for more than six hours a day, it will affect their health.

words.hanzi: 小李：是啊！像咱们这些久坐办公室的人要注意，有时间应该多站起来活动活动。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Shì a! Xiàng zánmen zhèxiē jiǔ zuò bàngōngshì de rén yào zhùyì, yǒu shíjiān yīnggāi duō zhàn qǐlái huódòng huódòng.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: Yes! People like us who sit in the office for a long time should pay attention and should stand up and move around more when we have time.

words.hanzi: 小林：好，咱们午饭后就去附近的公园散散步吧。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Hǎo, zánmen wǔfàn hòu jiù qù fùjìn de gōngyuán sànsan bù ba.
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: Okay, let's go for a walk in the nearby park after lunch.

words.hanzi: 每个人都希望自己健康，那么什么才是健康呢？
words.pinyin: Měi ge rén dōu xīwàng zìjǐ jiànkāng, nàme shénme cái shì jiànkāng ne?
words.meaning: Everyone hopes to be healthy, so what exactly is health?

words.hanzi: 过去，人们认为健康就是指身体不生病。
words.pinyin: Guòqù, rénmen rènwéi jiànkāng jiù shì zhǐ shēntǐ bù shēng bìng.
words.meaning: In the past, people thought health meant not getting sick physically.

words.hanzi: 但是，现在人们认识到，健康还指精神上的健康。
words.pinyin: Dànshì, xiànzài rénmen rènshi dào, jiànkāng hái zhǐ jīngshén shang de jiànkāng.
words.meaning: However, now people realize that health also refers to mental health.

words.hanzi: 只有身体和精神都健康，才算是真正的健康。
words.pinyin: Zhǐyǒu shēntǐ hé jīngshén dōu jiànkāng, cái suàn shì zhēnzhèng de jiànkāng.
words.meaning: Only when both body and mind are healthy can it be considered true health.

words.hanzi: 有一位教授用数字来说明健康有多么重要：
words.pinyin: Yǒu yí wèi jiàoshòu yòng shùzì lái shuōmíng jiànkāng yǒu duōme zhòngyào:
words.meaning: A professor used numbers to explain how important health is:

words.hanzi: 要是健康是一，其他都是一后面的零；如果没一，不管有多少零也没用。
words.pinyin: Yàoshi jiànkāng shì yī, qítā dōu shì yī hòumiàn de líng; rúguǒ méiyǒu yī, bùguǎn yǒu duōshao líng yě méi yòng.
words.meaning: If health is "1", everything else is the "0" after the "1"; if there is no "1", no matter how many "0"s there are, it is useless.

words.hanzi: 所以我们平时一定要注意锻炼，别等健康出问题了才后悔。
words.pinyin: Suǒyǐ wǒmen píngshí yídìng yào zhùyì duànliàn, bié děng jiànkāng chū wèntí le cái hòuhuǐ.
words.meaning: So we must pay attention to exercise in normal times, don't wait until health problems arise to regret.

words.hanzi: 我听一位医生说过一句话：“最好的医生是自己，最好的药是时间，最好的运动是散步。”
words.pinyin: Wǒ tīng yí wèi yīshēng shuōguo yí jù huà: "Zuì hǎo de yīshēng shì zìjǐ, zuì hǎo de yào shì shíjiān, zuì hǎo de yùndòng shì sàn bù."
words.meaning: I heard a doctor say a sentence: "The best doctor is yourself, the best medicine is time, and the best exercise is walking."

words.hanzi: 前两条我理解得不深，最后一条我完全同意。
words.pinyin: Qián liǎng tiáo wǒ lǐjiě de bù shēn, zuìhòu yì tiáo wǒ wánquán tóngyì.
words.meaning: I don't understand the first two very deeply, but I completely agree with the last one.

words.hanzi: 散步是生活中最简单的锻炼方法，既可以活动身体，又可以减肥，而且不会像跑步那样辛苦。
words.pinyin: Sàn bù shì shēnghuó zhōng zuì jiǎndān de duànliàn fāngfǎ, jì kěyǐ huódòng shēntǐ, yòu kěyǐ jiǎn féi, érqiě bú huì xiàng pǎobù nàyàng xīnkǔ.
words.meaning: Walking is the simplest exercise method in life. It can exercise the body and help lose weight, and it is not as exhausting as running.

words.hanzi: 晚饭后，一家人一起出去散散步，是一件很幸福的事情。
words.pinyin: Wǎnfàn hòu, yì jiā rén yìqǐ chūqù sànsan bù, shì yí jiàn hěn xìngfú de shìqing.
words.meaning: After dinner, the whole family going out for a walk together is a very happy thing.

words.hanzi: 肚子吃饱了需要活动，家人忙了一天需要交流，夫妻说说一天的工作能加深感情，听孩子谈谈学校里有趣的事，一天的烦恼就都跑掉了。
words.pinyin: Dùzi chībǎo le xūyào huódòng, jiārén mángle yì tiān xūyào jiāoliú, fūqī shuōshuo yì tiān de gōngzuò néng jiāshēn gǎnqíng, tīng háizi tántan xuéxiào lǐ yǒu yìsi de shì, yì tiān de fánnǎo jiù dōu pǎodiào le.
words.meaning: The stomach needs activity after being full, family members need to communicate after a busy day. Husband and wife talking about the day's work can deepen their affection, and listening to the child talk about interesting things at school makes the day's troubles run away.

8.title: 生活中不缺少美
8.title_pinyin: shēng huó zhōng bù quē shǎo měi
8.title_meaning: There is no shortage of beauty in life

words.hanzi: 李老师：这种巧克力味道不错，你在哪儿买的？
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Zhè zhǒng qiǎokèlì wèidào búcuò, nǐ zài nǎr mǎi de?
words.meaning: Teacher Li: This chocolate tastes good, where did you buy it?

words.hanzi: 高老师：不是我买的，是我女儿给我从国外带回来的礼物。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Bú shì wǒ mǎi de, shì wǒ nǚ'ér gěi wǒ cóng guówài dài huílái de lǐwù.
words.meaning: Teacher Gao: I didn't buy it, it was a gift my daughter brought back for me from abroad.

words.hanzi: 李老师：很多人出国后常常会买外国的巧克力，回来送给亲戚朋友。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Hěn duō rén chū guó hòu chángcháng huì mǎi wàiguó de qiǎokèlì, huílái sònggěi qīnqi péngyou.
words.meaning: Teacher Li: Many people often buy foreign chocolate after going abroad to give to relatives and friends when they return.

words.hanzi: 高老师：是啊，因为很多人都爱吃巧克力，尤其是女性。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Shì a, yīnwèi hěn duō rén dōu ài chī qiǎokèlì, yóuqí shì nǚxìng.
words.meaning: Teacher Gao: Yes, because many people love eating chocolate, especially women.

words.hanzi: 李老师：这是为什么呢？
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Zhè shì wèishénme ne?
words.meaning: Teacher Li: Why is that?

words.hanzi: 高老师：巧克力大多是甜的，而很多女性都喜欢吃甜的。而且，听说伤心难过的时候吃块儿巧克力，还能使人的心情变得愉快。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Qiǎokèlì dàduō shì tián de, ér hěn duō nǚxìng dōu xǐhuan chī tián de. Érqiě, tīngshuō shāng xīn nánguò de shíhou chī kuàir qiǎokèlì, hái néng shǐ rén de xīnqíng biàn de yúkuài.
words.meaning: Teacher Gao: Chocolates are mostly sweet, and many women like eating sweet things. Also, it is said that eating a piece of chocolate when you are sad or upset can make your mood become happy.

words.hanzi: 小夏：这里的景色真美，空气也好。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Zhèlǐ de jǐngsè zhēn měi, kōngqì yě hǎo.
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: The scenery here is truly beautiful, and the air is good too.

words.hanzi: 马克：怎么样，心情好些了吗？
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Zěnmeyàng, xīnqíng hǎoxiē le ma?
words.meaning: Mark: How is it, is your mood a bit better?

words.hanzi: 小夏：好多了，上次足球比赛后，好久都没这么放松了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Hǎoduō le, shàng cì zúqiú bǐsài hòu, hǎojiǔ dōu méi zhème fàngsōng le.
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: Much better. Since the last football match, I haven't been this relaxed for a long time.

words.hanzi: 马克：你不要有压力，好好儿准备下次比赛就好了。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Nǐ búyào yǒu yālì, hǎohāor zhǔnbèi xià cì bǐsài jiù hǎo le.
words.meaning: Mark: Don't have pressure, just prepare well for the next match and it will be fine.

words.hanzi: 小夏：这段时间我总是一个人坐在房间里回忆那次比赛。如果我们能再努力一点儿，就一定会多进一个球。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Zhè duàn shíjiān wǒ zǒngshì yí ge rén zuò zài fángjiān lǐ huíyì nà cì bǐsài. Rúguǒ wǒmen néng zài nǔlì yìdiǎnr, jiù yídìng huì duō jìn yí ge qiú.
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: During this time I always sit alone in my room recalling that match. If we could have tried a little harder, we definitely would have scored one more goal.

words.hanzi: 马克：事情已经发生了，过去的就让它成为过去吧。只要这次你好好儿准备，一定能把比赛踢好。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Shìqing yǐjīng fāshēng le, guòqù de jiù ràng tā chéngwéi guòqù ba. Zhǐyào zhè cì nǐ hǎohāor zhǔnbèi, yídìng néng bǎ bǐsài tīhǎo.
words.meaning: Mark: The thing has already happened, let the past be the past. As long as you prepare well this time, you will definitely play well.

words.hanzi: 马克：师傅，我去大使馆，你是不是走错了？
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Shīfu, wǒ qù dàshǐguǎn, nǐ shì bú shì zǒucuò le?
words.meaning: Mark: Sir (Driver), I am going to the embassy, did you go the wrong way?

words.hanzi: 师傅：现在是上班时间，前面有点儿堵车，我们走另外一条路，距离差不多。
words.pinyin: Shīfu: Xiànzài shì shàng bān shíjiān, qiánmian yǒudiǎnr dǔ chē, wǒmen zǒu lìngwài yì tiáo lù, jùlí chàbuduō.
words.meaning: Driver: It is rush hour (work time) now, there is a bit of a traffic jam ahead. We are taking another road, the distance is about the same.

words.hanzi: 马克：那就好，堵车浪费时间，遇到堵车，心情也“堵”。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Nà jiù hǎo, dǔ chē làngfèi shíjiān, yùdào dǔ chē, xīnqíng yě “dǔ”.
words.meaning: Mark: That's good. Traffic jams waste time. When encountering a traffic jam, one's mood also gets "jammed".

words.hanzi: 师傅：可不是！上班堵车怕迟到，下班堵车怕回家晚。每天在马路上开车，要想不遇到堵车，还真难。
words.pinyin: Shīfu: Kěbúshì! Shàng bān dǔ chē pà chídào, xià bān dǔ chē pà huí jiā wǎn. Měi tiān zài mǎlù shang kāi chē, yào xiǎng bù yùdào dǔ chē, hái zhēn nán.
words.meaning: Driver: Exactly! Traffic jams on the way to work make you fear being late; traffic jams on the way home make you fear arriving late. Driving on the road every day, it is really hard to avoid traffic jams.

words.hanzi: 马克：一遇到堵车，人们就容易变得没有耐心。长期这样，还会影响脾气甚至性格。但是您的心情为什么这么好呢？
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Yí yùdào dǔ chē, rénmen jiù róngyì biànde méiyǒu nàixīn. Chángqī zhèyàng, hái huì yǐngxiǎng píqi shènzhì xìnggé. Dànshì nín de xīnqíng wèishénme zhème hǎo ne?
words.meaning: Mark: Once in a traffic jam, people easily become impatient. Being like this for a long time will affect temper and even personality. But why is your mood so good?

words.hanzi: 师傅：我们改变不了堵车，但是可以试着改变自己的心情。堵车时正好可以休息一下，还可以听听自己喜欢的音乐。
words.pinyin: Shīfu: Wǒmen gǎibiàn bù liǎo dǔ chē, dànshì kěyǐ shìzhe gǎibiàn zìjǐ de xīnqíng. Dǔ chē shí zhènghǎo kěyǐ xiūxi yíxià, hái kěyǐ tīngting zìjǐ xǐhuan de yīnyuè.
words.meaning: Driver: We cannot change the traffic jam, but we can try to change our own mood. During a traffic jam, we can take a rest and listen to our favorite music.

words.hanzi: 草绿了，那是生命的颜色；花开了，那是大自然的礼物。
words.pinyin: Cǎo lǜ le, nà shì shēngmìng de yánsè; huā kāi le, nà shì dàzìrán de lǐwù.
words.meaning: The grass has turned green, that is the color of life; the flowers have bloomed, that is the gift of nature.

words.hanzi: 生活中不缺少美，缺少的是发现美的眼睛。
words.pinyin: Shēnghuó zhōng bù quēshǎo měi, quēshǎo de shì fāxiàn měi de yǎnjing.
words.meaning: Life does not lack beauty; what is lacking are eyes that discover beauty.

words.hanzi: 只要有心，生活中的美到处都是。
words.pinyin: Zhǐyào yǒuxīn, shēnghuó zhōng de měi dàochù dōu shì.
words.meaning: As long as you have the heart (are attentive), beauty in life is everywhere.

words.hanzi: 生活的态度要自己选择，因此，遇到烦恼时，你应该想一些办法让自己从不高兴的心情中走出来。
words.pinyin: Shēnghuó de tàidu yào zìjǐ xuǎnzé, yīncǐ, yùdào fánnǎo shí, nǐ yīnggāi xiǎng yìxiē bànfǎ ràng zìjǐ cóng bù gāoxìng de xīnqíng zhōng zǒu chūlái.
words.meaning: You must choose your attitude towards life yourself; therefore, when encountering troubles, you should think of ways to walk out of your unhappy mood.

words.hanzi: 窗外是什么样子，我们无法改变，但我们可以选择站在哪个窗户前。
words.pinyin: Chuāng wài shì shénme yàngzi, wǒmen wúfǎ gǎibiàn, dàn wǒmen kěyǐ xuǎnzé zhàn zài nǎ ge chuānghu qián.
words.meaning: We cannot change what it looks like outside the window, but we can choose which window to stand before.

words.hanzi: 选择一个能够带给我们快乐的窗户，这样才能选对心情，选对生活的态度。
words.pinyin: Xuǎnzé yí ge nénggòu dàigěi wǒmen kuàilè de chuānghu, zhèyàng cái néng xuǎnduì xīnqíng, xuǎnduì shēnghuó de tàidu.
words.meaning: Choose a window that can bring us happiness; only in this way can we choose the right mood and the right attitude towards life.

words.hanzi: 科学研究证明，女孩子对衣服颜色的选择往往与她们的性格有关。
words.pinyin: Kēxué yánjiū zhèngmíng, nǚháizi duì yīfu yánsè de xuǎnzé wǎngwǎng yǔ tāmen de xìnggé yǒuguān.
words.meaning: Scientific research proves that girls' choice of clothing colors is often related to their personalities.

words.hanzi: 喜欢穿白色衣服的女孩子性格比较阳光，生活态度积极向上是她们的共同特点；
words.pinyin: Xǐhuan chuān báisè yīfu de nǚháizi xìnggé bǐjiào yángguāng, shēnghuó tàidu jījí xiàngshàng shì tāmen de gòngtóng tèdiǎn;
words.meaning: Girls who like wearing white clothes have relatively sunny personalities; a positive upward attitude towards life is their common characteristic;

words.hanzi: 而喜欢穿红色衣服的女孩子性格比较浪漫。
words.pinyin: Ér xǐhuan chuān hóngsè yīfu de nǚháizi xìnggé bǐjiào làngmàn.
words.meaning: while girls who like wearing red clothes have relatively romantic personalities.

words.hanzi: 颜色也会影响人的心情，不同的颜色会给我们带来不同的感情变化。
words.pinyin: Yánsè yě huì yǐngxiǎng rén de xīnqíng, bù tóng de yánsè huì gěi wǒmen dàilái bù tóng de gǎnqíng biànhuà.
words.meaning: Colors also affect people's moods; different colors bring us different emotional changes.

words.hanzi: 红色让人变得热情；黄色和白色让人心情愉快；黑色却容易让人感到伤心；
words.pinyin: Hóngsè ràng rén biànde rèqíng; huángsè hé báisè ràng rén xīnqíng yúkuài; hēisè què róngyì ràng rén gǎndào shāng xīn;
words.meaning: Red makes people become enthusiastic; yellow and white make people feel happy; black, however, easily makes people feel sad;

words.hanzi: 人们在看到蓝色时会觉得很舒服，变得安静下来；绿色让我们的眼睛得到休息。
words.pinyin: Rénmen zài kàndào lánsè shí huì juéde hěn shūfu, biànde ānjìng xiàlái; lǜsè ràng wǒmen de yǎnjing dédào xiūxi.
words.meaning: When people see blue, they feel comfortable and become quiet; green allows our eyes to rest.

9.title: 阳光总在风雨后
9.title_pinyin: yáng guāng zǒng zài fēng yǔ hòu
9.title_meaning: The sun always comes after the storm

words.hanzi: 王静：怎么又买了这么多饼干和巧克力？难道你不减肥了？
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Zěnme yòu mǎile zhème duō bǐnggān hé qiǎokèlì? Nándào nǐ bu jiǎn féi le?
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Why did you buy so many biscuits and chocolates again? Don't tell me you aren't losing weight anymore?

words.hanzi: 孙月：减了一个月都没瘦下来，我实在没有信心了。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Jiǎnle yí ge yuè dōu méi shòu xiàlái, wǒ shízài méiyǒu xìnxīn le.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: I've been dieting for a month and haven't lost any weight; I really have no confidence left.

words.hanzi: 王静：如果你想减肥，就得少吃东西，而且要多运动。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Rúguǒ nǐ xiǎng jiǎn féi, jiù děi shǎo chī dōngxi, érqiě yào duō yùndòng.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: If you want to lose weight, you must eat less and exercise more.

words.hanzi: 孙月：我就是这么做的，但这一个月下来，我只轻了一公斤。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Wǒ jiù shì zhème zuò de, dàn zhè yí ge yuè xiàlái, wǒ zhǐ qīngle yì gōngjīn.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: That is exactly what I did, but after this month, I only lost one kilogram.

words.hanzi: 王静：一个月太短了。要想减肥成功，只能坚持，才会慢慢有效果。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Yí ge yuè tài duǎn le. Yào xiǎng jiǎn féi chénggōng, zhǐ néng jiānchí, cái huì mànman yǒu xiàoguǒ.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: One month is too short. If you want to succeed in losing weight, you can only persist, and then results will appear slowly.

words.hanzi: 孙月：我本来已经打算放弃了，但是你刚才的话让我改变了主意。这些饼干和巧克力送给你了。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Wǒ běnlái yǐjīng dǎsuàn fàngqì le, dànshì nǐ gāngcái de huà ràng wǒ gǎibiànle zhǔyi. Zhèxiē bǐnggān hé qiǎokèlì sònggěi nǐ le.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: I originally planned to give up, but what you just said changed my mind. These biscuits and chocolates are for you.,

words.hanzi: 李进：你网球打得真好，还得过那么多国际大奖！每次看你比赛，感觉你轻轻松松就赢了。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Nǐ wǎngqiú dǎ de zhēn hǎo, hái déguò nàme duō guójì dà jiǎng! Měi cì kàn nǐ bǐsài, gǎnjué nǐ qīngqīngsōngsōng jiù yíng le.
words.meaning: Li Jin: You play tennis really well, and you've won so many international awards! Every time I watch your match, I feel you win easily.

words.hanzi: 张远：哪里啊！那是你没看到我辛苦练习的一面，没有人随随便便就能成功的。
words.pinyin: Zhāng Yuǎn: Nǎli a! Nà shì nǐ méi kàndào wǒ xīnkǔ liànxí de yí miàn, méiyǒu rén suísuíbiànbiàn jiù néng chénggōng de.
words.meaning: Zhang Yuan: Not at all! That's because you haven't seen the side of my hard practice; no one can succeed casually.

words.hanzi: 李进：我从小也对网球感兴趣，但是到现在还是打得不怎么样。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Wǒ cóngxiǎo yě duì wǎngqiú gǎn xìngqù, dànshì dào xiànzài háishì dǎ de bù zěnmeyàng.
words.meaning: Li Jin: I have been interested in tennis since I was a child, but up to now I still don't play very well.

words.hanzi: 张远：你知道吗？不管春夏秋冬，我练球从来没有休息过一天。
words.pinyin: Zhāng Yuǎn: Nǐ zhīdào ma? Bùguǎn chūn xià qiū dōng, wǒ liàn qiú cónglái méiyǒu xiūxiguo yì tiān.
words.meaning: Zhang Yuan: Do you know? Regardless of spring, summer, autumn or winter, I have never taken a day off from practice.

words.hanzi: 李进：真是不容易啊！看来我只看到了你成功时获得的鲜花，却没注意到你成功前留下的汗水。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Zhēn shì bù róngyì a! Kànlái wǒ zhǐ kàndàole nǐ chénggōng shí huòdé de xiānhuā, què méi zhùyì dào nǐ chénggōng qián liúxià de hànshuǐ.
words.meaning: Li Jin: It's really not easy! It seems I only saw the flowers you received when you succeeded, but didn't notice the sweat you left before succeeding.

words.hanzi: 张远：任何成功都要通过努力才能得到。只要你坚持练习，我相信你也会越打越好的。
words.pinyin: Zhāng Yuǎn: Rènhé chénggōng dōu yào tōngguò nǔlì cái néng dédào. Zhǐyào nǐ jiānchí liànxí, wǒ xiāngxìn nǐ yě huì yuè dǎ yuè hǎo de.
words.meaning: Zhang Yuan: Any success must be obtained through hard work. As long as you persist in practice, I believe you will play better and better.,,

words.hanzi: 小林：你还记得王红吗？我在报纸上看到一篇关于她的新闻，她现在已经是一个有名的作家了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Nǐ hái jìde Wáng Hóng ma? Wǒ zài bàozhǐ shang kàndào yì piān guānyú tā de xīnwén, tā xiànzài yǐjīng shì yí ge yǒumíng de zuòjiā le.
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: Do you still remember Wang Hong? I saw a news article about her in the newspaper, she is now a famous writer.

words.hanzi: 小李：听说她毕业后放弃了律师的工作，开始专门写小说，没想到她竟然成功了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Tīngshuō tā bì yè hòu fàngqìle lǜshī de gōngzuò, kāishǐ zhuānmén xiě xiǎoshuō, méi xiǎngdào tā jìngrán chénggōng le.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: I heard she gave up her job as a lawyer after graduation and started writing novels full-time. I didn't expect her to succeed.

words.hanzi: 小林：当时她的父母和亲戚都不支持她，可是她坚持自己的选择，现在终于向所有人证明了她的选择是正确的。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Dāngshí tā de fùmǔ hé qīnqi dōu bù zhīchí tā, kěshì tā jiānchí zìjǐ de xuǎnzé, xiànzài zhōngyú xiàng suǒyǒu rén zhèngmíngle tā de xuǎnzé shì zhèngquè de.
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: At that time, her parents and relatives did not support her, but she insisted on her choice. Now she has finally proved to everyone that her choice was correct.

words.hanzi: 小李：看来为了自己的理想，放弃一些东西也是值得的。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Kànlái wèile zìjǐ de lǐxiǎng, fàngqì yìxiē dōngxi yě shì zhídé de.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: It seems that for one's ideals, giving up some things is also worth it.

words.hanzi: 小林：一个人只有两只手，不可能得到所有想要的东西，所以有时候放弃是一种聪明的选择。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Yí ge rén zhǐyǒu liǎng zhī shǒu, bù kěnéng dédào suǒyǒu xiǎng yào de dōngxi, suǒyǐ yǒushíhou fàngqì shì yì zhǒng cōngmíng de xuǎnzé.
words.meaning: Xiao Lin: A person only has two hands and cannot get everything they want, so sometimes giving up is a smart choice.

words.hanzi: 小李：是啊，只有学会放弃，才能把自己的能力用到最该做的事情上，最后获得成功。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Shì a, zhǐyǒu xuéhuì fàngqì, cái néng bǎ zìjǐ de néngli yòngdào zuì gāi zuò de shìqing shang, zuìhòu huòdé chénggōng.
words.meaning: Xiao Li: Yes, only by learning to give up can you use your abilities on the things you should do most, and finally achieve success.,

words.hanzi: 如果你想做什么事情，那就勇敢地去做，不要担心结果，不要考虑会不会失败。
words.pinyin: Rúguǒ nǐ xiǎng zuò shénme shìqing, nà jiù yǒnggǎn de qù zuò, búyào dān xīn jiéguǒ, búyào kǎolǜ huì bú huì shībài.
words.meaning: If you want to do something, do it bravely. Don't worry about the result, don't consider whether you will fail.

words.hanzi: 要是太看重结果，失败就会给人们带来很多烦恼。
words.pinyin: Yàoshi tài kànzhòng jiéguǒ, shībài jiù huì gěi rénmen dàilái hěn duō fánnǎo.
words.meaning: If you attach too much importance to the result, failure will bring a lot of trouble to people.

words.hanzi: 我们应该把注意力放在做事情的过程上，这样你在做的过程中发现解决问题的快乐，这是其他任何东西都给不了的。
words.pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi bǎ zhùyìlì fàngzài zuò shìqing de guòchéng shang, zhèyàng nǐ huì zài zuò de guòchéng zhōng fāxiàn jiějué wèntí de kuàilè, zhè shì qítā rènhé dōngxi dōu gěi bù liǎo de.
words.meaning: We should focus our attention on the process of doing things. In this way, you will discover the joy of solving problems in the process, which nothing else can give you.

words.hanzi: 即使最后失败了也没有关系，因为至少你已经努力过，而且我们还可以从失败中总结出有用的经验，有了这些积累，成功自然离我们越来越近。
words.pinyin: Jíshǐ zuìhòu shībàile yě méiyǒu guānxi, yīnwèi zhìshǎo nǐ yǐjīng nǔlìguo, érqiě wǒmen hái kěyǐ cóng shībài zhōng zǒngjié chū yǒuyòng de jīngyàn, yǒule zhèxiē jīlěi, chénggōng zìrán lí wǒmen yuè lái yuè jìn.
words.meaning: Even if you fail in the end, it doesn't matter, because at least you have worked hard, and we can also summarize useful experience from failure. With these accumulations, success will naturally get closer and closer to us.,

words.hanzi: 每一个人都希望成功，可是很多时候，在成功之前会遇到很多困难。
words.pinyin: Měi yí ge rén dōu xīwàng chénggōng, kěshì hěn duō shíhou, zài chénggōng zhīqián huì yùdào hěn duō kùnnán.
words.meaning: Everyone hopes to succeed, but often, they will encounter many difficulties before success.

words.hanzi: 有些人遇到困难就放弃，而有些人遇到困难却想办法解决它。
words.pinyin: Yǒuxiē rén yùdào kùnnán jiù fàngqì, ér yǒuxiē rén yùdào kùnnán què xiǎng bànfǎ jiějué tā.
words.meaning: Some people give up when they encounter difficulties, while others try to find a way to solve them.

words.hanzi: 对困难的态度不同，结果也是不一样的。
words.pinyin: Duì kùnnán de tàidu bù tóng, jiéguǒ yě shì bù yíyàng de.
words.meaning: Different attitudes towards difficulties lead to different results.

words.hanzi: 爱迪生就是在找了上千种材料后才找到了能点亮电灯的材料。
words.pinyin: Àidíshēng jiù shì zài zhǎole shàng qiān zhǒng cáiliào hòu cái zhǎodàole néng diǎnliàng diàndēng de cáiliào.
words.meaning: Edison found the material that could light up the electric lamp only after searching for thousands of materials.

words.hanzi: 取得成功的人往往都经历过许多失败，他们和普通人的区别就是他们都坚持了下来。
words.pinyin: Qǔdé chénggōng de rén wǎngwǎng dōu jīnglìguo xǔduō shībài, tāmen hé pǔtōng rén de qūbié jiù shì tāmen dōu jiānchíle xiàlái.
words.meaning: People who achieve success have often experienced many failures. The difference between them and ordinary people is that they all persisted.

words.hanzi: 所以就算只有百分之一的希望，我们也要做出百分之百的努力。
words.pinyin: Suǒyǐ jiù suàn zhǐyǒu bǎi fēn zhī yī de xīwàng, wǒmen yě yào zuòchū bǎi fēn zhī bǎi de nǔlì.
words.meaning: So even if there is only a one percent hope, we must make a one hundred percent effort.

words.hanzi: 困难只是暂时的，“阳光总在风雨后”，只有我们勇敢地面对困难，才能有希望取得成功。
words.pinyin: Kùnnán zhǐ shì zànshí de, "Yángguāng zǒng zài fēngyǔ hòu", zhǐyǒu wǒmen yǒnggǎn de miànduì kùnnán, cái néng yǒu xīwàng qǔdé chénggōng.
words.meaning: Difficulties are only temporary. "Sunshine always comes after the storm." Only by bravely facing difficulties can we hope to achieve success.,

words.hanzi: 孙月：礼拜天有空儿吗？陪我去逛街怎么样？我想去给丈夫买个生日礼物。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Lǐbàitiān yǒu kòngr ma? Péi wǒ qù guàng jiē zěnmeyàng? Wǒ xiǎng qù gěi zhàngfu mǎi ge shēngrì lǐwù.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Are you free on Sunday? How about accompanying me to go shopping? I want to buy a birthday gift for my husband.

words.hanzi: 王静：我可能去不了，最近事情多。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Wǒ kěnéng qù bù liǎo, zuìjìn shìqing duō.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: I probably can't go, there are many things recently.

words.hanzi: 孙月：你最近是不是工作特别忙？
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Nǐ zuìjìn shì bú shì gōngzuò tèbié máng?
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Are you especially busy with work recently?

words.hanzi: 王静：我现在上有老，下有小。除了工作以外，家里还有母亲和儿子需要照顾。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Wǒ xiànzài shàng yǒu lǎo, xià yǒu xiǎo. Chúle gōngzuò yǐwài, jiā lǐ hái yǒu mǔqīn hé érzi xūyào zhàogù.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: I have elders above and children below now. Besides work, there are also my mother and son at home who need to be taken care of.

words.hanzi: 孙月：真是辛苦啊！你最近脸色不太好，是不是哪儿不舒服？要注意身体啊。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Zhēn shì xīnkǔ a! Nǐ zuìjìn liǎnsè bú tài hǎo, shì bú shì nǎr bù shūfu? Yào zhùyì shēntǐ a.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: It's really hard work! You don't look very well recently, are you feeling uncomfortable somewhere? Pay attention to your health.

words.hanzi: 王静：没事儿，谢谢！不过我现在很幸福，因为在母亲面前我可以做一个永远长不大的孩子；
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Méi shìr, xièxie! Búguò xiànzài wǒ hěn xìngfú, yīnwèi zài mǔqīn miànqián wǒ kěyǐ zuò yí ge yǒngyuǎn zhǎng bú dà de háizi;
words.meaning: Wang Jing: It's nothing, thank you! But I am very happy now, because in front of my mother I can be a child who never grows up;

words.hanzi: 在孩子面前我又是个能照顾他的母亲，这让我有了努力的方向。
words.pinyin: Zài háizi miànqián wǒ yòu shì ge néng zhàogù tā de mǔqīn, zhè ràng wǒ yǒule nǔlì de fāngxiàng.
words.meaning: in front of my child, I am a mother who can take care of him; this gives me a direction to work hard.,

words.hanzi: 高老师：你看人家王老师，刚来这儿工作三年就当了教授，还有个好妻子，真让人羡慕！
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Nǐ kàn rénjiā Wáng lǎoshī, gāng lái zhèr gōngzuò sān nián jiù dāngle jiàoshòu, hái yǒu ge hǎo qīzi, zhēn ràng rén xiànmù!
words.meaning: Gao Laoshi: Look at Teacher Wang, he became a professor just three years after coming here to work, and he has a good wife. It really makes people envious!

words.hanzi: 李老师：其实，你在别人眼中也是很幸福的，只是你自己没有发现。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Qíshí, nǐ zài biéren yǎn zhōng yě shì hěn xìngfú de, zhǐshì nǐ zìjǐ méiyǒu fāxiàn.
words.meaning: Li Laoshi: Actually, you are also very happy in the eyes of others, only you haven't discovered it yourself.

words.hanzi: 高老师：是吗？我哪能跟王老师比啊？
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Shì ma? Wǒ nǎ néng gēn Wáng lǎoshī bǐ a?
words.meaning: Gao Laoshi: Really? How can I compare with Teacher Wang?

words.hanzi: 李老师：你有一个漂亮的女儿，还那么优秀，硕士毕业后就当了翻译。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Nǐ yǒu yí ge piàoliang de nǚ'ér, hái nàme yōuxiù, shuòshì bì yè hòu jiù dāngle fānyì.
words.meaning: Li Laoshi: You have a beautiful daughter, and she is so excellent. She became a translator after graduating with a master's degree.

words.hanzi: 高老师：我女儿确实不错，记得她刚拿到第一个月工资时，就兴奋地拉着我和她爸去商场，给我们买礼物，那时我和她爸心里别提多美了！
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Wǒ nǚ'ér quèshí búcuò, jìde tā gāng nádào dì yí ge yuè gōngzī shí, jiù xīngfèn de lāzhe wǒ hé tā bà qù shāngchǎng, gěi wǒmen mǎi lǐwù, nà shí wǒ hé tā bà xīn lǐ biétí duō měi le!
words.meaning: Gao Laoshi: My daughter is indeed nice. I remember when she just got her first month's salary, she excitedly dragged me and her dad to the mall to buy us gifts. At that time, her dad and I were indescribably happy!

words.hanzi: 李老师：所以说每个人有每个人的生活，不用羡慕别人。你羡慕别人的时候，他们可能也正在羡慕你呢。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Suǒyǐ shuō měi ge rén yǒu měi ge rén de shēnghuó, búyòng xiànmù biéren. Nǐ xiànmù biéren de shíhou, tāmen kěnéng yě zhèngzài xiànmù nǐ ne.
words.meaning: Li Laoshi: So everyone has their own life, no need to envy others. When you envy others, they may be envying you too.,

words.hanzi: 小雨：时间过得真快，马上就要毕业了。毕业后你打算做什么？
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Shíjiān guò de zhēn kuài, mǎshàng jiù yào bì yè le. Bì yè hòu nǐ dǎsuàn zuò shénme?
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: Time passes really fast, we are graduating soon. What do you plan to do after graduation?

words.hanzi: 小夏：我还没想好呢，正想听听你的建议。你觉得在选择职业时，收入重要吗？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Wǒ hái méi xiǎnghǎo ne, zhèng xiǎng tīngting nǐ de jiànyì. Nǐ juéde zài xuǎnzé zhíyè shí, shōurù zhòngyào ma?
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: I haven't thought it through yet, I just want to hear your advice. Do you think income is important when choosing a career?

words.hanzi: 小雨：在我看来，赚钱多少不是最重要的，兴趣才是关键。只有做自己喜欢的事，才会觉得幸福，将来也会有更好的发展。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Zài wǒ kànlái, zhuàn qián duō shǎo bú shì zuì zhòngyào de, xìngqù cái shì guānjiàn. Zhǐyǒu zuò zìjǐ xǐhuan de shì, cái huì juéde xìngfú, jiānglái yě huì yǒu gèng hǎo de fāzhǎn.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: In my opinion, how much money you make is not the most important thing, interest is the key. Only by doing what you like will you feel happy, and you will have better development in the future.

words.hanzi: 小夏：我也这么想。如果我带着热情去做自己喜欢的工作，就不会感到累。不过，现在什么东西都那么贵，生活压力太大了，没有钱也不会过得幸福啊！
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Wǒ yě zhème xiǎng. Rúguǒ wǒ dàizhe rèqíng qù zuò zìjǐ xǐhuan de gōngzuò, jiù bú huì gǎndào lèi. Búguò, xiànzài shénme dōngxi dōu nàme guì, shēnghuó yālì tài dà le, méiyǒu qián yě bú huì guò de xìngfú a!
