words.meaning: Xiao Xia: I think so too. If I do the job I like with enthusiasm, I won't feel tired. But everything is so expensive now, the pressure of life is too great, and one cannot live happily without money!

words.hanzi: 小雨：幸福其实很简单，它不是只要有钱就能买到的。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Xìngfú qíshí hěn jiǎndān, tā bú shì zhǐyào yǒu qián jiù néng mǎidào de.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: Happiness is actually very simple, it cannot be bought just with money.

words.hanzi: 我觉得工作结束回家后，洗个热水澡，然后躺在床上看看书、听听音乐，困了睡睡觉，就很幸福。
words.pinyin: Wǒ juéde gōngzuò jiéshù huí jiā hòu, xǐ ge rè shuǐ zǎo, ránhòu tǎng zài chuáng shang kànkan shū, tīngting yīnyuè, kùnle shuìshui jiào, jiù hěn xìngfú.
words.meaning: I think after work ends and I go home, taking a hot bath, then lying in bed reading books, listening to music, and sleeping when sleepy is very happy.

words.hanzi: 小夏：你说得也对。如果能找到一份自己既感兴趣，收入又不错的工作，那就最好了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Nǐ shuō de yě duì. Rúguǒ néng zhǎodào yí fèn zìjǐ jì gǎn xìngqù, shōurù yòu búcuò de gōngzuò, nà jiù zuì hǎo le.
words.meaning: Xiao Xia: You are right too. It would be best if I could find a job that I am interested in and has a good income.,,

words.hanzi: 有的人希望穿得再好一些，房子再大一些，认为经济条件越好人就越幸福。
words.pinyin: Yǒude rén xīwàng chuān de zài hǎo yìxiē, fángzi zài dà yìxiē, rènwéi jīngjì tiáojiàn yuè hǎo rén jiù yuè xìngfú.
words.meaning: Some people hope to dress better and have a bigger house, thinking that the better the economic conditions, the happier people will be.

words.hanzi: 其实有很多富人过得并不愉快，而有些穷人却过得很快乐。
words.pinyin: Qíshí yǒu hěn duō fù rén guò de bìng bù yúkuài, ér yǒuxiē qióng rén què guò de hěn kuàilè.
words.meaning: In fact, many rich people do not live happily, while some poor people live very happily.

words.hanzi: 有钱不一定幸福，因为很多东西都是不能用钱买到的，例如时间、感情、生活经历等。
words.pinyin: Yǒu qián bù yídìng xìngfú, yīnwèi hěn duō dōngxi dōu shì bù néng yòng qián mǎidào de, lìrú shíjiān, gǎnqíng, shēnghuó jīnglì děng.
words.meaning: Being rich does not necessarily mean being happy, because many things cannot be bought with money, such as time, affection, life experience, etc.

words.hanzi: 但是，从另外一个方面看，如果没钱，也很难过得幸福。
words.pinyin: Dànshì, cóng lìngwài yí ge fāngmiàn kàn, rúguǒ méi qián, yě hěn nán guò de xìngfú.
words.meaning: However, looking at it from another aspect, if you have no money, it is also difficult to live happily.

words.hanzi: 当你生病了，如果由于缺钱而不能及时去看医生，你的健康都很难得到保证，就更别说幸福了。
words.pinyin: Dāng nǐ shēng bìng le, rúguǒ yóuyú quē qián ér bù néng jíshí qù kàn yīshēng, nǐ de jiànkāng dōu hěn nán dédào bǎozhèng, jiù gèng biéshuō xìngfú le.
words.meaning: When you are sick, if you cannot see a doctor in time due to lack of money, your health is hard to guarantee, let alone happiness.,

words.hanzi: 什么是幸福？有的人认为，工资高、能赚钱就是幸福；
words.pinyin: Shénme shì xìngfú? Yǒude rén rènwéi, gōngzī gāo, néng zhuàn qián jiù shì xìngfú;
words.meaning: What is happiness? Some people think that having a high salary and making money is happiness;

words.hanzi: 有的人认为，心情放松、身体健康才是幸福；也有人认为，能帮助别人就是一种幸福。
words.pinyin: Yǒude rén rènwéi, xīnqíng fàngsōng, shēntǐ jiànkāng cái shì xìngfú; yě yǒu rén rènwéi, néng bāngzhù biéren jiù shì yì zhǒng xìngfú.
words.meaning: Some people think that feeling relaxed and being healthy is happiness; others think that helping others is a kind of happiness.

words.hanzi: 还有人说，小时候幸福是一件东西，比如一块橡皮、一块糖，得到了就很幸福；
words.pinyin: Hái yǒu rén shuō, xiǎo shíhou xìngfú shì yí jiàn dōngxi, bǐrú yí kuài xiàngpí, yí kuài táng, dédàole jiù hěn xìngfú;
words.meaning: Others say that when they were young, happiness was a thing, such as an eraser or a piece of candy, and they were happy when they got it;

words.hanzi: 长大后幸福是一种态度，生活的态度决定了我们幸福感的高低。
words.pinyin: Zhǎngdà hòu xìngfú shì yì zhǒng tàidu, shēnghuó de tàidu juédìngle wǒmen xìngfúgǎn de gāodī.
words.meaning: After growing up, happiness is an attitude, and the attitude towards life determines the level of our happiness.

words.hanzi: 那怎样才算是真正的幸福？其实，幸福并没有一个标准答案，每个人对幸福都有不同的理解。
words.pinyin: Nà zěnyàng cái suàn shì zhēnzhèng de xìngfú? Qíshí, xìngfú bìng méiyǒu yí ge biāozhǔn dá'àn, měi ge rén duì xìngfú dōu yǒu bù tóng de lǐjiě.
words.meaning: So what counts as true happiness? In fact, there is no standard answer to happiness, and everyone has a different understanding of happiness.

words.hanzi: 不管你认为幸福是什么，只要你用心去找，就一定能发现它。
words.pinyin: Bùguǎn nǐ rènwéi xìngfú shì shénme, zhǐyào nǐ yòng xīn qù zhǎo, jiù yídìng néng fāxiàn tā.
words.meaning: No matter what you think happiness is, as long as you look for it with your heart, you will definitely find it.,

words.hanzi: 大卫：你来中国才一年，汉语就说得这么流利，真厉害！
words.pinyin: Dàwèi: Nǐ lái Zhōngguó cái yì nián, Hànyǔ jiù shuō de zhème liúlì, zhēn lìhai!
words.meaning: David: You've only been in China for a year, yet you speak Chinese so fluently. That's amazing!

words.hanzi: 马克：谢谢！其实我的语法不太好，很多句子说得都不太准确。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Xièxie! Qíshí wǒ de yǔfǎ bú tài hǎo, hěn duō jùzi shuō de dōu bú tài zhǔnquè.
words.meaning: Mark: Thanks! Actually, my grammar isn't very good, and many sentences I say aren't very accurate.

words.hanzi: 大卫：但是我看你跟中国人交流没什问题，你是怎么做到的？
words.pinyin: Dàwèi: Dànshì wǒ kàn nǐ gēn Zhōngguó rén jiāoliú méi shénme wèntí, nǐ shì zěnme zuòdào de?
words.meaning: David: But I see you have no problem communicating with Chinese people. How did you do it?

words.hanzi: 马克：平时多交一些中国朋友，经常和他们聊天儿，听说能力自然就能得到很大的提高。另外，我建议你坚持看中文报纸，这样能学到很多新词语。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Píngshí duō jiāo yìxiē Zhōngguó péngyou, jīngcháng hé tāmen liáotiānr, tīngshuō nénglí zìrán jiù néng dédào hěn dà de tígāo. Lìngwài, wǒ jiànyì nǐ jiānchí kàn Zhōngwén bàozhǐ, zhèyàng néng xuédào hěn duō xīn cíyǔ.
words.meaning: Mark: Make more Chinese friends and chat with them often. Your listening and speaking skills will naturally improve greatly. Also, I suggest you persist in reading Chinese newspapers; this way you can learn many new words.

words.hanzi: 大卫：你太厉害了！连中文报纸都看得懂。
words.pinyin: Dàwèi: Nǐ tài lìhai le! Lián Zhōngwén bàozhǐ dōu kàn de dǒng.
words.meaning: David: You are so impressive! You can even understand Chinese newspapers.

words.hanzi: 马克：刚开始肯定有困难，不过遇到不认识的词语，你可以查词典，然后写在本子上，有空儿就拿出来复习一下，慢慢地就会发现看中文报纸也没那么难了。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Gāng kāishǐ kěndìng yǒu kùnnan, búguò yùdào bú rènshi de cíyǔ, nǐ kěyǐ chá cídiǎn, ránhòu xiě zài běnzi shang, yǒu kòngr jiù ná chūlái fùxí yíxià, mànman de jiù huì fāxiàn kàn Zhōngwén bàozhǐ yě méi nàme nán le.
words.meaning: Mark: It's definitely difficult at the beginning, but when you encounter words you don't know, you can look them up in a dictionary and write them in a notebook. Review them when you have time, and slowly you will find that reading Chinese newspapers isn't that hard.

words.hanzi: 小夏：考试结束了，你对自己的成绩满意吗？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Kǎoshì jiéshù le, nǐ duì zìjǐ de chéngjì mǎnyì ma?
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: The exam is over. Are you satisfied with your results?

words.hanzi: 小雨：说真的，我不太满意。这次阅读考试的题太多了，我没做完。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Shuō zhēn de, wǒ bú tài mǎnyì. Zhè cì yuèdú kǎoshì de tí tài duō le, wǒ méi zuòwán.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: To be honest, I'm not very satisfied. There were too many questions in this reading exam, I didn't finish them.

words.hanzi: 小夏：两个小时的时间应该来得及吧？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Liǎng ge xiǎoshí de shíjiān yīnggāi láidejí ba?
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: Two hours should be enough time, right?

words.hanzi: 小雨：这次主要是因为我先做了比较难、比较复杂的题，结果花了太多时间，后面简单的题我虽然会，可是时间来不及，最后只好放弃了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Zhè cì zhǔyào shì yīnwèi wǒ xiān zuòle bǐjiào nán, bǐjiào fùzá de tí, jiéguǒ huāle tài duō shíjiān, hòumian jiǎndān de tí wǒ suīrán huì, kěshì shíjiān láibují, zuìhòu zhǐhǎo fàngqì le.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: Mainly because I did the harder and more complicated questions first, which took too much time. Although I knew how to do the simple questions later, there wasn't enough time, so I had to give up.

words.hanzi: 小夏：其实我考得也不怎么样。有几个填空题不会做，有几个选择题，实在想不出来该选哪个，就随便猜了一个答案，结果一个都没猜对。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Qíshí wǒ kǎo de yě bù zěnmeyàng. Yǒu jǐ ge tiánkòngtí bú huì zuò, yǒu jǐ ge xuǎnzétí, shízài xiǎng bu chūlái gāi xuǎn nǎge, jiù suíbiàn cāile yí ge dá'àn, jiéguǒ yí ge dōu méi cāiduì.
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: Actually, I didn't do well either. I didn't know how to do a few fill-in-the-blank questions. For a few multiple-choice questions, I really couldn't figure out which one to choose, so I just guessed an answer, and I didn't guess any of them right.

words.hanzi: 小雨：看来要考好，不但要认真复习，还得注意考试的方法，否则，会做的题也没时间做了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Kànlái yào kǎohǎo, búdàn yào rènzhēn fùxí, hái děi zhùyì kǎoshì de fāngfǎ, fǒuzé, huì zuò de tí yě méi shíjiān zuò le.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: It seems that to do well, you not only need to review carefully but also pay attention to exam methods; otherwise, you won't have time to do even the questions you know how to solve.

words.hanzi: 小林：你的客厅里怎么到处是书啊？这些书你都喜欢看吗？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Nǐ de kètīng li zěnme dàochù shì shū a? Zhèxiē shū nǐ dōu xǐhuan kàn ma?
words.meaning: Xiaolin: Why are there books everywhere in your living room? Do you like reading all these books?

words.hanzi: 小李：当然，我每天都要看书。无论是普通杂志，还是著名小说，只要打开它们，就会发现，世界上有那么多有趣的事情，有那么多不一样的生活。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Dāngrán, wǒ měi tiān dōu yào kàn shū. Wúlùn shì pǔtōng zázhì, háishi zhùmíng xiǎoshuō, zhǐyào dǎkāi tāmen, jiù huì fāxiàn, shìjiè shang yǒu nàme duō yǒuqù de shìqing, yǒu nàme duō bù yíyàng de shēnghuó.
words.meaning: Xiaoli: Of course, I read books every day. Whether it's ordinary magazines or famous novels, as long as I open them, I discover there are so many interesting things in the world and so many different lives.

words.hanzi: 小林：想不到你工作那么忙，还能每天坚持阅读。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Xiǎngbudào nǐ gōngzuò nàme máng, hái néng měi tiān jiānchí yuèdú.
words.meaning: Xiaolin: I didn't expect that you could persist in reading every day even though you are so busy with work.

words.hanzi: 小李：如果3分钟读一页书，半个小时就可以读10页。每天花半个小时来读书，一个月就可以读300页，差不多就是一本书了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Rúguǒ sān fēnzhōng dú yí yè shū, bàn ge xiǎoshí jiù kěyǐ dú shí yè. Měi tiān huā bàn ge xiǎoshí lái dú shū, yí ge yuè jiù kěyǐ dú sānbǎi yè, chàbuduō jiù shì yì běn shū le.
words.meaning: Xiaoli: If you read one page in 3 minutes, you can read 10 pages in half an hour. Spending half an hour a day reading, you can read 300 pages in a month, which is almost a book.

words.hanzi: 小林：是啊，一个真正爱看书的人总能找出时间来阅读。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Shì a, yí ge zhēnzhèng ài kàn shū de rén zǒng néng zhǎochū shíjiān lái yuèdú.
words.meaning: Xiaolin: Yes, a person who truly loves reading can always find time to read.

words.hanzi: 小李：坚持阅读，除了能增加知识外，还能帮助我减轻压力，人也会变得轻松起来。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Jiānchí yuèdú, chúle néng zēngjiā zhīshi wài, hái néng bāngzhù wǒ jiǎnqīng yālì, rén yě huì biànde qīngsōng qǐlái.
words.meaning: Xiaoli: Persisting in reading not only increases knowledge but also helps me reduce stress, and makes me feel more relaxed.

words.hanzi: 根据调查，阅读能力好的人，不但容易找到工作，而且工资也比较高。
words.pinyin: Gēnjù diàochá, yuèdú nénglí hǎo de rén, búdàn róngyì zhǎodào gōngzuò, érqiě gōngzī yě bǐjiào gāo.
words.meaning: According to surveys, people with good reading skills not only find jobs easily but also have relatively higher salaries.

words.hanzi: 怎么才能有效提高自己的阅读能力呢？
words.pinyin: Zěnme cái néng yǒuxiào tígāo zìjǐ de yuèdú nénglí ne?
words.meaning: How can one effectively improve their reading ability?

words.hanzi: 做读书笔记就是其中一种好方法。读书笔记有很多种，最简单的就是把自己喜欢或者觉得有用的词语和句子记下来。
words.pinyin: Zuò dú shū bǐjì jiù shì qízhōng yì zhǒng hǎo fāngfǎ. Dú shū bǐjì yǒu hěn duō zhǒng, zuì jiǎndān de jiù shì bǎ zìjǐ xǐhuan huòzhě juéde yǒuyòng de cíyǔ hé jùzi jì xiàlai.
words.meaning: Taking reading notes is one good method. There are many kinds of reading notes; the simplest is to write down words and sentences you like or find useful.

words.hanzi: 另外，在看完一篇文章或一本书之后，还可以把它的主要内容和自己的想法写下来。
words.pinyin: Lìngwài, zài kànwán yì piān wénzhāng huò yì běn shū zhīhòu, hái kěyǐ bǎ tā de zhǔyào nèiróng hé zìjǐ de xiǎngfǎ xiě xiàlai.
words.meaning: In addition, after finishing an article or a book, you can also write down its main content and your own thoughts.

words.hanzi: 然而，你不能完全相信书本上的内容，要有自己的看法和判断。
words.pinyin: Rán'ér, nǐ bù néng wánquán xiāngxìn shūběn shang de nèiróng, yào yǒu zìjǐ de kànfǎ hé pànduàn.
words.meaning: However, you cannot completely believe the content in books; you must have your own views and judgment.

words.hanzi: 坚持做读书笔记，对提高阅读能力有很大帮助。
words.pinyin: Jiānchí zuò dú shū bǐjì, duì tígāo yuèdú nénglí yǒu hěn dà bāngzhù.
words.meaning: Persisting in taking reading notes is of great help in improving reading ability.

words.hanzi: “读书好，读好书，好读书”。虽然这句话只用了三个相同的汉字，但是不同的顺序却表示了不同的意思。
words.pinyin: "Dú shū hǎo, dú hǎo shū, hào dú shū". Suīrán zhè jù huà zhǐ yòngle sān ge xiāngtóng de Hànzì, dànshì bù tóng de shùnxù què biǎoshìle bù tóng de yìsi.
words.meaning: "Reading is good, read good books, love reading." Although this sentence uses only three identical Chinese characters, the different order expresses different meanings.

words.hanzi: 首先，“读书好”说的是读书有很多好处；
words.pinyin: Shǒuxiàn, "dú shū hǎo" shuō de shì dú shū yǒu hěn duō hǎochu;
words.meaning: First, "reading is good" means that reading has many benefits;

words.hanzi: 其次，每个人时间都是有限的，不可能把世界上每一本书都读完，所以要读好的书；
words.pinyin: Qícì, měi ge rén shíjiān dōu shì yǒuxiàn de, bù kěnéng bǎ shìjiè shang měi yì běn shū dōu dúwán, suǒyǐ yào dú hǎo de shū;
words.meaning: Second, everyone's time is limited, and it is impossible to read every book in the world, so we must read good books;

words.hanzi: 最后，“好读书”就是要养成阅读的习惯，使读书真正成为自己的兴趣爱好。
words.pinyin: Zuìhòu, "hào dú shū" jiù shì yào yǎngchéng yuèdú de xíguàn, shǐ dú shū zhēnzhèng chéngwéi zìjǐ de xìngqù àihào.
words.meaning: Finally, "love reading" means to develop the habit of reading, making reading truly become one's own interest and hobby.

words.hanzi: 阅读有许多好处，它能丰富你的知识，让你找到解决问题的办法；同时，它还会丰富你的情感，使你的生活更精彩。
words.pinyin: Yuèdú yǒu xǔduō hǎochu, tā néng fēngfù nǐ de zhīshi, ràng nǐ zhǎodào jiějué wèntí de bànfǎ; tóngshí, tā hái huì fēngfù nǐ de qínggǎn, shǐ nǐ de shēnghuó gèng jīngcǎi.
words.meaning: Reading has many benefits. It can enrich your knowledge and help you find solutions to problems; at the same time, it can enrich your emotions and make your life more wonderful.

words.hanzi: 所以，让阅读成为你的习惯吧！
words.pinyin: Suǒyǐ, ràng yuèdú chéngwéi nǐ de xíguàn ba!
words.meaning: So, let reading become your habit!

12.title: 用心发现世界
12.title_pinyin: yòng xīn fā xiàn shì jiè
12.title_meaning: Discover the world with your heart

words.hanzi: 王经理：听说这次生意你到现在还没谈成。
words.pinyin: Wáng jīnglǐ: Tīngshuō zhè cì shēngyi nǐ dào xiànzài hái méi tánchéng.
words.meaning: Manager Wang: I heard that you haven't successfully negotiated the business deal yet.

words.hanzi: 马经理：按我以前的经验，早该谈成了，这次我也不知道哪儿出了问题。
words.pinyin: Mǎ jīnglǐ: Àn wǒ yǐqián de jīngyàn, zǎo gāi tánchéng le, zhè cì wǒ yě bù zhīdào nǎr chūle wèntí.
words.meaning: Manager Ma: According to my previous experience, it should have been settled long ago. I don't know what went wrong this time either.

words.hanzi: 王经理：有句话叫“规定和经验是死的，人是活的”。当“规定”和“经验”不能解决问题时，建议你改变一下自己的态度和想法。
words.pinyin: Wáng jīnglǐ: Yǒu jù huà jiào "guīdìng hé jīngyàn shì sǐ de, rén shì huó de". Dāng "guīdìng" hé "jīngyàn" bù néng jiějué wèntí shí, jiànyì nǐ gǎibiàn yíxià zìjǐ de tàidu hé xiǎngfǎ.
words.meaning: Manager Wang: There is a saying, "Rules and experience are dead, people are living". When "rules" and "experience" cannot solve the problem, I suggest you change your attitude and ideas.

words.hanzi: 马经理：很多时候，我都习惯根据过去的经验做事，可惜，经验不是全部都是对的。
words.pinyin: Mǎ jīnglǐ: Hěn duō shíhou, wǒ dōu xíguàn gēnjù guòqù de jīngyàn zuò shì, kěxī, jīngyàn bú shì quánbù dōu shì duì de.
words.meaning: Manager Ma: Often, I am used to doing things based on past experience. Unfortunately, experience is not always entirely correct.

words.hanzi: 王经理：遇到不能解决的问题时，我们应该试着走走以前从来没走过的路，也许这样就能找到解决问题的方法了。
words.pinyin: Wáng jīnglǐ: Yùdào bù néng jiějué de wèntí shí, wǒmen yīnggāi shìzhe zǒuzou yǐqián cónglái méi zǒuguo de lù, yěxǔ zhèyàng jiù néng zhǎodào jiějué wèntí de fāngfǎ le.
words.meaning: Manager Wang: When encountering problems that cannot be solved, we should try taking paths we have never taken before. Perhaps then we can find a solution.

words.hanzi: 马经理：好，我再跟同事商量商量，希望能及时发现问题，并且准确地找到解决问题的方法。
words.pinyin: Mǎ jīnglǐ: Hǎo, wǒ zài gēn tóngshì shāngliang shāngliang, xīwàng néng jíshí fāxiàn wèntí, bìngqiě zhǔnquè de zhǎodào jiějué wèntí de fāngfǎ.
words.meaning: Manager Ma: Okay, I will discuss it with my colleagues again, hoping to discover the problem in time and accurately find the solution.

words.hanzi: 女儿：妈，您看我刚买的裤子，洗完以后颜色怎么变得这么难看呢？
words.pinyin: Nǚ'ér: Mā, nín kàn wǒ gāng mǎi de kùzi, xǐwán yǐhòu yánsè zěnme biànde zhème nánkàn ne?
words.meaning: Daughter: Mom, look at the pants I just bought. Why did the color become so ugly after washing?

words.hanzi: 高老师：看来是掉颜色了，你洗的时候在水里加点儿盐就不会这样了。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Kànlái shì diào yánsè le, nǐ xǐ de shíhou zài shuǐ li jiā diǎnr yán jiù bú huì zhèyàng le.
words.meaning: Teacher Gao: It seems the color faded. If you add some salt to the water when washing, this won't happen.

words.hanzi: 女儿：放盐？！盐不是用来做饭的吗？难道它还能让衣服不掉颜色？
words.pinyin: Nǚ'ér: Fàng yán?! Yán bú shì yònglái zuò fàn de ma? Nándào tā hái néng ràng yīfu bú diào yánsè?
words.meaning: Daughter: Add salt?! Isn't salt used for cooking? Can it really prevent clothes from fading?

words.hanzi: 高老师：当然。有些衣服第一次洗的时候会掉颜色，其实，有很多方法可以解决这个问题。在水里加勺盐再洗是最简单的方法。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Dāngrán. Yǒuxiē yīfu dì-yī cì xǐ de shíhou huì diào yánsè, qíshí, yǒu hěn duō fāngfǎ kěyǐ jiějué zhège wèntí. Zài shuǐ li jiā sháo yán zài xǐ shì zuì jiǎndān de fāngfǎ.
words.meaning: Teacher Gao: Of course. Some clothes fade when washed for the first time. Actually, there are many ways to solve this problem. Adding a spoonful of salt to the water before washing is the simplest method.

words.hanzi: 用盐水来洗新衣服，这样穿得再久、洗的次数再多，衣服也不容易掉颜色。
words.pinyin: Yòng yánshuǐ lái xǐ xīn yīfu, zhèyàng chuān de zài jiǔ, xǐ de cìshù zài duō, yīfu yě bù róngyì diào yánsè.
words.meaning: Washing new clothes with salt water makes them less likely to fade, no matter how long you wear them or how many times you wash them.

words.hanzi: 女儿：我第一次听说盐有保护衣服颜色的作用，生活中还真有不少课本上无法学到的知识。
words.pinyin: Nǚ'ér: Wǒ dì-yī cì tīngshuō yán yǒu bǎohù yīfu yánsè de zuòyòng, shēnghuó zhōng hái zhēn yǒu bù shǎo kèběn shang wúfǎ xuédào de zhīshi.
words.meaning: Daughter: This is the first time I've heard that salt can protect the color of clothes. There really is a lot of knowledge in life that cannot be learned in textbooks.

words.hanzi: 高老师：实际上，很多问题的答案都可以从生活中找到。但这需要你用眼睛去发现，用心去总结。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Shíjìshang, hěn duō wèntí de dá'àn dōu kěyǐ cóng shēnghuó zhōng zhǎodào. Dàn zhè xūyào nǐ yòng yǎnjing qù fāxiàn, yòng xīn qù zǒngjié.
words.meaning: Teacher Gao: In fact, the answers to many problems can be found in life. But this requires you to discover with your eyes and summarize with your heart.

words.hanzi: 高老师：王教授，今天听完您的这节课，我终于明白为什么您的课那么受欢迎了。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Wáng jiàoshòu, jīntiān tīngwán nín de zhè jié kè, wǒ zhōngyú míngbai wèishénme nín de kè nàme shòu huānyíng le.
words.meaning: Teacher Gao: Professor Wang, after listening to your class today, I finally understand why your class is so popular.

words.hanzi: 王教授：谢谢！您能详细谈谈对我的课的看法吗？
words.pinyin: Wáng jiàoshòu: Xièxie! Nín néng xiángxì tántan duì wǒ de kè de kànfǎ ma?
words.meaning: Professor Wang: Thank you! Can you talk in detail about your opinion of my class?

words.hanzi: 高老师：我发现您对学生特别了解，而且总是能用最简单的方法把复杂的问题解释清楚，让每个学生都能听懂，这一点真是值得我们好好学习。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Wǒ fāxiàn nín duì xuéshēng tèbié liǎojiě, érqiě zǒngshì néng yòng zuì jiǎndān de fāngfǎ bǎ fùzá de wèntí jiěshì qīngchu, ràng měi ge xuéshēng dōu néng tīngdǒng, zhè yì diǎn zhēn shì zhídé wǒmen hǎohāor xuéxí.
words.meaning: Teacher Gao: I found that you understand students very well, and you can always explain complex problems clearly in the simplest way so that every student can understand. This is really worth our learning.

words.hanzi: 王教授：哪里哪里，这只是因为我对每个学生的能力水平比较了解。
words.pinyin: Wáng jiàoshòu: Nǎli nǎli, zhè zhǐshì yīnwèi wǒ duì měi ge xuéshēng de néngli shuǐpíng bǐjiào liǎojiě.
words.meaning: Professor Wang: You flatter me. This is just because I have a better understanding of each student's ability level.

words.hanzi: 高老师：那您认为对于老师来说，什么是最难做到的？
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Nà nín rènwéi duìyú lǎoshī lái shuō, shénme shì zuì nán zuòdào de?
words.meaning: Teacher Gao: Then what do you think is the hardest thing for a teacher to achieve?

words.hanzi: 王教授：世界上没有完全相同的叶子，同样地，我们也没有完全一样的人。所以，在教育学生时，要根据学生的特点选择不同的方法，我想这应该是最容易做到的。
words.pinyin: Wáng jiàoshòu: Shìjiè shang méiyǒu wánquán xiāngtóng de yèzi, tóngyàng de, wǒmen yě méiyǒu wánquán yíyàng de rén. Suǒyǐ, zài jiàoyù xuéshēng shí, yào gēnjù xuéshēng de tèdiǎn xuǎnzé bù tóng de fāngfǎ, wǒ xiǎng zhè yīnggāi shì zuì róngyì zuòdào de.
words.meaning: Professor Wang: There are no two completely identical leaves in the world; similarly, we do not have completely identical people. Therefore, when educating students, we must choose different methods according to the characteristics of the students. I think this should be the [hardest] thing to achieve. (Note: The text says "zuì róngyì" (easiest) in the last sentence shown in source, but logically and contextually it usually means "hardest" or "not easiest". Given the source text says "最不容易" (zuì bù róngyì - most not easy/hardest), I will correct the pinyin/meaning to match "最不容易" which is visible in the characters).

words.hanzi: Correction based on characters: 我想这应该是最不容易做到的。
words.pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng zhè yīnggāi shì zuì bù róngyì zuòdào de.
words.meaning: I think this should be the hardest thing to achieve.

words.hanzi: 人人都会使用语言，但是怎么用语言把话说好却是一门艺术。
words.pinyin: Rénrén dōu huì shǐyòng yǔyán, dànshì zěnme yòng yǔyán bǎ huà shuōhǎo què shì yì mén yìshù.
words.meaning: Everyone can use language, but how to use language to speak well is an art.

words.hanzi: 看一个人怎么说话，往往可以比较准确地判断出他是一个什么样的人。
words.pinyin: Kàn yí ge rén zěnme shuō huà, wǎngwǎng kěyǐ bǐjiào zhǔnquè de pànduàn chū tā shì yí ge shénme yàng de rén.
words.meaning: By observing how a person speaks, you can often judge relatively accurately what kind of person they are.

words.hanzi: 有的人心里怎么想，嘴上就怎么说，即使是别人的缺点，他也会直接说出来，这样的人虽然很诚实，但是可能会引起别人的误会；
words.pinyin: Yǒude rén xīn li zěnme xiǎng, zuǐ shang jiù zěnme shuō, jíshǐ shì biéren de quēdiǎn, tā yě huì zhíjiē shuō chūlái, zhèyàng de rén suīrán hěn chéngshí, dànshì kěnéng huì yǐnqǐ biéren de wùhuì;
words.meaning: Some people say whatever they think in their hearts. Even if it is someone else's shortcoming, they will say it directly. Although such people are honest, they may cause misunderstandings;

words.hanzi: 有的人虽然也看到了别人的缺点，但却不会直接指出来，而是通过别的方法来提醒，让他认识到自己的缺点，这样的人会让人觉得更友好。
words.pinyin: Yǒude rén suīrán yě kàndàole biéren de quēdiǎn, dàn què bú huì zhíjiē zhǐ chūlái, ér shì tōngguò biéde fāngfǎ lái tíxǐng, ràng tā rènshi dào zìjǐ de quēdiǎn, zhèyàng de rén huì ràng rén juéde gèng yǒuhǎo.
words.meaning: Some people, although they also see others' shortcomings, will not point them out directly, but remind them through other methods to make them realize their own shortcomings. Such people will make others feel more friendly.

words.hanzi: 无论做什么事情，都要注意方法，学习尤其是这样。
words.pinyin: Wúlùn zuò shénme shìqing, dōu yào zhùyì fāngfǎ, xuéxí yóuqí shì zhèyàng.
words.meaning: No matter what you do, you must pay attention to methods, especially in learning.

words.hanzi: 使用正确的方法，我们做起事来能“事半功倍”，也就是说道，能节约约一半的力气，取得更好的效果。
words.pinyin: Shǐyòng zhèngquè de fāngfǎ, wǒmen zuòqǐ shì lái néng "shì bàn gōng bèi", yě jiù shì shuō, néng jiéyuē yuē yíbàn de lìqi, qǔdé gèng hǎo de xiàoguǒ.
words.meaning: Using the correct method, we can achieve "half the work, twice the effect", which means saving about half the effort and achieving better results.

words.hanzi: 相反，如果方法不对，可能花五倍甚至十倍的时间都不能完成任务，结果变成了“事倍功半”。
words.pinyin: Xiāngfǎn, rúguǒ fāngfǎ bú duì, kěnéng huā wǔ bèi shènzhì shí bèi de shíjiān dōu bù néng wánchéng rènwu, jiéguǒ biànchéngle "shì bèi gōng bàn".
words.meaning: On the contrary, if the method is wrong, you may not complete the task even if you spend five or even ten times the time, resulting in "twice the work, half the effect".

words.hanzi: 有一点需要提醒大家，别人的方法也许很有校，但是并不一定适合自己。
words.pinyin: Yǒu yì diǎn xūyào tíxǐng dàjiā, biéren de fāngfǎ yěxǔ hěn yǒuxiào, dànshì bìng bù yídìng shìhé zìjǐ.
words.meaning: One point needs to be reminded: others' methods may be effective, but they are not necessarily suitable for you.

words.hanzi: 因此，我们应该在听取别人意见的同时，仔细考虑一下，再根据不同的情况选择不同的方法，这样才能达到最好的效果。
words.pinyin: Yīncǐ, wǒmen yīnggāi zài tīngqǔ biéren yìjiàn de tóngshì, zǐxì kǎolǜ yíxià, zài gēnjù bù tóng de qíngkuàng xuǎnzé bù tóng de fāngfǎ, zhèyàng cái néng dádào zuì hǎo de xiàoguǒ.
words.meaning: Therefore, while listening to others' opinions, we should carefully consider them, and then choose different methods according to different situations, so as to achieve the best results.

13.title: 喝着茶看京剧
13.title_pinyin: hē zhe chá kàn jīng jù
13.title_meaning: Drinking tea and watching Peking Opera

words.hanzi: 小雨：小夏，你爷爷京剧唱得真专业，我还以为他是京剧演员呢。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Xiǎo Xià, nǐ yéye Jīngjù chàng de zhēn zhuānyè, wǒ hái yǐwéi tā shì Jīngjù yǎnyuán ne.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: Xiaoxia, your grandfather sings Beijing Opera so professionally. I thought he was a Beijing Opera actor.

words.hanzi: 小夏：对啊，他本来就是京剧演员，年轻时在我们那儿很有名，深受观众们的喜爱。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Duì a, tā běnlái jiù shì Jīngjù yǎnyuán, niánqīng shí zài wǒmen nàr hěn yǒumíng, shēn shòu guānzhòngmen de xǐ'ài.
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: Yes, he was originally a Beijing Opera actor. He was very famous in our place when he was young and was deeply loved by the audience.

words.hanzi: 小雨：你爷爷一定对京剧有着很深厚的感情。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Nǐ yéye yídìng duì Jīngjù yǒuzhe hěn shēnhòu de gǎnqíng.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: Your grandfather must have deep feelings for Beijing Opera.

words.hanzi: 小夏：是呀，他8岁就开始上台演出，到现在大概唱了60多年了，他对这门艺术的喜爱从来没有改变过。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Shì ya, tā bā suì jiù kāishǐ shàng tái yǎnchū, dào xiànzài dàgài chàngle liùshí duō nián le, tā duì zhè mén yìshù de xǐ'ài cónglái méiyǒu gǎibiànguo.
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: Yes, he started performing on stage at the age of 8, and has been singing for about 60 years now. His love for this art has never changed.

words.hanzi: 小雨：这么说你喜欢听京剧也是受了你爷爷的影响？
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Zhème shuō nǐ xǐhuan tīng Jīngjù yě shì shòule nǐ yéye de yǐngxiǎng?
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: So your love for listening to Beijing Opera was also influenced by your grandfather?

words.hanzi: 小夏：我小时候经常去看他的演出。平时他还给我讲很多京剧里的历史故事，让我学到了很多知识。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Wǒ xiǎoshíhou jīngcháng qù kàn tā de yǎnchū. Píngshí tā hái gěi wǒ jiǎng hěn duō Jīngjù li de lìshǐ gùshi, ràng wǒ xuédàole hěn duō zhīshi.
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: I often went to see his performances when I was young. He also usually told me many historical stories in Beijing Opera, which allowed me to learn a lot of knowledge.

words.hanzi: 小雨：真没想到你一个来自美国的外国留学生，能把京剧唱得这么好。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Zhēn méi xiǎngdào nǐ yí ge láizì Měiguó de wàiguó liúxuéshēng, néng bǎ Jīngjù chàng de zhème hǎo.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: I really didn't expect that you, a foreign student from the United States, could sing Beijing Opera so well.

words.hanzi: 马克：我常常跟着电视学唱京剧，然后一遍一遍地练习，偶尔跟中国人一起唱上几句。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Wǒ chángcháng gēnzhe diànshì xué chàng Jīngjù, ránhòu yí biàn yí biàn de liànxí, ǒu'ěr gēn Zhōngguó rén yìqǐ chàng shang jǐ jù.
words.meaning: Mark: I often learn to sing Beijing Opera along with the TV, and then practice it over and over again. Occasionally I sing a few lines with Chinese people.

words.hanzi: 小雨：难道你从来没有接受过京剧方面的专门教育吗？
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Nándào nǐ cónglái méiyǒu jiēshòuguo Jīngjù fāngmiàn de zhuānmén jiàoyù ma?
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: Have you never received any specialized education in Beijing Opera?

words.hanzi: 马克：别吃惊，因为我以前学习过音乐，有一些音乐基础，又对京剧这种表演艺术非常感兴趣，所以能比较容易地学会它的唱法。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Bié chī jīng, yīnwèi wǒ yǐqián xuéxíguo yīnyuè, yǒu yìxiē yīnyuè jīchǔ, yòu duì Jīngjù zhè zhǒng biǎoyǎn yìshù fēicháng gǎn xìngqù, suǒyǐ néng bǐjiào róngyì de xuéhuì tā de chàngfǎ.
words.meaning: Mark: Don't be surprised. Because I have studied music before and have some musical foundation, and I am very interested in the performing art of Beijing Opera, I can learn its singing method relatively easily.

words.hanzi: 小雨：你真厉害！竟然连很多中国人都听不懂的京剧也能学会。我还是比较喜欢听流行音乐。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Nǐ zhēn lìhai! Jìngrán lián hěn duō Zhōngguó rén dōu tīngbudǒng de Jīngjù yě néng xuéhuì. Wǒ háishì bǐjiào xǐhuan tīng liúxíng yīnyuè.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: You are really amazing! You can even learn Beijing Opera, which many Chinese people can't understand. I still prefer listening to pop music.

words.hanzi: 马克：那是你不了解京剧的唱法。在音乐方面，京剧给了我很多新的想法。我还把京剧的一些特点增加到了自己的音乐中，达到了很好的效果。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Nà shì nǐ bù liǎojiě Jīngjù de chàngfǎ. Zài yīnyuè fāngmiàn, Jīngjù gěile wǒ hěn duō xīn de xiǎngfǎ. Wǒ hái bǎ Jīngjù de yìxiē tèdiǎn zēngjiā dàole zìjǐ de yīnyuè zhōng, dádàole hěn hǎo de xiàoguǒ.
words.meaning: Mark: That's because you don't understand the singing method of Beijing Opera. In terms of music, Beijing Opera has given me many new ideas. I also added some features of Beijing Opera to my own music and achieved very good results.

words.hanzi: 李老师：校长，因为外国留学生不了解中国文化，有时候会影响他们和中国人之间的正常交流，甚至还可能引起误会，带来麻烦，所以我们想申请举办一次中国传统文化节活动。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Xiàozhǎng, yīnwèi wàiguó liúxuéshēng bù liǎojiě Zhōngguó wénhuà, yǒushíhou huì yǐngxiǎng tāmen hé Zhōngguó rén zhījiān de zhèngcháng jiāoliú, shènzhì hái kěnéng yǐnqǐ wùhuì, dàilái máfan, suǒyǐ wǒmen xiǎng shēnqǐng jǔbàn yí cì Zhōngguó chuántǒng wénhuà jié huódòng.
words.meaning: Teacher Li: Principal, because foreign students don't understand Chinese culture, sometimes it affects their normal communication with Chinese people, and may even cause misunderstandings and bring trouble. So we want to apply to hold a Chinese Traditional Culture Festival.

words.hanzi: 校长：你们的想法很好，举办文化节活动，一方面能让各国学生更好地了解中国，另一方面也能为学生们提供互相交流和学习的机会。
words.pinyin: Xiàozhǎng: Nǐmen de xiǎngfǎ hěn hǎo, jǔbàn wénhuà jié huódòng, yì fāngmiàn néng ràng gè guó xuéshēng gèng hǎo de liǎojiě Zhōngguó, lìng yì fāngmiàn yě néng wèi xuéshēngmen tígōng hùxiāng jiāoliú hé xuéxí de jīhuì.
words.meaning: Principal: Your idea is very good. Holding a cultural festival can, on one hand, allow students from various countries to better understand China, and on the other hand, provide opportunities for students to communicate and learn from each other.

words.hanzi: 李老师：谢谢您的支持！
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Xièxie nín de zhīchí!
words.meaning: Teacher Li: Thank you for your support!

words.hanzi: 校长：上次的春游活动你们办得非常有趣，大家都玩儿得很开心，这次活动继续由你负责，相信也一定会很成功。
words.pinyin: Xiàozhǎng: Shàng cì de chūnyóu huódòng nǐmen bàn de fēicháng yǒuqù, dàjiā dōu wánr de hěn kāixīn, zhè cì huódòng jìxù yóu nǐ fùzé, xiāngxìn yě yídìng huì hěn chénggōng.
words.meaning: Principal: The spring outing you organized last time was very interesting, and everyone had a great time. You will continue to be in charge of this event. I believe it will definitely be very successful too.

words.hanzi: 李老师：我们回去就开会讨论，星期五之前把详细的计划书发给您。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Wǒmen huíqù jiù kāi huì tǎolùn, Xīngqīwǔ zhīqián bǎ xiángxì de jìhuàshū fāgěi nín.
words.meaning: Teacher Li: We will go back and have a meeting to discuss it, and send you the detailed plan before Friday.

words.hanzi: 校长：好的，准备过程中有什么问题，你们可以直接来找我。
words.pinyin: Xiàozhǎng: Hǎo de, zhǔnbèi guòchéng zhōng yǒu shénme wèntí, nǐmen kěyǐ zhíjiē lái zhǎo wǒ.
words.meaning: Principal: Okay. If you have any problems during the preparation process, you can come to me directly.

words.hanzi: 筷子在中国大约已经有3000多年的历史了。
words.pinyin: Kuàizi zài Zhōngguó dàyuē yǐjīng yǒu sānqiān duō nián de lìshǐ le.
words.meaning: Chopsticks have a history of about 3000 years in China.

words.hanzi: 对外国人来说，使用筷子吃饭并不容易，所以，国外的一些中国餐厅在放筷子的纸袋上会提供使用筷子的详细说明。
words.pinyin: Duì wàiguó rén lái shuō, shǐyòng kuàizi chī fàn bìng bù róngyì, suǒyǐ, guówài de yìxiē Zhōngguó cāntīng zài fàng kuàizi de zhǐdài shang huì tígōng shǐyòng kuàizi de xiángxì shuōmíng.
words.meaning: For foreigners, eating with chopsticks is not easy. Therefore, some Chinese restaurants abroad provide detailed instructions on how to use chopsticks on the paper bags containing them.

words.hanzi: 不过，如果你认为每个中国都会正确使用筷子，那就错了。
words.pinyin: Búguò, rúguǒ nǐ rènwéi měi ge Zhōngguó rén dōu huì zhèngquè shǐyòng kuàizi, nà jiù cuò le.
words.meaning: However, if you think every Chinese person can use chopsticks correctly, you are wrong.

words.hanzi: 有人在互联网上专门进行过调查，结果发现每六个中国人中就有一个使用筷子的方法是错误的。
words.pinyin: Yǒurén zài hùliánwǎng shang zhuānmén jìnxíngguo diàochá, jiéguǒ fāxiàn měi liù ge Zhōngguó rén zhōng jiù yǒu yí ge shǐyòng kuàizi de fāngfǎ shì cuòwù de.
words.meaning: Someone conducted a special survey on the Internet, and the results showed that one out of every six Chinese people uses chopsticks incorrectly.

words.hanzi: 如果你想正确使用筷子，那就好好练习吧。
words.pinyin: Rúguǒ nǐ xiǎng zhèngquè shǐyòng kuàizi, nà jiù hǎohāor liànxí ba.
words.meaning: If you want to use chopsticks correctly, then practice well.

words.hanzi: 茶在中国有几千年的历史，是中国最常见的饮料。
words.pinyin: Chá zài Zhōngguó yǒu jǐ qiān nián de lìshǐ, shì Zhōngguó zuì chángjiàn de yǐnliào.
words.meaning: Tea has a history of thousands of years in China and is the most common beverage in China.

words.hanzi: 最早的时候，茶只是被当作一种药，而不是饮料。
words.pinyin: Zuìzǎo de shíhou, chá zhǐshì bèi dàngzuò yì zhǒng yào, ér bú shì yǐnliào.
words.meaning: In the earliest times, tea was only used as a kind of medicine, not a beverage.

words.hanzi: 后来，随着人们对茶的认识的加深，慢慢开始把它当作解渴的饮料，这才有了中国的茶文化。
words.pinyin: Hòulái, suízhe rénmen duì chá de rènshi de jiāshēn, mànman kāishǐ bǎ tā dàngzuò jiěkě de yǐnliào, zhè cái yǒule Zhōngguó de chá wénhuà.
words.meaning: Later, as people's understanding of tea deepened, they slowly began to treat it as a thirst-quenching drink, which led to China's tea culture.

words.hanzi: 在中国，喝茶是一种十分普遍的生活习惯。对很多中国人来说，喝茶已成为他们生活中不可缺少的一部分。
words.pinyin: Zài Zhōngguó, hē chá shì yì zhǒng shífēn pǔbiàn de shēnghuó xíguàn. Duì hěn duō Zhōngguó rén lái shuō, hē chá yǐ chéngwéi tāmen shēnghuó zhōng bù kě quēshǎo de yí bùfen.
words.meaning: In China, drinking tea is a very common living habit. For many Chinese people, drinking tea has become an indispensable part of their lives.

words.hanzi: 但是有的饮料虽然名字叫“茶”，却并不是真正的茶。比如广东省的人爱喝的“凉茶”，它的味道稍微有点儿苦，其实是一种用中药做成的饮料。
words.pinyin: Dànshì yǒude yǐnliào suīrán míngzi jiào "chá", què bìng bú shì zhēnzhèng de chá. Bǐrú Guǎngdōng Shěng de rén ài hē de "liángchá", tā de wèidào shāowēi yǒudiǎnr kǔ, qíshí shì yì zhǒng yòng zhōngyào zuòchéng de yǐnliào.
words.meaning: However, some drinks, although named "tea", are not real tea. For example, "Liangcha" (herbal tea) loved by people in Guangdong Province has a slightly bitter taste and is actually a drink made from traditional Chinese medicine.

14.title: 保护地球母亲
14.title_pinyin: bǎo hù dì qiú mǔ qīn

words.hanzi: 王静：这是明天你出差要带的毛巾、牙膏和牙刷，把它们放到箱子里吧。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Zhè shì míngtiān nǐ chū chāi yào dài de máojīn, yágāo hé yáshuā, bǎ tāmen fàngdào xiāngzi li ba.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: These are the towels, toothpaste, and toothbrush you need to take for your business trip tomorrow. Put them in the suitcase.

words.hanzi: 李进：不用拿这些，宾馆都会免费提供的。再说到，箱子已经够重的了！
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Búyòng ná zhèxiē, bīnguǎn dōu huì miǎn fèi tígōng de. Zàishuō, xiāngzi yǐjīng gòu zhòng de le!
words.meaning: Li Jin: No need to take these, the hotel will provide them for free. Besides, the suitcase is already heavy enough!

words.hanzi: 王静：我当然知道宾馆里有。你不是一直说要保护环境吗？现在就从身边的小事做起吧。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Wǒ dāngrán zhīdào bīnguǎn li yǒu. Nǐ bú shì yìzhí shuō yào bǎohù huánjìng ma? Xiànzài jiù cóng shēnbiān de xiǎoshì zuòqǐ ba.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Of course I know the hotel has them. Haven't you always said we should protect the environment? Start now with small things around you.

words.hanzi: 李进：行，没问题。我明天上午10点的飞机，你能开车把我送到机场吗？
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Xíng, méi wèntí. Wǒ míngtiān shàngwǔ shí diǎn de fēijī, nǐ néng kāi chē bǎ wǒ sòngdào jīchǎng ma?
words.meaning: Li Jin: Okay, no problem. My flight is at 10 am tomorrow. Can you drive me to the airport?

words.hanzi: 王静：那个时间路上堵车多严重啊！你还是坐地铁去机场吧。这样不仅省油钱，而且还不会污染空气。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Nàge shíjiān lù shang dǔ chē duō yánzhòng a! Nǐ háishì zuò dìtiě qù jīchǎng ba. Zhèyàng bùjǐn shěng yóu qián, érqiě hái bú huì wūrǎn kōngqì.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: The traffic jam is so serious at that time! You'd better take the subway to the airport. This way not only saves gas money but also won't pollute the air.

words.hanzi: 李进：好，那就听你的。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Hǎo, nà jiù tīng nǐ de.
words.meaning: Li Jin: Okay, I'll listen to you.

words.hanzi: 经理：小王，卫生间怎么那么脏啊？这会给客人留下不好的印象，快去打扫一下。
words.pinyin: Jīnglǐ: Xiǎo Wáng, wèishēngjiān zěnme nàme zāng a? Zhè huì gěi kèrén liúxià bù hǎo de yìnxiàng, kuài qù dǎsǎo yíxià.
words.meaning: Manager: Xiao Wang, why is the bathroom so dirty? This will leave a bad impression on the guests. Go clean it up quickly.

words.hanzi: 服务员：经理，实在抱歉。今天店里太忙了，我还没来得及打扫。
words.pinyin: Fúwùyuán: Jīnglǐ, shízài bàoqiàn. Jīntiān diàn li tài máng le, wǒ hái méi láidejí dǎsǎo.
words.meaning: Waiter: Manager, I'm really sorry. The shop is too busy today, I haven't had time to clean it yet.

words.hanzi: 经理：那张桌子下面还有一些空饮料瓶子和纸盒子。
words.pinyin: Jīnglǐ: Nà zhāng zhuōzi xiàmian hái yǒu yìxiē kōng yǐnliào píngzi hé zhǐ hézi.
words.meaning: Manager: There are also some empty beverage bottles and paper boxes under that table.

words.hanzi: 服务员：好的，我马上就去把它扔掉。
words.pinyin: Fúwùyuán: Hǎo de, wǒ mǎshàng jiù qù bǎ tā rēngdiào.
words.meaning: Waiter: Okay, I will go throw them away immediately.

words.hanzi: 经理：以后你一定得注意这个问题，不管客人多多，生意多忙，我们都要保证餐厅干净卫生。
words.pinyin: Jīnglǐ: Yǐhòu nǐ yídìng děi zhùyì zhège wèntí, bùguǎn kèrén duō duō, shēngyi duō máng, wǒmen dōu yào bǎozhèng cāntīng gānjìng wèishēng.
words.meaning: Manager: You must pay attention to this problem in the future. No matter how many guests there are or how busy the business is, we must ensure the restaurant is clean and hygienic.

words.hanzi: 服务员：经理您放心，我一定以最快的速度完成。不过咱们真的应该再多招聘几个服务员了。
words.pinyin: Fúwùyuán: Jīnglǐ nín fàng xīn, wǒ yídìng yǐ zuì kuài de sùdù wánchéng. Búguò zánmen zhēn de yīnggāi zài duō zhāopìn jǐ ge fúwùyuán le.
words.meaning: Waiter: Manager, don't worry, I will definitely complete it as fast as possible. But we really should recruit a few more waiters.

words.hanzi: 孙月：早上听新闻说明天有一个叫“地球一小时”的活动，你对这个活动了解吗？
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Zǎoshang tīng xīnwén shuō míngtiān yǒu yí ge jiào "Dìqiú Yī Xiǎoshí" de huódòng, nǐ duì zhège huódòng liǎojiě ma?
words.meaning: Sun Yue: I heard on the news this morning that there is an event called "Earth Hour" tomorrow. Do you know about this event?

words.hanzi: 王静：这个活动年年都有，最早是从2007年开始的。明天晚上很多人都会关灯一小时，支持这个活动。你没看到门口的通知吗？我们公司也参加。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Zhège huódòng niánnián dōu yǒu, zuìzǎo shì cóng èrlínglíngqī nián kāishǐ de. Míngtiān wǎnshang hěn duō rén dōu huì guān dēng yì xiǎoshí, zhīchí zhège huódòng. Nǐ méi kàndào ménkǒu de tōngzhī ma? Wǒmen gōngsī yě cānjiā.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: This event happens every year, starting in 2007. Tomorrow night many people will turn off lights for an hour to support this event. Didn't you see the notice at the door? Our company is also participating.

words.hanzi: 孙月：真的吗？太好了！既然明天晚上公司会关灯停电，那么我们肯定不用加班了。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Zhēn de ma? Tài hǎo le! Jìrán míngtiān wǎnshang gōngsī huì guān dēng tíng diàn, nàme wǒmen kěndìng búyòng jiā bān le.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Really? That's great! Since the company will turn off lights and cut power tomorrow night, we definitely won't have to work overtime.

words.hanzi: 王静：看你得意的样子！还以为你高兴是为了支持环保，原来是因为不用加班啊！
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Kàn nǐ déyì de yàngzi! Hái yǐwéi nǐ gāoxìng shì wèile zhīchí huánbǎo, yuánlái shì yīnwèi búyòng jiā bān a!
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Look at your smug face! I thought you were happy to support environmental protection, but it turns out it's because you don't have to work overtime!

words.hanzi: 孙月：环境我当然也支持了！对了，为什么会有这么一个活动啊？
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Huánjìng wǒ dāngrán yě zhīchí le! Duìle, wèishénme huì yǒu zhème yí ge huódòng a?
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Of course I support the environment too! By the way, why is there such an event?

words.hanzi: 王静：其实目的挺简单的，就是提醒人们节约用电，希望引起人们对气候变暖问题的关注。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Qíshí mùdì tǐng jiǎndān de, jiù shì tíxǐng rénmen jiéyuē yòng diàn, xīwàng yǐnqǐ rénmen duì qìhòu biàn nuǎn wèntí de guānzhù.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Actually, the purpose is quite simple. It is to remind people to save electricity and hope to draw people's attention to the problem of global warming.

words.hanzi: 塑料袋给人们的生活带来方便，受到人们的普遍欢迎，可是，它的大量使用也带来了严重的环境污染问题。
words.pinyin: Sùliàodài gěi rénmen de shēnghuó dàilái fāngbiàn, shòudào rénmen de pǔbiàn huānyíng, kěshì, tā de dàliàng shǐyòng yě dàiláile yánzhòng de huánjìng wūrǎn wèntí.
words.meaning: Plastic bags bring convenience to people's lives and are generally welcomed by people. However, their massive use has also brought serious environmental pollution problems.

words.hanzi: 于是，一些国家规定，超市、商场不能为顾客提供免费塑料袋，并且鼓励大家购买可以多次使用的购物袋。
words.pinyin: Yúshì, yìxiē guójiā guīdìng, chāoshì, shāngchǎng bù néng wèi gùkè tígōng miǎn fèi sùliàodài, bìngqiě gǔlì dàjiā gòumǎi kěyǐ duō cì shǐyòng de gòuwùdài.
words.meaning: Therefore, some countries regulate that supermarkets and shopping malls cannot provide free plastic bags to customers, and encourage everyone to buy reusable shopping bags.

words.hanzi: 我们每个人都有责任保护环境，因此，请大家节约使用塑料袋，或者购物时自备购物袋，甚至拒绝使用塑料袋。
words.pinyin: Wǒmen měi ge rén dōu yǒu zérèn bǎohù huánjìng, yīncǐ, qǐng dàjiā jiéyuē shǐyòng sùliàodài, huòzhě gòuwù shí zì bèi gòuwùdài, shènzhì jùjué shǐyòng sùliàodài.
words.meaning: Everyone of us has a responsibility to protect the environment. Therefore, please use plastic bags sparingly, or bring your own shopping bags when shopping, or even refuse to use plastic bags.

words.hanzi: 虽然这是一件很小的事，但这样做的数量减少塑料袋的使用数量，对环境保护有很大的作用。
words.pinyin: Suīrán zhè shì yí jiàn hěn xiǎo de shì, dàn zhèyàng zuò de shùliàng jiǎnshǎo sùliàodài de shǐyòng shùliàng, duì huánjìng bǎohù yǒu hěn dà de zuòyòng.
words.meaning: Although this is a very small thing, doing so reduces the number of plastic bags used, which has a great effect on environmental protection.

words.hanzi: 保护地球环境，并不是一件离我们很远、很难做到的事情。
words.pinyin: Bǎohù dìqiú huánjìng, bìng bú shì yí jiàn lí wǒmen hěn yuǎn, hěn nán zuòdào de shìqing.
words.meaning: Protecting the earth's environment is not something far away from us or difficult to achieve.

words.hanzi: 实际上，我们只需注意一下身边的小事就可以。
words.pinyin: Shíjìshang, wǒmen zhǐ xū zhùyì yíxià shēnbiān de xiǎoshì jiù kěyǐ.
words.meaning: In fact, we just need to pay attention to the small things around us.

words.hanzi: 例如，夏天把空调的温度开得高一些，出门时记得关空调和电脑，这样可以节约用电；
words.pinyin: Lìrú, xiàtiān bǎ kōngtiáo de wēndù kāi de gāo yìxiē, chū mén shí jìde guān kōngtiáo hé diànnǎo, zhèyàng kěyǐ jiéyuē yòng diàn;
words.meaning: For example, set the air conditioner temperature a bit higher in summer, and remember to turn off the air conditioner and computer when going out. This can save electricity;

words.hanzi: 少开车，多骑车或者乘坐地铁和公共汽车，这样能降低空气污染；
words.pinyin: Shǎo kāi chē, duō qí chē huòzhě chéngzuò dìtiě hé gōnggòng qìchē, zhèyàng néng jiàngdī kōngqì wūrǎn;
words.meaning: Drive less, ride bicycles or take subways and buses more. This can reduce air pollution;

words.hanzi: 还有养成把垃圾丢进垃圾桶的习惯什么的。
words.pinyin: Hái yǒu yǎngchéng bǎ lājī diū jìn lājītǒng de xíguàn shénmede.
words.meaning: Also, develop the habit of throwing trash into the trash can, etc.

words.hanzi: 这些是我们每个人都能做到的事，但却有实实在在的效果。
words.pinyin: Zhèxiē shì wǒmen měi ge rén dōu néng zuòdào de shì, dàn què yǒu shíshí-zàizài de xiàoguǒ.
words.meaning: These are things that everyone of us can do, but they have real effects.

words.hanzi: 地球是我们共同的家，只有大家共同努力，减少污染、保护环境，才能使我们的家变得更美丽。
words.pinyin: Dìqiú shì wǒmen gòngtóng de jiā, zhǐyǒu dàjiā gòngtóng nǔlì, jiǎnshǎo wūrǎn, bǎohù huánjìng, cái néng shǐ wǒmen de jiā biànde gèng měilì.
words.meaning: The earth is our common home. Only by working together to reduce pollution and protect the environment can we make our home more beautiful.

15.title: 教育孩子的艺术
15.title_pinyin: jiào yù hái zi de yì shù

words.hanzi: 王静：那个一边弹钢琴一边唱歌的男孩子是谁？表演得真棒！
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Nàge yìbiān tán gāngqín yìbiān chànggē de nán háizi shì shéi? Biǎoyǎn de zhēn bàng!
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Who is that boy singing while playing the piano? His performance is great!

words.hanzi: 李老师：是我孙子。去年寒假前的新年晚会他也表演过一次。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Shì wǒ sūnzi. Qùnián hánjià qián de xīnnián wǎnhuì tā yě biǎoyǎnguo yí cì.
words.meaning: Teacher Li: It's my grandson. He also performed once at the New Year's party before the winter vacation last year.

words.hanzi: 王静：我想起来了，这孩子又聪明又可爱，你们教育得真好！
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Wǒ xiǎngqǐlai le, zhè háizi yòu cōngming yòu kě'ài, nǐmen jiàoyù de zhēn hǎo!
words.meaning: Wang Jing: I remember now. This child is smart and cute. You educated him really well!

words.hanzi: 李老师：是他父母教育得好。父母是孩子最重要的老师。他父母不仅教他知识，而且还花了很多时间帮助他养成了非常好的习惯。现在他每天都自己练习弹钢琴。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Shì tā fùmǔ jiàoyù de hǎo. Fùmǔ shì háizi zuì zhòngyào de lǎoshī. Tā fùmǔ bùjǐn jiāo tā zhīshi, érqiě hái huāle hěn duō shíjiān bāngzhù tā yǎngchéngle fēicháng hǎo de xíguàn. Xiànzài tā měi tiān dōu zìjǐ liànxí tán gāngqín.
words.meaning: Teacher Li: It is his parents who educated him well. Parents are the most important teachers for children. His parents not only taught him knowledge but also spent a lot of time helping him develop very good habits. Now he practices playing the piano by himself every day.

words.hanzi: 王静：让孩子养成一个好习惯实在太重要了，看来我得向他父母好好儿学习。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Ràng háizi yǎngchéng yí ge hǎo xíguàn shízài tài zhòngyào le, kànlái wǒ děi xiàng tā fùmǔ hǎohāor xuéxí.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: It is really important to let children develop a good habit. It seems I have to learn from his parents.

words.hanzi: 李老师：对。如果希望有一个优秀的孩子，你就要先成为一位优秀的父亲或者母亲。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Duì. Rúguǒ xīwàng yǒu yí ge yōuxiù de háizi, nǐ jiù yào xiān chéngwéi yí wèi yōuxiù de fùqīn huòzhě mǔqīn.
words.meaning: Teacher Li: Correct. If you hope to have an excellent child, you must first become an excellent father or mother.

words.hanzi: 王静：看你脸色不太好，是不是昨晚没休息好？
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Kàn nǐ liǎnsè bú tài hǎo, shì bú shì zuówǎn méi xiūxi hǎo?
words.meaning: Wang Jing: You don't look very well. Did you not rest well last night?

words.hanzi: 孙月：别提了。我女儿昨晚做作业又做到11点。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Biétí le. Wǒ nǚ'ér zuówǎn zuò zuòyè yòu zuòdào shíyī diǎn.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Don't mention it. My daughter did her homework until 11 o'clock again last night.

words.hanzi: 王静：睡觉太晚对孩子的身体没有好处。最近孩子作业是不是太多了？
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Shuìjiào tài wǎn duì háizi de shēntǐ méiyǒu hǎochu. Zuìjìn háizi zuòyè shì bú shì tài duō le?
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Sleeping too late is not good for the child's body. Is there too much homework for the child recently?

words.hanzi: 孙月：主要是她做事情比较慢，比如早上闹钟响了她不醒，我赶时间送她上学，她又急着上厕所。每天因为这些小事批评她，弄得我俩心情都不好。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Zhǔyào shì tā zuò shìqing bǐjiào màn, bǐrú zǎoshang nàozhōng xiǎngle tā bù xǐng, wǒ gǎn shíjiān sòng tā shàng xué, tā yòu jízhe shàng cèsuǒ. Měi tiān yīnwèi zhèxiē xiǎoshì pīpíng tā, nòng de wǒ liǎ xīnqíng dōu bù hǎo.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Mainly because she does things slowly. For example, she doesn't wake up when the alarm rings in the morning. When I am in a hurry to send her to school, she rushes to go to the toilet. I criticize her every day because of these small things, making both of us in a bad mood.

words.hanzi: 王静：孩子做事慢，往往是因为他们不会安排自己的时间。你应该让孩子学会管理时间。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Háizi zuò shì màn, wǎngwǎng shì yīnwèi tāmen bú huì ānpái zìjǐ de shíjiān. Nǐ yīnggāi ràng háizi xuéhuì guǎnlǐ shíjiān.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Children doing things slowly is often because they don't know how to arrange their own time. You should let the child learn to manage time.

words.hanzi: 孙月：看来还是我的教育方法有问题。平时看她做事慢，总想替她做，以后得让她学会安排时间，自己的事情自己做。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Kànlái háishì wǒ de jiàoyù fāngfǎ yǒu wèntí. Píngshí kàn tā zuò shì màn, zǒng xiǎng tì tā zuò, yǐhòu děi ràng tā xuéhuì ānpái shíjiān, zìjǐ de shìqing zìjǐ zuò.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: It seems there is a problem with my education method. Usually when I see her doing things slowly, I always want to do it for her. In the future, I must let her learn to arrange time and do her own things.

words.hanzi: 王静：明天又要带我儿子去医院打针，想想我就头疼。他就怕打针，每次打针都哭得特别厉害。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Míngtiān yòu yào dài wǒ érzi qù yīyuàn dǎ zhēn, xiǎngxiang wǒ jiù tóu téng. Tā jiù pà dǎ zhēn, měi cì dǎ zhēn dōu kū de tèbié lìhai.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: I have to take my son to the hospital for an injection again tomorrow. Just thinking about it gives me a headache. He is afraid of injections and cries terribly every time.

words.hanzi: 孙月：记得我女儿小时候，带她去医院打针，刚开始，她害怕得要哭。我就小声地和护士说我女儿很勇敢，一点儿也不怕打针，女儿听了以后马上就不哭了。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Jìde wǒ nǚ'ér xiǎoshíhou, dài tā qù yīyuàn dǎ zhēn, gāng kāishǐ, tā hàipà de yào kū. Wǒ jiù xiǎoshēng de hé hùshi shuō wǒ nǚ'ér hěn yǒnggǎn, yìdiǎnr yě bú pà dǎ zhēn, nǚ'ér tīngle yǐhòu mǎshàng jiù bù kū le.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: I remember when my daughter was young, I took her to the hospital for an injection. At first, she was scared and about to cry. I whispered to the nurse that my daughter is very brave and is not afraid of injections at all. After hearing this, my daughter stopped crying immediately.

words.hanzi: 王静：原来鼓励和表扬对小孩儿挺有用的，下次我也试试。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Yuánlái gǔlì hé biǎoyáng duì xiǎoháir tǐng yǒuyòng de, xià cì wǒ yě shìshi.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: So encouragement and praise are quite useful for children. I'll try it next time too.

words.hanzi: 孙月：不过表扬也是一门艺术，表扬千万不要太多，过多的表扬可能会给孩子带来压力。不仅起不到鼓励的作用，还可能让孩子怀疑自己的能力，变得没有信心。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Búguò biǎoyáng yě shì yì mén yìshù, biǎoyáng qiānwàn búyào tài duō, guò duō de biǎoyáng kěnéng huì gěi háizi dàilái yālì. Bùjǐn qǐ bú dào gǔlì de zuòyòng, hái kěnéng ràng háizi huáiyí zìjǐ de néngli, biànde méiyǒu xìnxīn.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: However, praise is also an art. Never praise too much. Too much praise may bring pressure to the child. Not only will it not serve as encouragement, but it may also make the child suspect their own ability and become unconfident.

words.hanzi: 王静：那怎么表扬孩子才会更有效呢？
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Nà zěnme biǎoyáng háizi cái huì gèng yǒuxiào ne?
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Then how can praising children be more effective?

words.hanzi: 孙月：我认为表扬要及时，而且表扬不仅要看结果，更要看过程，这样才能鼓励他的积极性，让他变得勇敢，不怕困难。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Wǒ rènwéi biǎoyáng yào jíshí, érqiě biǎoyáng bùjǐn yào kàn jiéguǒ, gèng yào kàn guòchéng, zhèyàng cái néng gǔlì tā de jījíxìng, ràng tā biànde yǒnggǎn, bú pà kùnnan.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: I think praise should be timely. And praise should not only look at the result, but also the process. Only in this way can we encourage his enthusiasm, make him brave, and not fear difficulties.

words.hanzi: 有的孩子在得不到自己想要的东西的时候，会通过哭、扔东西或者故意敲打来引起父母的注意。
words.pinyin: Yǒude háizi zài débudào zìjǐ xiǎng yào de dōngxi de shíhou, huì tōngguò kū, rēng dōngxi huòzhě gùyì qiāodǎ lái yǐnqǐ fùmǔ de zhùyì.
words.meaning: Some children, when they don't get what they want, will cry, throw things, or intentionally knock on things to attract their parents' attention.

words.hanzi: 在这种情况下，建议父母先不要生气，应该停下手中的事情，陪孩子整理整理东西，和他聊聊天儿，弄清楚他们的问题。
words.pinyin: Zài zhè zhǒng qíngkuàng xià, jiànyì fùmǔ xiān búyào shēng qì, yīnggāi tíngxià shǒu zhōng de shìqing, péi háizi zhěnglǐ zhěnglǐ dōngxi, hé tā liáoliaotiānr, nòng qīngchu tāmen de wèntí.
words.meaning: In this situation, it is suggested that parents should not get angry first. They should stop what they are doing, help the child organize things, chat with him, and figure out their problems.

words.hanzi: 父母的关心，可以让孩子心情愉快起来。
words.pinyin: Fùmǔ de guānxīn, kěyǐ ràng háizi xīnqíng yúkuài qǐlái.
words.meaning: Parents' care can make children feel happy.

words.hanzi: 教育孩子应该选择合适的教育方法，最好不要为了解决问题而骗孩子，这是因为儿童缺少判断能力，看到父母骗人，他们也会学着说假话。
words.pinyin: Jiàoyù háizi yīnggāi xuǎnzé héshì de jiàoyù fāngfǎ, zuìhǎo búyào wèile jiějué wèntí ér piàn háizi, zhè shì yīnwèi értóng quēshǎo pànduàn néngli, kàndào fùmǔ piàn rén, tāmen yě huì xuézhe shuō jiǎhuà.
words.meaning: Educating children should choose appropriate educational methods. It is best not to lie to children to solve problems. This is because children lack judgment ability. If they see parents deceiving people, they will also learn to tell lies.

words.hanzi: 七岁左右的儿童普遍好动，坐不住，所以老师在教这个年龄段的孩子时，一定要想办法引起他们的兴趣。
words.pinyin: Qī suì zuǒyòu de értóng pǔbiàn hàodòng, zuòbuzhù, suǒyǐ lǎoshī zài jiāo zhège niánlíngduàn de háizi shí, yídìng yào xiǎng bànfǎ yǐnqǐ tāmen de xìngqù.
words.meaning: Children around seven years old are generally active and cannot sit still, so when teachers teach children of this age group, they must find ways to arouse their interest.

words.hanzi: 只有让他们觉得你教的内容有趣，他们才会愿意努力学习。
words.pinyin: Zhǐyǒu ràng tāmen juéde nǐ jiāo de nèiróng yǒuqù, tāmen cái huì yuànyì nǔlì xuéxí.
words.meaning: Only when they feel that the content you teach is interesting will they be willing to study hard.

words.hanzi: 当孩子不明白时，应该多鼓励他，不要用“懒”、“笨”、“粗心”这种词批评他，这样对他们的正常发展不好。
words.pinyin: Dāng háizi bù míngbai shí, yīnggāi duō gǔlì tā, búyào yòng "lǎn", "bèn", "cūxīn" zhè zhǒng cí pīpíng tā, zhèyàng duì tāmen de zhèngcháng fāzhǎn bù hǎo.
words.meaning: When a child doesn't understand, you should encourage him more. Don't criticize him with words like "lazy", "stupid", or "careless". This is not good for their normal development.

words.hanzi: 而且，对不同性格的孩子要使用不同的教育方法。
words.pinyin: Érqiě, duì bù tóng xìnggé de háizi yào shǐyòng bù tóng de jiàoyù fāngfǎ.
words.meaning: Moreover, different educational methods should be used for children with different personalities.

words.hanzi: 如果孩子比较骄傲，应该让他明白还有很多知识需要学习；
words.pinyin: Rúguǒ háizi bǐjiào jiāo'ào, yīnggāi ràng tā míngbai hái yǒu hěn duō zhīshi xūyào xuéxí;
words.meaning: If the child is proud, you should let him understand that there is still a lot of knowledge to learn;

words.hanzi: 要是孩子性格有些害羞，就要经常鼓励他说出自己的看法，这样才能让每一个孩子都健康地发展。
words.pinyin: Yàoshi háizi xìnggé yǒuxiē hàixiū, jiù yào jīngcháng gǔlì tā shuō chū zìjǐ de kànfǎ, zhèyàng cái néng ràng měi yí ge háizi dōu jiànkāng de fāzhǎn.
words.meaning: If the child is shy, you should often encourage him to express his views. Only in this way can every child develop healthily.

16.title: 生活可以更美好
16.title_pinyin: shēng huó kě yǐ gèng měi hǎo

words.hanzi: 小雨：你马上就要硕士毕业了吧？将来有什么打算？
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Nǐ mǎshàng jiù yào shuòshì bì yè le ba? Jiānglái yǒu shénme dǎsuàn?
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: You are graduating with a master's degree soon, right? What are your plans for the future?

words.hanzi: 小夏：我想出国读博士，一直在准备办签证需要的材料。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Wǒ xiǎng chū guó dú bóshì, yìzhí zài zhǔnbèi bàn qiānzhèng xūyào de cáiliào.
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: I want to go abroad to study for a doctorate. I have been preparing the materials needed for the visa application.

words.hanzi: 小雨：现在材料准备得怎么样了？
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Xiànzài cáiliào zhǔnbèi de zěnmeyàng le?
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: How are the materials prepared now?

words.hanzi: 小夏：成绩证明和护照已经准备好了，另外，还跟国外的大学取得了联系，填写了报名表格。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Chéngjì zhèngmíng hé hùzhào yǐjīng zhǔnbèi hǎo le, lìngwài, hái gēn guówài de dàxué qǔdéle liánxì, tiánxiěle bào míng biǎogé.
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: The grade certificate and passport are ready. In addition, I have contacted foreign universities and filled out the application form.

words.hanzi: 小雨：还应该有国外大学给你的邀请信吧？他们把邀请信传真给你了吗？
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Hái yīnggāi yǒu guówài dàxué gěi nǐ de yāoqǐngxìn ba? Tāmen bǎ yāoqǐngxìn chuánzhēn gěi nǐ le ma?
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: There should also be an invitation letter from the foreign university, right? Did they fax the invitation letter to you?

words.hanzi: 小夏：没有啊，下个星期我就要去使馆办签证了，这可怎么办？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Méiyǒu a, xià ge xīngqī wǒ jiù yào qù shǐguǎn bàn qiānzhèng le, zhè kě zěnme bàn?
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: No. I am going to the embassy to apply for a visa next week. What should I do?

words.hanzi: 小雨：这可是个大问题，我也不太清楚。我帮你查一下学校的电话号码，你打电话问一下吧。
words.pinyin: Xiǎoyǔ: Zhè kě shì ge dà wèntí, wǒ yě bú tài qīngchu. Wǒ bāng nǐ chá yíxià xuéxiào de diànhuà hàomǎ, nǐ dǎ diànhuà wèn yíxià ba.
words.meaning: Xiaoyu: This is a big problem, I'm not sure either. I'll help you find the school's phone number, you call and ask.

words.hanzi: 李进：谢谢您带我参观您的公司。在参观过程中我很激动，有个问题一直想问您。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Xièxie nín dài wǒ cānguān nín de gōngsī. Zài cānguān guòchéng zhōng wǒ hěn jīdòng, yǒu ge wèntí yìzhí xiǎng wèn nín.
words.meaning: Li Jin: Thank you for taking me to visit your company. I was very excited during the visit and have always wanted to ask you a question.

words.hanzi: 王老板：好啊！小伙子，咱们一边吃西瓜，一边聊。
words.pinyin: Wáng lǎobǎn: Hǎo a! Xiǎohuǒzi, zánmen yìbiān chī xīguā, yìbiān liáo.
words.meaning: Boss Wang: Sure! Young man, let's chat while eating watermelon.

words.hanzi: 李进：您从大学毕业开始工作，到现在才十年时间，怎么给公司赚了这么多钱？这让我非常吃惊。我想向您学习一下成功的经验。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Nín cóng dàxué bì yè kāishǐ gōngzuò, dào xiànzài cái shí nián shíjiān, zěnme gěi gōngsī zhuànle zhème duō qián? Zhè ràng wǒ fēicháng chī jīng. Wǒ xiǎng xiàng nín xuéxí yíxià chénggōng de jīngyàn.
words.meaning: Li Jin: You started working after graduating from university, and it has only been ten years now. How did you earn so much money for the company? This surprises me very much. I want to learn from your successful experience.

words.hanzi: 王老板：这个问题以前一个记者也问过我。做生意时虽然会遇到各种压力和困难，但是大家的机会都是相同的。这里有三块大小不同的西瓜，我们用西瓜的大小代表钱的多少，要是我们一起开始吃，你会先选哪块？
words.pinyin: Wáng lǎobǎn: Zhège wèntí yǐqián yí ge jìzhě yě wènguo wǒ. Zuò shēngyi shí suīrán huì yùdào gè zhǒng yālì hé kùnnan, dànshì dàjiā de jīhuì dōu shì xiāngtóng de. Zhèlǐ yǒu sān kuài dàxiǎo bù tóng de xīguā, wǒmen yòng xīguā de dàxiǎo dàibiǎo qián de duō shǎo, yàoshi wǒmen yìqǐ kāishǐ chī, nǐ huì xiān xuǎn nǎ kuài?
words.meaning: Boss Wang: A journalist asked me this question before. Although we encounter various pressures and difficulties when doing business, everyone's opportunities are the same. Here are three pieces of watermelon of different sizes. We use the size of the watermelon to represent the amount of money. If we start eating together, which piece would you choose first?

words.hanzi: 李进：我肯定先吃最大的一块了，难道您会先吃小的，放弃吃大块的机会吗？
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Wǒ kěndìng xiān chī zuì dà de yí kuài le, nándào nín huì xiān chī xiǎo de, fàngqì chī dà kuài de jīhuì ma?
words.meaning: Li Jin: I would definitely eat the biggest piece first. Would you eat the small one first and give up the opportunity to eat the big piece?

words.hanzi: 王老板：我会先吃最小的一块，因为在你吃完最大的那块时，我还有时间再多吃一块，最后一定比你吃的西瓜多。听完我的回答，恐怕你已经知道我的答案了吧。
words.pinyin: Wáng lǎobǎn: Wǒ huì xiān chī zuì xiǎo de yí kuài, yīnwèi zài nǐ chīwán zuì dà de nà kuài shí, wǒ hái yǒu shíjiān zài duō chī yí kuài, zuìhòu yídìng bǐ nǐ chī de xīguā duō. Tīngwán wǒ de huídá, kǒngpà nǐ yǐjīng zhīdào wǒ de dá'àn le ba.
words.meaning: Boss Wang: I would eat the smallest piece first, because by the time you finish eating the biggest piece, I still have time to eat another piece, and in the end, I will definitely have eaten more watermelon than you. After hearing my answer, I'm afraid you already know my answer.

words.hanzi: 小林：今年放假我又回不了家了，这次我父母又要失望了。你有什么计划？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Jīnnián fàng jià wǒ yòu huí bu liǎo jiā le, zhè cì wǒ fùmǔ yòu yào shīwàng le. Nǐ yǒu shénme jìhuà?
words.meaning: Xiaolin: I can't go home this holiday again. My parents will be disappointed again. What are your plans?

words.hanzi: 小李：我计划去郊区住一个月。你不是已经买好火车票了吗？你到底怎么打算的呀？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Wǒ jìhuà qù jiāoqū zhù yí ge yuè. Nǐ bú shì yǐjīng mǎihǎo huǒchē piào le ma? Nǐ dàodǐ zěnme dǎsuàn de ya?
words.meaning: Xiaoli: I plan to live in the suburbs for a month. Haven't you already bought the train ticket? What exactly do you plan to do?

words.hanzi: 小林：昨天一个外地的好朋友打电话说要来旅游，让我当导游，我实在不好意思拒绝。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Zuótiān yí ge wàidì de hǎo péngyou dǎ diànhuà shuō yào lái lǚyóu, ràng wǒ dāng dǎoyóu, wǒ shízài bù hǎoyìsi jùjué.
words.meaning: Xiaolin: Yesterday a good friend from out of town called and said he was coming to travel and asked me to be a tour guide. I really felt embarrassed to refuse.

words.hanzi: 小李：其实拒绝并不表示不愿意帮忙。遇到解决不了的问题或者无法完成的任务时，拒绝正好说明你对朋友负责。这也是对你父母负责的态度。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Qíshí jùjué bìng bù biǎoshì bú yuànyì bāng máng. Yùdào jiějué bù liǎo de wèntí huòzhě wúfǎ wánchéng de rènwu shí, jùjué zhènghǎo shuōmíng nǐ duì péngyou fùzé. Zhè yě shì duì nǐ fùmǔ fùzé de tàidu.
words.meaning: Xiaoli: Actually, refusing doesn't mean you are unwilling to help. When encountering problems that cannot be solved or tasks that cannot be completed, refusing just shows that you are responsible to your friend. This is also a responsible attitude towards your parents.

words.hanzi: 小林：既然别人找我帮忙，说明他真的很需要我的帮助。我担心要是说“不”的话，会让他误会和伤心。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Jìrán biéren zhǎo wǒ bāng máng, shuōmíng tā zhēn de hěn xūyào wǒ de bāngzhù. Wǒ dānxīn yàoshi shuō "bù" de huà, huì ràng tā wùhuì hé shāng xīn.
words.meaning: Xiaolin: Since someone asks me for help, it means he really needs my help. I'm worried that if I say "no", it will make him misunderstand and sad.

words.hanzi: 小李：别担心！如果你用一个既合适又礼貌的方法告诉朋友，他一定原谅你的。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Bié dānxīn! Rúguǒ nǐ yòng yí ge jì héshì yòu lǐmào de fāngfǎ gàosu péngyou, tā yídìng huì yuánliàng nǐ de.
words.meaning: Xiaoli: Don't worry! If you tell your friend in a way that is both appropriate and polite, he will definitely forgive you.

words.hanzi: 有些同学经常把“明天”和“将来”挂在嘴边，常说作业明天再完成，下次考试一定好好儿复习，等等。
words.pinyin: Yǒuxiē tóngxué jīngcháng bǎ "míngtiān" hé "jiānglái" guà zài zuǐ biān, cháng shuō zuòyè míngtiān zài wánchéng, xià cì kǎoshì yídìng hǎohāor fùxí, děngděng.
words.meaning: Some students often keep "tomorrow" and "future" on their lips, often saying that homework will be completed tomorrow, they will definitely review well for the next exam, etc.

words.hanzi: 这种态度会浪费时间，不但会让你的最后什么事情都做不成，而且还得不到别人的同情。
words.pinyin: Zhè zhǒng tàidu huì làngfèi shíjiān, búdàn huì ràng nǐ de zuìhòu shénme shìqing dōu zuò bu chéng, érqiě hái débudào biéren de tóngqíng.
words.meaning: This attitude will waste time. Not only will it cause you to accomplish nothing in the end, but you also won't get sympathy from others.

words.hanzi: 所以不要把什么事情都推到“明天”，一切从现在做起。
words.pinyin: Suǒyǐ búyào bǎ shénme shìqing dōu tuī dào "míngtiān", yíqiè cóng xiànzài zuòqǐ.
words.meaning: So don't push everything to "tomorrow", start everything from now.

words.hanzi: 就拿学习汉语来说吧，首先要注意课前预习，找出第二天要学习的重点；
words.pinyin: Jiù ná xuéxí Hànyǔ lái shuō ba, shǒuxiàn yào zhùyì kè qián yùxí, zhǎo chū dì èr tiān yào xuéxí de zhòngdiǎn;
words.meaning: Take learning Chinese for example. First of all, pay attention to previewing before class and find out the key points to be learned the next day;

words.hanzi: 其次，上课时要认真听，不能马虎；最后，课后要记得复习。只要这样，汉语就能越学越好，越说越自信。
words.pinyin: Qícì, shàng kè shí yào rènzhēn tīng, bù néng mǎhu; zuìhòu, kè hòu yào jìde fùxí. Zhǐyào zhèyàng, Hànyǔ jiù néng yuè xué yuè hǎo, yuè shuō yuè zìxìn.
words.meaning: Secondly, listen carefully during class and don't be careless; finally, remember to review after class. As long as you do this, you can learn Chinese better and better, and speak more and more confidently.

words.hanzi: 当你认为自己在哪怕方面很优秀时，千万要冷静，不要骄傲。
words.pinyin: Dāng nǐ rènwéi zìjǐ zài nǎ fāngmiàn hěn yōuxiù shí, qiānwàn yào lěngjìng, búyào jiāo'ào.
words.meaning: When you think you are excellent in some aspect, you must remain calm and not be arrogant.

words.hanzi: 因为这个世界很大，“天外有天，人外有人”，很可能有人在这方面比你更厉害。
words.pinyin: Yīnwèi zhège shìjiè hěn dà, "tiān wài yǒu tiān, rén wài yǒu rén", hěn kěnéng yǒurén zài zhè fāngmiàn bǐ nǐ gèng lìhai.
words.meaning: Because the world is big, "there is a sky beyond the sky, and there are people beyond people" (there is always someone better), and it is very likely that someone is better than you in this regard.

words.hanzi: 你现在是第一，并不表示你永远都是第一。就像比赛一样，没有人会永远输，也没有人会一直赢。
words.pinyin: Nǐ xiànzài shì dì yī, bìng bù biǎoshì nǐ yǒngyuǎn dōu shì dì yī. Jiù xiàng bǐsài yíyàng, méiyǒu rén huì yǒngyuǎn shū, yě méiyǒu rén huì yìzhí yíng.
words.meaning: You are number one now, but it doesn't mean you will always be number one. Just like in a competition, no one will lose forever, and no one will win all the time.

words.hanzi: 我们知道的越多，就会发现自己不懂的也越多。我们应该重视平时的积累，多向周围的人学习。
words.pinyin: Wǒmen zhīdào de yuè duō, jiù huì fāxiàn zìjǐ bù dǒng de yě yuè duō. Wǒmen yīnggāi zhòngshì píngshí de jīlěi, duō xiàng zhōuwéi de rén xuéxí.
words.meaning: The more we know, the more we discover what we don't understand. We should attach importance to daily accumulation and learn from the people around us.

words.hanzi: 如果你敢诚实地说出自己对哪方面不了解，并不说明自己比别人差，相反，这样敏更能得到别人的尊重。
words.pinyin: Rúguǒ nǐ gǎn chéngshí de shuō chū zìjǐ duì nǎ fāngmiàn bù liǎojiě, bìng bù shuōmíng zìjǐ bǐ biéren chà, xiāngfǎn, zhèyàng gèng néng dédào biéren de zūnzhòng.
words.meaning: If you dare to honestly state which aspects you don't understand, it doesn't mean you are worse than others; on the contrary, this will gain more respect from others.

words.hanzi: 小夏：最近天气越来越凉快了，风一刮，草地上就会有一层厚厚的黄叶，看来秋天已经到了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Zuìjìn tiānqì yuè lái yuè liángkuai le, fēng yì guā, cǎodì shang jiù huì yǒu yì céng hòuhòu de huángyè, kànlái qiūtiān yǐjīng dào le.
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: The weather is getting cooler recently. As soon as the wind blows, there is a thick layer of yellow leaves on the grass. It seems autumn has arrived.

words.hanzi: 安娜：这几天香山特别热闹，随着气温的降低，那里许多植物的叶子都由绿变黄或者变红，吸引了很多游客参观，咱们今天也去看看吧。
words.pinyin: Ānnà: Zhè jǐ tiān Xiāng Shān tèbié rènao, suízhe qìwēn de jiàngdī, nàli xǔduō zhíwù de yèzi dōu yóu lǜ biàn huáng huòzhě biàn hóng, xīyǐnle hěn duō yóukè cānguān, zánmen jīntiān yě qù kànkan ba.
words.meaning: Anna: Fragrant Hills has been very lively these days. With the temperature dropping, the leaves of many plants there have turned from green to yellow or red, attracting many tourists. Let's go and have a look today too.

words.hanzi: 小夏：你看天上的云，今天肯定有大雨。再说，香山上看红叶的人太了。咱们改天去长城吧，广播里说那里也有不少专门看红叶的好地方。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Nǐ kàn tiān shang de yún, jīntiān kěndìng yǒu dà yǔ. Zàishuō, Xiāng Shān shang kàn hóngyè de rén tài duō le. Zánmen gǎitiān qù Chángchéng ba, guǎngbō li shuō nàli yě yǒu bù shǎo zhuānmén kàn hóngyè de hǎo dìfang.
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: Look at the clouds in the sky, there will definitely be heavy rain today. Besides, there are too many people watching red leaves on Fragrant Hills. Let's go to the Great Wall another day. The broadcast said there are also many good places specially for watching red leaves.

words.hanzi: 安娜：真可惜，我还想多照点儿香山的照片呢。去长城倒是一个好主意，那我们明天去吧。
words.pinyin: Ānnà: Zhēn kěxī, wǒ hái xiǎng duō zhào diǎnr Xiāng Shān de zhàopiàn ne. Qù Chángchéng dào shì yí ge hǎo zhǔyi, nà wǒmen míngtiān qù ba.
words.meaning: Anna: What a pity, I wanted to take more photos of Fragrant Hills. Going to the Great Wall is a good idea, let's go tomorrow then.

words.hanzi: 小夏：明天恐怕也不行，明天是我爸的生日。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Míngtiān kǒngpà yě bù xíng, míngtiān shì wǒ bà de shēngrì.
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: I'm afraid tomorrow won't work either; tomorrow is my dad's birthday.

words.hanzi: 安娜：没关系，那我们再约时间。
words.pinyin: Ānnà: Méi guānxi, nà wǒmen zài yuē shíjiān.
words.meaning: Anna: It doesn't matter, we'll schedule another time.

words.hanzi: 小林：你的这只大黑狗毛真漂亮，而且这么聪明，每次见了都想抱一抱它。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Nǐ de zhè zhī dà hēi gǒu máo zhēn piàoliang, érqiě zhème cōngming, měi cì jiànle dōu xiǎng bào yi bào tā.
words.meaning: Xiaolin: Your big black dog's fur is really beautiful, and he is so smart. Every time I see him, I want to hug him.

words.hanzi: 小李：狗是很聪明的动物，只要稍微花点儿时间教教它，它就能学会很多东西。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Gǒu shì hěn cōngming de dòngwù, zhǐyào shāowēi huā diǎnr shíjiān jiāojiao tā, tā jiù néng xuéhuì hěn duō dōngxi.
words.meaning: Xiaoli: Dogs are very smart animals. As long as you spend a little time teaching them, they can learn many things.

words.hanzi: 小林：听你这么一说，我现在也想养一只狗了。每次你让它干什么，它就像能听懂你的话一样去傲。你教它是用了什么特别的方法？
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Tīng nǐ zhème yì shuō, wǒ xiànzài yě xiǎng yǎng yì zhī gǒu le. Měi cì nǐ ràng tā gàn shénme, tā jiù xiàng néng tīngdǒng nǐ de huà yíyàng qù zuò. Nǐ jiāo tā shì yòngle shénme tèbié de fāngfǎ?
words.meaning: Xiaolin: Hearing you say that, I want to raise a dog now too. Every time you ask him to do something, he does it as if he understands your words. What special method did you use to teach him?

words.hanzi: 小李：要让它完成一些任务，只教一次是不够的，应该耐心他一遍一遍地教给它，使它熟悉，然后它就会严格按照你的要求做了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Yào ràng tā wánchéng yìxiē rènwu, zhǐ jiāo yí cì shì bú gòu de, yīnggāi nàixīn de yí biàn yí biàn de jiāogěi tā, shǐ tā shúxī, ránhòu tā jiù huì yángé ànzhào nǐ de yāoqiú zuò le.
words.meaning: Xiaoli: To make him complete some tasks, teaching once is not enough. You should patiently teach him over and over again to make him familiar, and then he will do it strictly according to your requirements.

words.hanzi: 小林：看来没有想的那么容易。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lín: Kànlái méiyǒu xiǎng de nàme róngyì.
words.meaning: Xiaolin: It seems it's not as easy as I thought.

words.hanzi: 小李：狗是我们最好的朋友，它能听懂人的话，明白人的心情。在心你里难受的时候，它会一直陪着你。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Lǐ: Gǒu shì wǒmen zuì hǎo de péngyou, tā néng tīngdǒng rén de huà, míngbai rén de xīnqíng. Zài nǐ xīn li nánshòu de shíhou, tā huì yìzhí péizhe nǐ.
words.meaning: Xiaoli: Dogs are our best friends. They can understand human language and understand human moods. When you feel sad in your heart, it will always stay with you.

words.hanzi: 马克：上个月我去了趟北京动物园，那里约有500种动物，听导游说北京动物园是亚洲最大的动物园之一。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Shàng ge yuè wǒ qùle tàng Běijīng Dòngwùyuán, nàli yuē yǒu wǔbǎi zhǒng dòngwù, tīng dǎoyóu shuō Běijīng Dòngwùyuán shì Yàzhōu zuì dà de dòngwùyuán zhī yī.
words.meaning: Mark: I went to the Beijing Zoo last month. There are about 500 kinds of animals there. The tour guide said that the Beijing Zoo is one of the largest zoos in Asia.

words.hanzi: 小夏：去年放暑假的时候，我也去过一次，我在那儿看了马、熊猫、老虎等动物。我特别喜欢熊猫，可惜当时它们大多在睡觉。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Qùnián fàng shǔjià de shíhou, wǒ yě qùguo yí cì, wǒ zài nàr kànle mǎ, xióngmāo, lǎohǔ děng dòngwù. Wǒ tèbié xǐhuan xióngmāo, kěxī dāngshí tāmen dàduō zài shuìjiào.
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: I went there once during the summer vacation last year. I saw horses, pandas, tigers and other animals there. I especially like pandas, but unfortunately most of them were sleeping at that time.

words.hanzi: 马克：我去的那天正赶上六一儿童节，许多父母带着孩子去动物园。入口处排队的人很多，动物园里热闹极了。熊猫们也变得特别活泼，我还给它们照了不少照片呢。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Wǒ qù de nà tiān zhèng gǎnshàng Liùyī Értóngjié, xǔduō fùmǔ dàizhe háizi qù dòngwùyuán. Rùkǒuchù páiduì de rén hěn duō, dòngwùyuán li rènao jíle. Xióngmāomen yě biànde tèbié huópō, wǒ hái gěi tāmen zhàole bù shǎo zhàopiàn ne.
words.meaning: Mark: The day I went happened to be Children's Day on June 1st. Many parents took their children to the zoo. There were many people queuing at the entrance, and the zoo was extremely lively. The pandas also became very lively, and I took many photos of them.

words.hanzi: 小夏：大熊猫身子胖胖的，样子可爱极了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Dàxióngmāo shēnzi pàngpàng de, yàngzi kě'ài jíle.
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: Giant pandas have chubby bodies and look extremely cute.

words.hanzi: 马克：不过，它们数量不多，现在全世界一共才有一千多只吧。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Búguò, tāmen shùliàng bù duō, xiànzài quán shìjiè yígòng cái yǒu yìqiān duō zhī ba.
words.meaning: Mark: However, their number is small. There are only more than a thousand in the world now.

words.hanzi: 小夏：以前只有中国有大熊猫，为了表示友好，从1957年开始，中国把大熊猫作为礼物送给其他一些国家。现在，很多国家的人们在本国都能看到大熊猫了。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Xià: Yǐqián zhǐyǒu Zhōngguó yǒu dàxióngmāo, wèile biǎoshì yǒuhǎo, cóng yījiǔwǔqī nián kāishǐ, Zhōngguó bǎ dàxióngmāo zuòwéi lǐwù sònggěi qítā yìxiē guójiā. Xiànzài, hěn duō guójiā de rénmen zài běnguó dōu néng kàndào dàxióngmāo le.
words.meaning: Xiaoxia: Previously, only China had giant pandas. To show friendship, starting from 1957, China gave giant pandas as gifts to some other countries. Now, people in many countries can see giant pandas in their own countries.

words.hanzi: 不仅社会上的人与人之间有竞争，森林里的各种植物之间也有竞争，这一点儿也不奇怪。
words.pinyin: Bùjǐn shèhuì shang de rén yǔ rén zhījiān yǒu jìngzhēng, sēnlín li de gè zhǒng zhíwù zhījiān yě yǒu jìngzhēng, zhè yìdiǎnr yě bù qíguài.
words.meaning: Not only is there competition between people in society, but there is also competition between various plants in the forest. This is not strange at all.

words.hanzi: 植物会为了阳光、空气和水而竞争。一些高大的植物往往能获得更多的阳光、空气和水，而剩下的一些比较低矮的植物就只能长在这些高大植物的下面。
words.pinyin: Zhíwù huì wèile yángguāng, kōngqì hé shuǐ ér jìngzhēng. Yìxiē gāodà de zhíwù wǎngwǎng néng huòdé gèng duō de yángguāng, kōngqì hé shuǐ, ér shèngxià de yìxiē bǐjiào dī'ǎi de zhíwù jiù zhǐnéng zhǎng zài zhèxiē gāodà zhíwù de xiàmian.
words.meaning: Plants compete for sunlight, air and water. Some tall plants can often get more sunlight, air and water, while the remaining lower plants can only grow under these tall plants.

words.hanzi: 由于气候条件不同，世界各地植物叶子的样子也很不相同。
words.pinyin: Yóuyú qìhòu tiáojiàn bùtóng, shìjiè gèdì zhíwù yèzi de yàngzi yě hěn bù xiāngtóng.
words.meaning: Due to different climatic conditions, the appearance of plant leaves in various parts of the world is also very different.

words.hanzi: 在暖和、水分比较多的地方，叶子往往长得又大又厚；
words.pinyin: Zài nuǎnhuo, shuǐfèn bǐjiào duō de dìfang, yèzi wǎngwǎng zhǎng de yòu dà yòu hòu;
words.meaning: In warm places with more water, leaves often grow big and thick;

words.hanzi: 在阳光特别厉害、水分少的地方，叶子就会长得又细又长。
words.pinyin: Zài yángguāng tèbié lìhai, shuǐfèn shǎo de dìfang, yèzi jiù huì zhǎng de yòu xì yòu cháng.
words.meaning: In places with particularly strong sunlight and little water, leaves will grow thin and long.

words.hanzi: 地球上大约71%的地方是蓝色的海洋。
words.pinyin: Dìqiú shang dàyuē bǎi fēn zhī qīshíyī de dìfang shì lánsè de hǎiyáng.
words.meaning: About 71% of the earth is blue ocean.

words.hanzi: 在美丽的海底世界里，生活着各种各样的植物和动物。
words.pinyin: Zài měilì de hǎidǐ shìjiè li, shēnghuózhe gè zhǒng gè yàng de zhíwù hé dòngwù.
words.meaning: In the beautiful underwater world, various plants and animals live.

words.hanzi: 我们小时候都听过美人鱼的故事，其实真正的海底世界比故事里写的更美。
words.pinyin: Wǒmen xiǎoshíhou dōu tīngguo Měirényú de gùshi, qíshí zhēnzhèng de hǎidǐ shìjiè bǐ gùshi li xiě de gèng měi.
words.meaning: We all heard the story of the Little Mermaid when we were young. In fact, the real underwater world is more beautiful than written in the story.

words.hanzi: 科学研究发现，海洋底部看上去非常安静，然而却不是一点儿声音也没有，海底的动物们一直在“说话”，只不过人的耳朵是听不到的。
words.pinyin: Kēxué yánjiū fāxiàn, hǎiyáng dǐbù kàn shàngqu fēicháng ānjìng, rán'ér què bú shì yìdiǎnr shēngyīn yě méiyǒu, hǎidǐ de dòngwùmen yìzhí zài "shuō huà", zhǐbúguò rén de ěrduo shì tīngbudào de.
words.meaning: Scientific research has found that although the ocean floor looks very quiet, it is not without sound at all. Animals on the seabed are always "talking", only human ears cannot hear them.

words.hanzi: 另外，就算在几公里深的海底也仍然能看到东西，许多鱼会发出各种颜色的亮光，像一个个排列起来的灯，美极了，就像在梦里一样。
words.pinyin: Lìngwài, jiùsuàn zài jǐ gōnglǐ shēn de hǎidǐ yě réngrán néng kàndào dōngxi, xǔduō yú huì fāchū gè zhǒng yánsè de liàngguāng, xiàng yí ge ge páiliè qǐlái de dēng, měi jíle, jiù xiàng zài mèng li yíyàng.
words.meaning: In addition, even in the seabed several kilometers deep, you can still see things. Many fish emit light of various colors, like lights arranged one by one. It is extremely beautiful, just like in a dream.

words.hanzi: 孙月：上次女儿问我飞机是怎么起飞和降落的，真不知道该怎么回答她，她现在总是有各种各样的“为什么”。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Shàng cì nǚ'ér wèn wǒ fēijī shì zěnme qǐfēi hé jiàngluò de, zhēn bù zhīdào gāi zěnme huídá tā, tā xiànzài zǒngshì yǒu gè zhǒng gè yàng de “wèishénme”.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Last time my daughter asked me how airplanes take off and land. I really didn't know how to answer her. She always has all kinds of "whys" now.

words.hanzi: 王静：孩子眼中的世界是美丽和奇特的。有一本书叫《新十万个为什么》，现在卖得非常火。书里的内容都是儿童想知道的科学知识，相信你女儿一定喜欢。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Háizi yǎn zhōng de shìjiè shì měilì hé qítè de. Yǒu yì běn shū jiào《Xīn Shíwàn Gè Wèishénme》, xiànzài mài de fēicháng huǒ. Shū li de nèiróng dōu shì értóng xiǎng zhīdào de kēxué zhīshi, xiāngxìn nǐ nǚ'ér yídìng xǐhuan.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: The world in the eyes of children is beautiful and peculiar. There is a book called "The New Hundred Thousand Whys" which is selling very well right now. The content is all scientific knowledge that children want to know. I believe your daughter will definitely like it.

words.hanzi: 孙月：难道它和我们小时侯看的《十万个为什么》不一样吗？作者是谁啊？
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Nándào tā hé wǒmen xiǎoshíhou kàn de《Shíwàn Gè Wèishénme》bù yíyàng ma? Zuòzhě shì shéi a?
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Is it different from the "Hundred Thousand Whys" we read when we were young? Who is the author?

words.hanzi: 王静：作者的名字我没记住。《新十万个为什么》的内容更新，介绍了各种科学知识，包括地球、动物、植物、交通、科学技术、社会和文化等很多方面。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Zuòzhě de míngzi wǒ méi jìzhù.《Xīn Shíwàn Gè Wèishénme》de nèiróng gèng xīn, jièshàole gè zhǒng kēxué zhīshi, bāokuò dìqiú, dòngwù, zhíwù, jiāotōng, kēxué jìshù, shèhuì hé wénhuà děng hěn duō fāngmiàn.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: I didn't remember the author's name. "The New Hundred Thousand Whys" has newer content and introduces various scientific knowledge, including the earth, animals, plants, transportation, science and technology, society, culture, and many other aspects.

words.hanzi: 孙月：太好了！不过她这么小，我不知道她是否能读懂。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Tài hǎo le! Búguò tā zhème xiǎo, wǒ bù zhīdào tā shìfǒu néng dúdǒng.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: That's great! But she is so small, I don't know if she can understand it.

words.hanzi: 王静：放心吧，这本书的语言简单易懂，一定能增长孩子的科学知识。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Fàng xīn ba, zhè běn shū de yǔyán jiǎndān yìdǒng, yídìng néng zēngzhǎng háizi de kēxué zhīshi.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Don't worry, the language of this book is simple and easy to understand. It will definitely increase the child's scientific knowledge.

words.hanzi: 李老师：现在的大学生一遇到不明白的问题，可以马上在网上查答案，几秒钟就把问题解决了，这比我们上学的时候方便多了。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Xiànzài de dàxuéshēng yí yùdào bù míngbai de wèntí, kěyǐ mǎshàng zài wǎng shang chá dá'àn, jǐ miǎo zhōng jiù bǎ wèntí jiějué le, zhè bǐ wǒmen shàng xué de shíhou fāngbiàn duō le.
words.meaning: Li Laoshi: Nowadays, when college students encounter problems they don't understand, they can immediately look up answers online and solve the problem in a few seconds. This is much more convenient than when we were in school.

words.hanzi: 高老师：现在的人们，尤其是大学生开始普遍使用电脑，他们的生活已经离不开电脑。据调查，70%的人遇到问题时，首先想到的就是上网找答案。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Xiànzài de rénmen, yóuqí shì dàxuéshēng kāishǐ pǔbiàn shǐyòng diànnǎo, tāmen de shēnghuó yǐjīng lí bu kāi diànnǎo. Jù diàochá, bǎi fēn zhī qīshí de rén yùdào wèntí shí, shǒuxiàn xiǎngdào de jiù shì shàng wǎng zhǎo dá'àn.
words.meaning: Gao Laoshi: People nowadays, especially college students, have started to use computers universally, and their lives cannot be separated from computers. According to a survey, when 70% of people encounter a problem, the first thing they think of is to find the answer online.

words.hanzi: 李老师：电脑和互联网技术的发展使学生们的学习方式发生了变化，不过天天对着电脑看，眼睛实在受不了。
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Diànnǎo hé hùliánwǎng jìshù de fāzhǎn shǐ xuéshēngmen de xuéxí fāngshì fāshēngle hěn duō biànhuà, búguò tiāntiān duìzhe diànnǎo kàn, yǎnjing shízài shòubuliǎo.
words.meaning: Li Laoshi: The development of computer and internet technology has changed students' learning methods, but looking at the computer every day is really unbearable for the eyes.

words.hanzi: 高老师：不仅是学习方式，而且连生活方式也发生了很大改变。现在越来越来的学生喜欢在网上写日记，他们说这样可以让朋友及时了解自己的生活。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Bùjǐn shì xuéxí fāngshì, érqiě lián shēnghuó fāngshì yě fāshēngle hěn dà gǎibiàn. Xiànzài yuè lái yuè duō de xuéshēng xǐhuan zài wǎng shang xiě rìjì, tāmen shuō zhèyàng kěyǐ ràng péngyou jíshí liǎojiě zìjǐ de shēnghuó.
