words.meaning: Gao Laoshi: Not only learning methods but even lifestyles have undergone great changes. Now more and more students like to write diaries online. They say this allows friends to know about their lives in time.

words.hanzi: 李老师：这个办法不错，既能方便大家的交流，还能节约用纸，保护环境。但是如果别人都能看到我的日记的话，多不安全啊！
words.pinyin: Lǐ lǎoshī: Zhège bànfǎ búcuò, jì néng fāngbiàn dàjiā de jiāoliú, hái néng jiéyuē yòng zhǐ, bǎohù huánjìng. Dànshì rúguǒ biéren dōu néng kàndào wǒ de rìjì de huà, duō bù ānquán a!
words.meaning: Li Laoshi: This method is good. It not only facilitates communication but also saves paper and protects the environment. But if everyone can see my diary, how unsafe that is!

words.hanzi: 高老师：放心吧，可以给网上的日记加密玛，那样只有得到了允许，别人才能看到。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Fàng xīn ba, kěyǐ gěi wǎng shang de rìjì jiā mìmǎ, nàyàng zhǐyǒu dédàole yǔnxǔ, biéren cái néng kàndào.
words.meaning: Gao Laoshi: Don't worry, you can encrypt your online diary. That way, others can only see it if they have permission.

words.hanzi: 王静：我昨天晚上做了一个特别奇怪的梦，梦到自己正在一座桥上走，走着走着，突然开过来一辆车，非常危险，接着又梦见我跳到车上，跟警察一起抓住了一个坏人。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Wǒ zuótiān wǎnshang zuòle yí ge tèbié qíguài de mèng, mèngdào zìjǐ zhèngzài yí zuò qiáo shang zǒu, zǒuzhe zǒuzhe, tūrán kāi guòlai yí liàng chē, fēicháng wēixiǎn, jiēzhe yòu mèngjiàn wǒ tiàodào chē shang, gēn jǐngchá yìqǐ zhuāzhùle yí ge huàirén.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: I had a particularly strange dream last night. I dreamed that I was walking on a bridge. As I was walking, a car suddenly drove over. It was very dangerous. Then I dreamed that I jumped onto the car and caught a bad guy with the police.

words.hanzi: 孙月：奇怪，你怎么总能记住自己做了什么梦？我好像从来没做过梦。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Qíguài, nǐ zěnme zǒng néng jìzhù zìjǐ zuòle shénme mèng? Wǒ hǎoxiàng cónglái méi zuòguo mèng.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Strange, how can you always remember what dreams you had? I seem to have never dreamed.

words.hanzi: 王静：每个人都会做梦，区别只是有多少。有的人睡醒之后还记得梦里的事情，有的人却记不清楚了。你之所以觉得从来没做过梦，只不过是忘记了。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Měi ge rén dōu huì zuò mèng, qūbié zhǐshì yǒu duō shǎo. Yǒude rén shuìxǐng zhīhòu hái jìde mèng li de shìqing, yǒude rén què jì bu qīngchu le. Nǐ zhīsuǒyǐ juéde cónglái méi zuòguo mèng, zhǐbúguò shì wàngjì le.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Everyone dreams; the only difference is how much. Some people remember things in their dreams after waking up, while others don't remember clearly. The reason you feel you have never dreamed is just that you forgot.

words.hanzi: 孙月：你说的有道理，我一般都是一觉睡到天亮。很多人认为做梦是上天要告诉他们将来发生的一些事情，可能上天不想让我知道吧。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Nǐ shuō de yǒu dàolǐ, wǒ yìbān dōu shì yí jiào shuìdào tiānliàng. Hěn duō rén rènwéi zuò mèng shì shàngtiān yào gàosu tāmen jiānglái fāshēng de yìxiē shìqing, kěnéng shàngtiān bù xiǎng ràng wǒ zhīdào ba.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: What you said makes sense. I usually sleep until dawn. Many people think that dreaming is God trying to tell them something that will happen in the future. Maybe God doesn't want me to know.

words.hanzi: 王静：一般晚上睡觉时，身体感觉到什么，人就容易梦到什么内容。记得有一次，我晚饭吃得太咸，那天晚上就梦见自己到处找商店买矿泉水。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Yìbān wǎnshang shuì jiào shí, shēntǐ gǎnjuédào shénme, rén jiù róngyì mèngdào shénme nèiróng. Jìde yǒu yí cì, wǒ wǎnfàn chī de tài xián, nà tiān wǎnshang jiù mèngjiàn zìjǐ dàochù zhǎo shāngdiàn mǎi kuàngquánshuǐ.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Generally, when sleeping at night, whatever the body feels, the person is likely to dream about that content. I remember once I ate too salty dinner, and that night I dreamed that I was looking for shops everywhere to buy mineral water.

words.hanzi: 孙月：很多人都试着对梦进行解释，有些人甚至专门写过这方面的书，可惜到现在还没有一个科学的说法。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Hěn duō rén dōu shìzhe duì mèng jìnxíng jiěshì, yǒuxiē rén shènzhì zhuānmén xiěguo zhè fāngmiàn de shū, kěxī dào xiànzài hái méiyǒu yí ge kēxué de shuōfǎ.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Many people try to interpret dreams. Some people have even written books on this subject. Unfortunately, there is no scientific explanation yet.

words.hanzi: 现在手机不但价格降低了，而且作用也越来越大，打电话、发短信已经成了人们普遍使用的联系方法。
words.pinyin: Xiànzài shǒujī búdàn jiàgé jiàngdī le, érqiě zuòyòng yě yuè lái yuè dà, dǎ diànhuà, fā duǎnxìn yǐjīng chéngle rénmen pǔbiàn shǐyòng de liánxì fāngfǎ.
words.meaning: Nowadays, mobile phones have not only decreased in price but also increased in function. Making calls and sending text messages have become common contact methods used by people.

words.hanzi: 除此之外，你还可以用它来听音乐、看电影、阅读、玩儿游戏、付款购物等，这大大方便了人们的生活。
words.pinyin: Chúcǐzhīwài, nǐ hái kěyǐ yòng tā lái tīng yīnyuè, kàn diànyǐng, yuèdú, wánr yóuxì, fù kuǎn gòuwù děng, zhè dàdà fāngbiànle rénmen de shēnghuó.
words.meaning: Besides this, you can also use it to listen to music, watch movies, read, play games, pay for shopping, etc., which has greatly facilitated people's lives.

words.hanzi: 举一个例子，迷路时，只要用手机地图查一下地址，马上就能知道怎么去那个地点。
words.pinyin: Jǔ yí ge lìzi, mí lù shí, zhǐyào yòng shǒujī dìtú chá yíxià dìzhǐ, mǎshàng jiù néng zhīdào zěnme qù nàge dìdiǎn.
words.meaning: To give an example, when you get lost, just check the address with the mobile map, and you will immediately know how to get to that location.

words.hanzi: 现在的手机更像是一部可以拿在手中的电脑，现代人的生活已经越来越离不开手机了。
words.pinyin: Xiànzài de shǒujī gèng xiàng shì yí bù kěyǐ ná zài shǒu zhōng de diànnǎo, xiàndài rén de shēnghuó yǐjīng yuè lái yuè lí bu kāi shǒujī le.
words.meaning: Current mobile phones are more like computers that can be held in the hand. Modern people's lives are becoming more and more inseparable from mobile phones.

words.hanzi: 21世纪，我们的生活发生了巨大变化。
words.pinyin: Èrshíyī shìjì, wǒmen de shēnghuó fāshēngle jùdà biànhuà.
words.meaning: In the 21st century, our lives have undergone tremendous changes.

words.hanzi: 几千公里以外的国家，以前坐船需要几个月，现在乘坐飞机不过十几个小时。
words.pinyin: Jǐ qiān gōnglǐ yǐwài de guójiā, yǐqián zuò chuán xūyào jǐ ge yuè, xiànzài chéngzuò fēijī búguò shí jǐ ge xiǎoshí.
words.meaning: For countries thousands of kilometers away, it used to take several months by boat, but now it takes only a dozen hours by plane.

words.hanzi: 原来寄信需要好几天，现在连邮局都不用去，只要在家里上网发个电子邮件，用不了一分钟，远处的就能收到，比写信封用的时间都短。
words.pinyin: Yuánlái jì xìn xūyào hǎo jǐ tiān, xiànzài lián yóujú dōu búyòng qù, zhǐyào zài jiā li shàng wǎng fā ge diànzǐ yóujiàn, yòng bu liǎo yì fēnzhōng, yuǎn chù de péngyou jiù néng shōudào, bǐ xiě xìnfēng yòng de shíjiān dōu duǎn.
words.meaning: It used to take several days to mail a letter. Now you don't even need to go to the post office. Just send an email online at home, and it takes less than a minute for friends far away to receive it, which is shorter than the time it takes to write an envelope.

words.hanzi: 以前外地的新闻要几天后才能知道，现在只要打开网站，任何信息都可以在第一时间获得。
words.pinyin: Yǐqián wàidì de xīnwén yào jǐ tiān hòu cái néng zhīdào, xiànzài zhǐyào dǎkāi wǎngzhàn, rènhé xìnxī dōu kěyǐ zài dì yī shíjiān huòdé.
words.meaning: Previously, news from other places took a few days to know. Now, as long as you open a website, any information can be obtained immediately.

words.hanzi: 现代科学技术的发展让世界变得越来越小，所以现在人们都把地球叫做“地球村”。
words.pinyin: Xiàndài kēxué jìshù de fāzhǎn ràng shìjiè biàn de yuè lái yuè xiǎo, suǒyǐ xiànzài rénmen dōu bǎ dìqiú jiàozuò “Dìqiú Cūn”.
words.meaning: The development of modern science and technology has made the world smaller and smaller, so now people call the earth the "Global Village".

words.hanzi: 马克：老师，您好！我希望下个学期在这里继续学习，请问还需要重新申请吗？
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Lǎoshī, nín hǎo! Wǒ xīwàng xià ge xuéqī zài zhèlǐ jìxù xuéxí, qǐngwèn hái xūyào chóngxīn shēnqǐng ma?
words.meaning: Mark: Teacher, hello! I hope to continue studying here next semester. Do I need to re-apply?

words.hanzi: 高老师：是的。给你表格，出生年月、性别、护照号码都要填，还有联系地址、联系电话。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Shì de. Gěi nǐ biǎogé, chūshēng niányuè, xìngbié, hùzhào hàomǎ dōu yào tián, hái yǒu liánxì dìzhǐ, liánxì diànhuà.
words.meaning: Gao Laoshi: Yes. Here is the form. You must fill in your date of birth, gender, and passport number, as well as your contact address and phone number.

words.hanzi: 马克：真抱歉，我不小心把护照号码填错了，您能再给我一份新的申请表吗？
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Zhēn bàoqiàn, wǒ bù xiǎoxīn bǎ hùzhào hàomǎ tiáncuò le, nín néng zài gěi wǒ yí fèn xīn de shēnqǐngbiǎo ma?
words.meaning: Mark: I'm really sorry, I accidentally filled in the passport number wrong. Can you give me a new application form?

words.hanzi: 高老师：没关系，不用道歉，谁都有粗心填错的时候。申请表都被别人拿走了，我给你重新打印一份，你等一下。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Méi guānxi, búyòng dào qiàn, shéi dōu yǒu cūxīn tiáncuò de shíhou. Shēnqǐngbiǎo dōu bèi biéren názǒu le, wǒ gěi nǐ chóngxīn dǎyìn yí fèn, nǐ děng yíxià.
words.meaning: Gao Laoshi: It doesn't matter, no need to apologize. Everyone has careless moments when they fill things out wrong. The application forms have all been taken by others. I will print a new one for you. Wait a moment.

words.hanzi: (高老师打印，马克填表。)
words.pinyin: (Gāo lǎoshī dǎyìn, Mǎkè tián biǎo.)
words.meaning: (Teacher Gao prints, Mark fills in the form.)

words.hanzi: 马克：这次我按照要求都填写完了，请问还需要做别的事情吗？
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Zhè cì wǒ ànzhào yāoqiú dōu tiánxiě wán le, qǐngwèn hái xūyào zuò biéde shìqing ma?
words.meaning: Mark: This time I have filled it out according to the requirements. Do I need to do anything else?

words.hanzi: 高老师：请把你的护照给我，我们要把护照复印一下。
words.pinyin: Gāo lǎoshī: Qǐng bǎ nǐ de hùzhào gěi wǒ, wǒmen yào bǎ hùzhào fùyìn yíxià.
words.meaning: Gao Laoshi: Please give me your passport, we need to photocopy it.

words.hanzi: 李进：呀，你的手怎么流血了？等一下，我给你包起来。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Ya, nǐ de shǒu zěnme liú xiě le? Děng yíxià, wǒ gěi nǐ bāo qǐlai.
words.meaning: Li Jin: Oh, why is your hand bleeding? Wait a moment, I'll wrap it up for you.

words.hanzi: 王静：没关系，我想给你做点儿羊肉饺子，刚才用刀切肉的时候把手弄破了。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Méi guānxi, wǒ xiǎng gěi nǐ zuò diǎnr yángròu jiǎozi, gāngcái yòng dāo qiē ròu de shíhou bǎ shǒu nòngpò le.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: It's okay. I wanted to make some mutton dumplings for you. I cut my hand when I was slicing the meat just now.

words.hanzi: 李进：你也太不小心了，不过好像不太严重，过几天就好了。衣服上也有点儿血，你把衣服脱下来，我给你洗洗。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Nǐ yě tài bù xiǎoxīn le, búguò hǎoxiàng bú tài yánzhòng, guò jǐ tiān jiù hǎo le. Yīfu shang yě yǒu diǎnr xiě, nǐ bǎ yīfu tuō xiàlai, wǒ gěi nǐ xǐxi.
words.meaning: Li Jin: You are too careless. But it doesn't seem very serious, it will be fine in a few days. There is also a little blood on your clothes. Take off your clothes and I will wash them for you.

words.hanzi: 王静：看来今天吃不上羊肉饺子了。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Kànlái jīntiān chī bu shàng yángròu jiǎozi le.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: It seems we can't eat mutton dumplings today.

words.hanzi: 李进：那我们就吃点儿别的。我常去的那家理发店附近有个餐厅，那里的包子很好吃，我一会儿去买一点儿。
words.pinyin: Lǐ Jìn: Nà wǒmen jiù chī diǎnr biéde. Wǒ cháng qù de nà jiā lǐfàdiàn fùjìn yǒu ge cāntīng, nàli de bāozi hěn hǎochī, wǒ yíhuìr qù mǎi yìdiǎnr.
words.meaning: Li Jin: Then let's eat something else. There is a restaurant near the barbershop I often go to. The steamed buns there are very delicious. I will go buy some in a while.

words.hanzi: 王静：好吧，我衣服口袋里有十几块零钱，买包子应该够。
words.pinyin: Wáng Jìng: Hǎo ba, wǒ yīfu kǒudài li yǒu shí jǐ kuài língqián, mǎi bāozi yīnggāi gòu.
words.meaning: Wang Jing: Okay. I have more than ten yuan in small change in my pocket. It should be enough to buy steamed buns.

words.hanzi: 马克：我早上跟你打招呼，你没看见。想不到又在这里碰见你了。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Wǒ zǎoshang gēn nǐ dǎ zhāohu, nǐ méi kànjiàn. Xiǎngbudào yòu zài zhèlǐ pèngjiàn nǐ le.
words.meaning: Mark: I greeted you this morning, but you didn't see me. I didn't expect to meet you here again.

words.hanzi: 安娜：真是对不起，我不是故意的，今天早上我忘戴眼镜了，看不清楚。
words.pinyin: Ānnà: Zhēnshì duìbuqǐ, wǒ bú shì gùyì de, jīntiān zǎoshang wǒ wàng dài yǎnjìng le, kàn bu qīngchu.
words.meaning: Anna: I'm really sorry, I didn't mean it. I forgot to wear glasses this morning and couldn't see clearly.

words.hanzi: 马克：刚才我在旁边看到你跳中国舞了，没看出来你跳得这么好！难道你以前在你们国家就学过中国舞蹈吗？
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Gāngcái wǒ zài pángbiān kàndào nǐ tiào Zhōngguó wǔ le, méi kàn chūlai nǐ tiào de zhème hǎo! Nándào nǐ yǐqián zài nǐmen guójiā jiù xuéguo Zhōngguó wǔdǎo ma?
words.meaning: Mark: I saw you dancing Chinese dance from the side just now. I didn't realize you danced so well! Did you learn Chinese dance in your country before?

words.hanzi: 安娜：我小时候妈妈教我跳过两年的舞，所以稍微有点儿基础。再说，舞蹈是一门艺术，也是一种“语言”，这种语言与国籍无关，无论哪个国家的人都能看懂。
words.pinyin: Ānnà: Wǒ xiǎoshíhou māma jiāo wǒ tiàoguo liǎng nián de wǔ, suǒyǐ shāowēi yǒu diǎnr jīchǔ. Zàishuō, wǔdǎo shì yì mén yìshù, yě shì yì zhǒng “yǔyán”, zhè zhǒng yǔyán yǔ guójí wúguān, wúlùn nǎ ge guójiā de rén dōu néng kàndǒng.
words.meaning: Anna: My mother taught me to dance for two years when I was young, so I have a little foundation. Besides, dance is an art and a "language". This language has nothing to do with nationality. People from any country can understand it.

words.hanzi: 马克：太好了！我刚学习跳这种舞没多久，你帮我看看，我的这个动作对不对。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Tài hǎo le! Wǒ gāng xuéxí tiào zhè zhǒng wǔ méi duō jiǔ, nǐ bāng wǒ kànkan, wǒ de zhège dòngzuò duì bu duì.
words.meaning: Mark: Great! I haven't been learning this dance for long. Help me check if this movement is correct.

words.hanzi: 安娜：你这个动作做得还是不太标准，我给你跳一遍。你仔细看着，应该像我这样：先抬胳膊，然后抬腿，最后头再向右转一下。
words.pinyin: Ānnà: Nǐ zhège dòngzuò zuò de háishì bú tài biāozhǔn, wǒ gěi nǐ tiào yí biàn. Nǐ zǐxì kànzhe, yīnggāi xiàng wǒ zhèyàng: xiān tái gēbo, ránhòu tái tuǐ, zuìhòu tóu zài xiàng yòu zhuǎn yíxià.
words.meaning: Anna: Your movement is still not quite standard. I'll dance it for you once. Watch carefully, it should be like this: first lift your arm, then lift your leg, and finally turn your head to the right.

words.hanzi: 马克去年租的房子离马路很近，对面有大大小小的商店，周围环境非常吵。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè qùnián zū de fángzi lí mǎlù hěn jìn, duìmiàn yǒu dàdà-xiǎoxiǎo de shāngdiàn, zhōuwéi huánjìng fēicháng chǎo.
words.meaning: The house Mark rented last year is very close to the road, with shops of all sizes opposite, and the surrounding environment is very noisy.

words.hanzi: 所以，房子还没到期，马克就开始着急换房子了。
words.pinyin: Suǒyǐ, fángzi hái méi dàoqī, Mǎkè jiù kāishǐ zháojí huàn fángzi le.
words.meaning: So, before the lease expired, Mark started to get anxious about changing houses.

words.hanzi: 有一天，他在小区门口看到一个租房子的广告。广告上说房子交通方便，周围很安静，厨房很大。
words.pinyin: Yǒu yì tiān, tā zài xiǎoqū ménkǒu kàndào yí ge zū fángzi de guǎnggào. Guǎnggào shang shuō fángzi jiāotōng fāngbiàn, zhōuwéi hěn ānjìng, chúfáng hěn dà.
words.meaning: One day, he saw a house rental advertisement at the gate of the residential area. The advertisement said that the house has convenient transportation, the surroundings are quiet, and the kitchen is large.

words.hanzi: 总的来说，这套房子他很满意，于是他就记下了房东的手机号码。
words.pinyin: Zǒng de lái shuō, zhè tào fángzi tā hěn mǎnyì, yúshì tā jiù jìxiàle fángdōng de shǒujī hàomǎ.
words.meaning: All in all, he was very satisfied with the apartment, so he wrote down the landlord's mobile number.

words.hanzi: 可回家后打电话，电话总是占线。第二天，他路过小区门口时，又仔细看了一下广告，原来在记号码的时候写错了一个数字。
words.pinyin: Kě huí jiā hòu dǎ diànhuà, diànhuà zǒngshì zhànxiàn. Dì-èr tiān, tā lùguò xiǎoqū ménkǒu shí, yòu zǐxì kànle yíxià guǎnggào, yuánlái zài jì hàomǎ de shíhou xiěcuòle yí ge shùzì.
words.meaning: But when he called after returning home, the line was always busy. The next day, when he passed the gate of the residential area, he looked at the advertisement carefully again. It turned out that he had written a wrong digit when copying the number.

words.hanzi: 很多外国人认为所有中国人都会功夫和乒乓球，其实只是喜爱这两项运动的中国人比较多。
words.pinyin: Hěn duō wàiguó rén rènwéi suǒyǒu Zhōngguó rén dōu huì gōngfu hé pīngpāngqiú, qíshí zhǐshì xǐ'ài zhè liǎng xiàng yùndòng de Zhōngguó rén bǐjiào duō.
words.meaning: Many foreigners think that all Chinese people know Kung Fu and Ping Pong. Actually, it's just that there are many Chinese people who like these two sports.

words.hanzi: 中国人特别喜欢打乒乓球，在中国你随处都可以看到乒乓球桌。
words.pinyin: Zhōngguó rén tèbié xǐhuan dǎ pīngpāngqiú, zài Zhōngguó nǐ suíchù dōu kěyǐ kàndào pīngpāngqiú zhuō.
words.meaning: Chinese people especially like playing table tennis. You can see table tennis tables everywhere in China.

words.hanzi: 像乒乓球、羽毛球、跑步等运动对条件要求不高，所以它们都成为了人们运动不错的选择。
words.pinyin: Xiàng pīngpāngqiú, yǔmáoqiú, pǎobù děng yùndòng duì tiáojiàn yāoqiú bù gāo, suǒyǐ tāmen dōu chéngwéile rénmen yùndòng búcuò de xuǎnzé.
words.meaning: Sports like table tennis, badminton, and running do not have high requirements for conditions, so they have become good choices for people to exercise.

words.hanzi: 人们常说“生命在于运动”，所以很多人一到周末就会到体育馆打几场球。
words.pinyin: Rénmen cháng shuō "shēngmìng zàiyú yùndòng", suǒyǐ hěn duō rén yí dào zhōumò jiù huì dào tǐyùguǎn dǎ jǐ chǎng qiú.
words.meaning: People often say "life lies in movement", so many people go to the gym to play a few games as soon as the weekend arrives.

words.hanzi: “乒乓球”这个名字也很有意思，“乒”和“乓”就是打球时发出的声音。
words.pinyin: "Pīngpāngqiú" zhège míngzi yě hěn yǒu yìsi, "pīng" hé "pāng" jiù shì dǎ qiú shí fāchū de shēngyīn.
words.meaning: The name "Ping Pong" is also very interesting. "Ping" and "Pong" are the sounds made when playing the ball.

words.hanzi: 在看乒乓球比赛时，尤其是在运动员发球的时候，观众要安静，禁止大声讲话或者离开座位随便走动。
words.pinyin: Zài kàn pīngpāngqiú bǐsài shí, yóuqí shì zài yùndòngyuán fā qiú de shíhou, guānzhòng yào ānjìng, jìnzhǐ dàshēng jiǎnghuà huòzhě líkāi zuòwèi suíbiàn zǒudòng.
words.meaning: When watching a table tennis match, especially when the athlete is serving, the audience must be quiet. Loud talking or leaving seats to walk around is prohibited.

words.hanzi: 朋友：该加油了，去机场的路上有加油站吗？
words.pinyin: Péngyou: Gāi jiā yóu le, qù jīchǎng de lù shang yǒu jiāyóuzhàn ma?
words.meaning: Friend: It's time to refuel. Is there a gas station on the way to the airport?

words.hanzi: 小张：我记得过了长江大桥往右一拐就有一个，大概有四五公里远。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Zhāng: Wǒ jìde guòle Chángjiāng Dàqiáo wǎng yòu yì guǎi jiù yǒu yí ge, dàgài yǒu sì wǔ gōnglǐ yuǎn.
words.meaning: Xiao Zhang: I remember there is one if you turn right after crossing the Yangtze River Bridge, about four or five kilometers away.

words.hanzi: 朋友：好，那我就放心了，别开着开着没油了。你去北京的航班是几点的？时间来得及吗？
words.pinyin: Péngyou: Hǎo, nà wǒ jiù fàng xīn le, bié kāizhe kāizhe méi yóu le. Nǐ qù Běijīng de hángbān shì jǐ diǎn de? Shíjiān láidejí ma?
words.meaning: Friend: Good, then I'm relieved. Don't want to run out of gas while driving. What time is your flight to Beijing? Is there enough time?

words.hanzi: 小张：航班本来是十点的，后来机场网站上通知推迟了一个小时，所以九点半以前到就应该没问题。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Zhāng: Hángbān běnlái shì shí diǎn de, hòulái jīchǎng wǎngzhàn shang tōngzhī tuīchíle yí ge xiǎoshí, suǒyǐ jiǔ diǎn bàn yǐqián dào jiù yīnggāi méi wèntí.
words.meaning: Xiao Zhang: The flight was originally at ten o'clock, but later the airport website notified that it was delayed by an hour, so arriving before 9:30 should be no problem.

words.hanzi: 朋友：刚才我还有点儿担心来不及呢。一会儿加完油，往西走五百米就能上高速公路。走高速公路大约半个小时就到了。
words.pinyin: Péngyou: Gāngcái wǒ hái yǒudiǎnr dānxīn láibují ne. Yíhuìr jiāwán yóu, wǎng xī zǒu wǔbǎi mǐ jiù néng shàng gāosù gōnglù. Zǒu gāosù gōnglù dàyuē bàn ge xiǎoshí jiù dào le.
words.meaning: Friend: I was a little worried just now that we wouldn't make it. After refueling in a while, go west for 500 meters and we can get on the expressway. It takes about half an hour on the expressway.

words.hanzi: 小张：一会儿我自己进去换登机牌，你就不用送我了，等我到了首都机场再给你发短信。
words.pinyin: Xiǎo Zhāng: Yíhuìr wǒ zìjǐ jìnqu huàn dēngjīpái, nǐ jiù búyòng sòng wǒ le, děng wǒ dàole Shǒudū Jīchǎng zài gěi nǐ fā duǎnxìn.
words.meaning: Xiao Zhang: I will go in and change the boarding pass myself later, you don't need to see me off. I will send you a text message when I arrive at the Capital Airport.

words.hanzi: 孙月：女儿下个星期就要放寒假了，到时候咱们带她去旅游，放松放松，怎么样？
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Nǚ'ér xià ge xīngqī jiù yào fàng hánjià le, dào shíhou zánmen dài tā qù lǚyóu, fàngsōng fàngsōng, zěnmeyàng?
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Our daughter will start her winter vacation next week. How about we take her traveling then to relax?

words.hanzi: 丈夫：平时女儿那么多课，总是说想去旅行，但是没时间，怪可怜的。这次放假咱们带她去哪儿玩儿比较好呢？
words.pinyin: Zhàngfu: Píngshí nǚ'ér nàme duō kè, zǒngshì shuō xiǎng qù lǚxíng, dànshì méi shíjiān, guài kělián de. Zhè cì fàng jià zánmen dài tā qù nǎr wánr bǐjiào hǎo ne?
words.meaning: Husband: Usually our daughter has so many classes. She always says she wants to travel but has no time, which is quite pitiable. Where should we take her to play this holiday?

words.hanzi: 孙月：去年我同事带她女儿去广西玩儿了一趟，听说很不错，我们就去广西吧。
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Qùnián wǒ tóngshì dài tā nǚ'ér qù Guǎngxī wánrle yí tàng, tīngshuō hěn búcuò, wǒmen jiù qù Guǎngxī ba.
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Last year my colleague took her daughter to Guangxi for a trip. I heard it was very good. Let's go to Guangxi.

words.hanzi: 丈夫：好啊，那里的气候和北方很不同，即使是冬天，也非常暖和，还能吃到许多新鲜的水果。等女儿一回来我就告诉她这个好消息。
words.pinyin: Zhàngfu: Hǎo a, nàli de qìhòu hé běifāng hěn bù tóng, jíshǐ shì dōngtiān, yě fēicháng nuǎnhuo, hái néng chīdào xǔduō xīnxiān de shuǐguǒ. Děng nǚ'ér yì huílái wǒ jiù gàosu tā zhège hǎo xiāoxi.
words.meaning: Husband: Okay. The climate there is very different from the north. Even in winter, it is very warm, and you can eat a lot of fresh fruits. I'll tell her the good news as soon as she comes back.

words.hanzi: 孙月：先别着急说。中午我们不是要去对面的饭店吃烤鸭，祝贺她考试成绩都合格吗？那时候再告诉她，不是更好？
words.pinyin: Sūn Yuè: Xiān bié zhāojí shuō. Zhōngwǔ wǒmen bú shì yào qù duìmiàn de fàndiàn chī kǎoyā, zhùhè tā kǎoshì chéngjì dōu hégé ma? Nà shíhou zài gàosu tā, bú shì gèng hǎo?
words.meaning: Sun Yue: Don't be in a hurry to tell her yet. Aren't we going to the restaurant opposite to eat roast duck at noon to congratulate her on passing all her exams? Wouldn't it be better to tell her then?

words.hanzi: 丈夫：好主意，到时候她知道了肯定特别开心。
words.pinyin: Zhàngfu: Hǎo zhǔyi, dào shíhou tā zhīdào le kěndìng tèbié kāixīn.
words.meaning: Husband: Good idea. She will definitely be very happy when she knows.

words.hanzi: 马克：这么多照片，都是你这次去丽江旅行时照的？那里的自然风景真美！
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Zhème duō zhàopiàn, dōu shì nǐ zhè cì qù Lìjiāng lǚxíng shí zhào de? Nàli de zìrán fēngjǐng zhēn měi!
words.meaning: Mark: So many photos, were they all taken during your trip to Lijiang this time? The natural scenery there is really beautiful!

words.hanzi: 安娜：是啊，小城四季的风景都很美，而且环境保护得也很好，因此每年都吸引着成千上万的游客去那儿旅游。
words.pinyin: Ānnà: Shì a, xiǎo chéng sìjì de fēngjǐng dōu hěn měi, érqiě huánjìng bǎohù de yě hěn hǎo, yīncǐ měi nián dōu xīyǐnzhe chéngqiān-shàngwàn de yóukè qù nàr lǚyóu.
words.meaning: Anna: Yes, the scenery of the small town is beautiful in all four seasons, and the environment is well protected, so it attracts thousands of tourists every year.

words.hanzi: 马克：这张照片上和你干杯的那个人是少数民族吗？她打扮得真漂亮。
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Zhè zhāng zhàopiàn shang hé nǐ gān bēi de nàge rén shì shǎoshù mínzú ma? Tā dǎban de zhēn piàoliang.
words.meaning: Mark: Is the person toasting with you in this photo from an ethnic minority? She is dressed really beautifully.

words.hanzi: 安娜：她是我们的导游，不是少数民族。一路上她给我们讲了很多有趣的笑话。有一次我把存包的钥匙丢了，最后还是她帮我找到的。这张照片就是找到钥匙后，我们一起照的。
words.pinyin: Ānnà: Tā shì wǒmen de dǎoyóu, bú shì shǎoshù mínzú. Yí lù shang tā gěi wǒmen jiǎngle hěn duō yǒuqù de xiàohua. Yǒu yí cì wǒ bǎ cún bāo de yàoshi diū le, zuìhòu háishì tā bāng wǒ zhǎodào de. Zhè zhāng zhàopiàn jiù shì zhǎodào yàoshi hòu, wǒmen yìqǐ zhào de.
words.meaning: Anna: She is our tour guide, not an ethnic minority. Along the way, she told us many interesting jokes. Once I lost the key to the locker, and she found it for me in the end. This photo was taken together after we found the key.

words.hanzi: 马克：明年我有机会也去那儿看看，到时候把你的导游介绍给我吧。究竟哪个季节去丽江旅游比较好呢？
words.pinyin: Mǎkè: Míngnián wǒ yǒu jīhuì yě qù nàr kànkan, dào shí bǎ nǐ de dǎoyóu jièshào gěi wǒ ba. Jiūjìng nǎge jìjié qù Lìjiāng lǚyóu bǐjiào hǎo ne?
words.meaning: Mark: I will also go there to have a look if I have a chance next year. Introduce your tour guide to me then. Which season is better to travel to Lijiang?

words.hanzi: 安娜：那儿最好的季节是春天和秋天，不过那时候人比较多。稍微好一点儿的时间是每年12月到第二年3月。这段时间去丽江的话，无论交通还是吃、住都很便宜。
words.pinyin: Ānnà: Nàr zuì hǎo de jìjié shì chūntiān hé qiūtiān, búguò nà shíhou rén bǐjiào duō. Shāowēi hǎo yìdiǎnr de shíjiān shì měi nián shí'èr yuè dào dì èr nián sān yuè. Zhè duàn shíjiān qù Lìjiāng de huà, wúlùn jiāotōng háishì chī, zhù dōu hěn piányi.
words.meaning: Anna: The best seasons there are spring and autumn, but there are more people at that time. A slightly better time is from December to March of the next year. If you go to Lijiang during this time, transportation, food, and accommodation are all very cheap.

words.hanzi: 中国南北距离约5500公里，因此南北气候有很大区别。
words.pinyin: Zhōngguó nán běi jùlí yuē wǔqiān wǔbǎi gōnglǐ, yīncǐ nán běi qìhòu yǒu hěn dà qūbié.
words.meaning: The distance between north and south China is about 5500 kilometers, so there is a big difference in climate between north and south.

words.hanzi: 每年三四月份的时候，如果从北方坐火车到南方去旅游，一路上你会发现，不同的地方有不同的风景：
words.pinyin: Měi nián sān sì yuèfèn de shíhou, rúguǒ cóng běifāng zuò huǒchē dào nánfāng qù lǚyóu, yí lù shang nǐ huì fāxiàn, bù tóng de dìfang yǒu bù tóng de fēngjǐng:
words.meaning: In March and April every year, if you take a train from the north to the south to travel, you will find that different places have different scenery along the way:

words.hanzi: 窗外的树一棵一棵地变绿，北方也许还下着雪，南方却已经到处都是绿色了。
words.pinyin: Chuāng wài de shù yì kē yì kē de biàn lǜ, běifāng yěxǔ hái xiàzhe xuě, nánfāng què yǐjīng dàochù dōu shì lǜsè le.
words.meaning: The trees outside the window turn green one by one. It may still be snowing in the north, but the south is already green everywhere.

words.hanzi: 南方菜很有特点，特别是汤，味道鲜美，很多北方人都喜欢喝。
words.pinyin: Nánfāng cài hěn yǒu tèdiǎn, tèbié shì tāng, wèidào xiānměi, hěn duō běifāng rén dōu xǐhuan hē.
words.meaning: Southern dishes are very characteristic, especially the soup, which tastes delicious, and many northerners like to drink it.

words.hanzi: 另外，南方和北方的语言也有很大不同。比如你跟上海人对话时，会发现上海话听起来就像外语一样。
words.pinyin: Lìngwài, nánfāng hé běifāng de yǔyán yě yǒu hěn dà bùtóng. Bǐrú nǐ gēn Shànghǎi rén duìhuà shí, huì fāxiàn Shànghǎi huà tīng qǐlai jiù xiàng wàiyǔ yíyàng.
words.meaning: In addition, the languages of the south and the north are also very different. For example, when you talk to people from Shanghai, you will find that Shanghai dialect sounds like a foreign language.

words.hanzi: 虽然上海人也会讲普通话，可是仔细听，还是有上海味儿。
words.pinyin: Suīrán Shànghǎi rén yě huì jiǎng Pǔtōnghuà, kěshì zǐxì tīng, háishì yǒu Shànghǎi wèir.
words.meaning: Although Shanghai people can also speak Mandarin, if you listen carefully, there is still a Shanghai flavor.

words.hanzi: 一个人有时间一定要去旅行，旅行不仅能丰富一个人的经历，而且是很好的减压方法。
words.pinyin: Yí ge rén yǒu shíjiān yídìng yào qù lǚxíng, lǚxíng bùjǐn néng fēngfù yí ge rén de jīnglì, érqiě shì hěn hǎo de jiǎnyā fāngfǎ.
words.meaning: A person must travel when they have time. Travel can not only enrich a person's experience but is also a good way to reduce stress.

words.hanzi: 但对我来说，最重要的是旅行能让我有机会尝到各地有名的小吃。
words.pinyin: Dàn duì wǒ lái shuō, zuì zhòngyào de shì lǚxíng néng ràng wǒ yǒu jīhuì chángdào gèdì yǒumíng de xiǎochī.
words.meaning: But for me, the most important thing is that travel gives me the opportunity to taste famous snacks from all over the place.

words.hanzi: 放假的时候，我会收拾好行李，带上地图，买张火车票，向目的地出发。
words.pinyin: Fàng jià de shíhou, wǒ huì shōushi hǎo xíngli, dàishang dìtú, mǎi zhāng huǒchē piào, xiàng mùdìdì chūfā.
words.meaning: During the holidays, I will pack my luggage, bring a map, buy a train ticket, and set off for the destination.

words.hanzi: 说起吃的东西，给我印象最深的是湖南菜。湖南菜的特点就是辣，与其他地方的辣不同，湖南菜的辣主要是咸辣、香辣和酸辣。
words.pinyin: Shuōqǐ chī de dōngxi, gěi wǒ yìnxiàng zuì shēn de shì Húnán cài. Húnán cài de tèdiǎn jiù shì là, yǔ qítā dìfang de là bùtóng, Húnán cài de là zhǔyào shì xiánlà, xiānglà hé suānlà.
words.meaning: Speaking of food, what impresses me most is Hunan cuisine. The characteristic of Hunan cuisine is spiciness. Unlike the spiciness of other places, the spiciness of Hunan cuisine is mainly salty spicy, fragrant spicy and sour spicy.

words.hanzi: 虽然全国各地都有湖南饭馆儿，但最好还是直接去那里尝一尝。
words.pinyin: Suīrán quánguó gèdì dōu yǒu Húnán fànguǎnr, dàn zuì hǎo háishì zhíjiē qù nàli cháng yi cháng.
words.meaning: Although there are Hunan restaurants all over the country, it is best to go there directly to taste it.

words.hanzi: 每次旅行结束后，我都会精神百倍地开始我的工作。
words.pinyin: Měi cì lǚxíng jiéshù hòu, wǒ dōu huì jīngshén bǎibèi de kāishǐ wǒ de gōngzuò.
words.meaning: After every trip, I start my work with full energy.
